178a3(mdo sde): bar du tshangs par spyod pa ma 'dres pa yongasu rdzogs par/ yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba sprad par dka' na/ ma la bdag gis skra dang kha spu bregs te gos tshon can
178a4(mdo sde): rnams bsgos la yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po rdul bram ze khyab 'jug chen po ga la ba
178a5(mdo sde): der song ste phyin nas/ bram ze khyab 'jug chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bram ze khyab 'jug chen po rdul
178a6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so// yul bdag rgyal chen rdul gyis ni// di ring bdag gi tshig gson cig/ khyod nyid kyis ni rgyal srid bsrungs// khyab 'jug bdag ni
178a7(mdo sde): spro ba med// rgyal po rdul gyis smras pa// khyod kyis 'dod pa ma skyongs pa// de ni nges par bdag gis bskang // khyod kyis gnod pa bdag gis bstsal// khyab
178a8(mdo sde): 'jug bdag ni mdor cig/ khyab 'jug chen pos smras pa// bdag gi 'dod pa ma skangs med// bdag la gnod pa byed pa 'ang med// mi ma yin pa'i tshig thos
178b1(mdo sde): nas// khyim na gnas par spro ba med// rgyal po rdul gyis smras pa// bram ze su yi tshig thos pas// nga dang 'dod pa spong byed pa// mi ma yin pa ci 'dra de/
178b2(mdo sde): 'dris pa de ni bdag la smros// khyab 'jug chen pos smras pa// snying rje la ni gnas nas kyang // bden pa'i bsam btan byed pa na// de tshe tshangs pa byung nas ni//
178b3(mdo sde): phyogs rnams thams cad snang bar byas// bdag gis de yi tshig thos nas// khyim du gnas par spro ba med// rgyal po rdul gyis smras pa// mkhan po khyod nam bdag
178b4(mdo sde): gi bu thu bo// rgyal sar ma bcug gi bar du sdod cig dang // mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag kyang rab tu 'byung bar bya'o zhes smras nas// tshig su bcad
178b5(mdo sde): de smras pa// bram ze gang du 'gro ba der// bdag kyang der ni 'gro bar bya// bdag gis khyod kyi slob ma bya// bdag gi ston pa khyab 'jug chen pos smras pa/
178b6(mdo sde): so so'i skye bo gar chags pa// 'dod pa der ni spang byar gyis// 'dod pa rnams la ma lta bar// bden pa'i chos la gnas par gyis// rgyal po rdul gyis
178b7(mdo sde): smras pa// tshangs pa dag par skye ba'i phyir// nam mkha' dri med lta bu dang // nor bur be dur dag pa ltar// tshangs par spyod pa sprad par bya// khyab 'jug chen po/
178b8(mdo sde): spras pa// rgyal po chen po de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na de ltar mdzod ces byas nas// bram ze khyab 'jug chen rgyul rigs kyi rgyal po drug la smras pa/
179a1(mdo sde): las brgyabadag ni skra dang kha spu bregs te// gos tshon can bgos la yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas// khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar
179a2(mdo sde): 'dod na// khyod ji ltar byed sems/ drag gis smras pa/ mkhan po khyod lo bdun gyi bar du sdod cag dang / lo bdun nas bdag cag gis bu dang nu bo dag
179a3(mdo sde): rgyal sar bcug la/ mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung ngo // khyab 'jug chen pos smras pa/ kye lo bdun ni ha cang yun rings ches
179a4(mdo sde): so// 'dod pa rnams ni chags par 'gyur ba'o// 'tshe ba dang 'chi ba ni drod bzung dka'o// lo bdun lon nas khyod rab tu byung ngam/ mi 'gyur yang gtol
179a5(mdo sde): med kyis bdag je rab tu 'byung ngo // de dag gis smras pa/ mkhan po khyod re shig sdod cig dang / lo drug gam/ lnga 'am bzhi 'am/ gsum 'am/ gnyis
179a6(mdo sde): sam cig gam/ de bzhin zla ba bdun nam/ drug gam/ lnga 'am bzhi 'am/ gsum 'am/ gnyis sam gcig gam/ zhag bdun nam/ drug gam/ lnga
179a7(mdo sde): 'am bzhi 'am/ gsum 'am/ gnyis sam/ gcig lon na/ bdag cag gis bu dang nu bo rnams rgyal sar bcug nas/ mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i
179a8(mdo sde): rjes su bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung ngo // khyab 'jug gis smras pa/ kye zhag bdun yang ha cang yun ma rings sam/ 'dod pa rnams ni chags par 'gyur
179b1(mdo sde): pa'o// longs spyod rnams ni rgyags par 'gyur ba'o// 'tsho ba dang 'chi ba ni drod bzung bar dka'o// zhag bdun lon nas kyang khyod rab tu 'byung ngam/ mi 'byung //
179b2(mdo sde): gtol med kyis bdag je rab tu 'byung ngo // de dag gis smras pa/ zhag bdun yang btang ste/ ded nyid du bdag cag gis bu dang / nu bo dag rgyal sar
179b3(mdo sde): bcug nas mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag cig kyang ra tu 'byung ngo // khyab 'jug gis smras pa/ khyed kyi de'i dus la bab par shes na/ de nas bram
179b4(mdo sde): ze khyab 'jug chen pos rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po drug gi 'khor bltas nas/ bram ze che zhing mtho ba bdun bltas so// bram ze che zhing mtho ba bdun bltas nas/
179b5(mdo sde): bshes pa'i bud med bcu ltas so// bshes pa'i bud med bzhi bcu bltas nas/ bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya bltas nas/ shing rta'i kha lo sgyur ba rnams dang /
179b6(mdo sde): glang po che'i kha lo ba rnams dang / rta pa rnams dang / shing rta rnams dang / mtshon cha can rnams dang phongs pa rnams dang / zham ring ba rnams dang / tshal
179b7(mdo sde): za rnams dang / drag shul can rnams dang / dpa' bo rnams dang / rab gnon rnams dang / chen po che chen po rnams dang / rgyal po'i sras du ma dag
179b8(mdo sde): bltas te/ kye bdag ni skra dang kha spu bregs nas/ gos mtshon can rnams bgos la/ yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu
179b9(mdo sde): bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya bltas so//
180a1(mdo sde): las 'a'abyung na/ khyed ji ltar byed sems/ de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag kyang mkhan po rab tu 'byung ba'i rjes su rab tu
180a2(mdo sde): 'byung ngo // khyab 'jug gis smras pa/ khyed kyis de'i dus la bab par shes na/ de bzhin du gyis shig ces byas nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag
180a3(mdo sde): kyang mkhan po rab tu 'byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo // khyab 'jug gis smras pa/ khyed kyis de'i dus la bab par shes na/ de bzhin du gyis shig ces
180a4(mdo sde): byas nas/ bram ze khyab 'jug chen pos khyim gyi 'khor thams cad btang ste/ sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas te/ du ma zhig dbul bor te/
180a5(mdo sde): btang nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos tshon rnams bgos nas/ yang dag smad pa kho nas/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo // rab tu byung nas
180a6(mdo sde): nas kyang nags khrod cig tu gnas bcas nas/ yal ga dang lo ma'i sbrul po phub ste/ de de 'dug nas bsam btan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed
180a7(mdo sde): de// rdul 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar gyur to// khyab 'jug rab tu byung nas/ rgyal po rdul g.yog 'khor 'bum phrag du ma/ sgra dang kha spu bregs te/
180a8(mdo sde): gos tshon can rnams bgos nas/ yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo // de bzhin du rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po drug gi 'khor
180b1(mdo sde): dang / bram ze che zhing mtho ba bdun dang / bshes pa'i bud med bzhi bcu dang / bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya dang / shing rta'i kha lo pa rnams dang / glang /
180b2(mdo sde): po che'i kha lo ba rnams dang / rta pa rnams dang / shing rta ba rnams dang / mtshon can rnams dang / zham ring ba rnams dang / tshal za rnams dang / drag shug
180b3(mdo sde): can rnams dang / dpa' bo rnams dang / rab gnon rnams dang / tshan po che chen po rnams dang / rgyal po'i sras du ma dag skra dang kha spu bregs te/
180b4(mdo sde): gos tshon can rnams bgos nas/ yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par khyab 'jug rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ste/ bram ze khyab 'jug
180b5(mdo sde): gis thams cad la yid byed pa'i lung phog nas/ de dag gis kyang brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas gsam gastan bzhi dang / mngon par shes
180b6(mdo sde): pa lnga bskyed do// de nas bram ze che zhing mtho ba khyab 'jug gi mang bram ze che zhing mtho ba khyab 'jug ces bya ba med par gyur nas/ ston pa khyab 'jug ces
180b7(mdo sde): bya bar gyur to// dge slong dag ji snyam du ma snyam du sems/ de'i tshe ston pa khyab 'jug ces bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// de'i tshe rgyal
180b8(mdo sde): po rdul ces bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di kho na yin no// de'i tshe rgyal po rdul gyis mgo drangs pa'i skye bo 'bum
181a1(mdo sde): las brgyanaphrag du mar gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal po gzugs can snying pos mgo drangs pa lnga brgyad khri dang / yul ma ga da'i bram
181a2(mdo sde): ze dang / khyim bdag stong po 'di dag kho na yin te/ de'i tshe yang ngas rgyal po rdul la sogs pa yul gyi mi du ma dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag stong phrag
181a3(mdo sde): du ma rab tu byung nas// bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod de/ gzhi des na nga'i grags pas 'jig rten rgyas par gyur to// de ltar
181a4(mdo sde): yang ngas rgyal po gzugs can snying po la sogs pa brgyad khri dag/ ma ga 'da'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag stong phrag du ma dam pa'i chos kyi bcud kyis
181a5(mdo sde): tshim par byas nas/ g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang / bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do//
181a6(mdo sde): bam po// // thabs mo zhes bya ba ni/ gleng bzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na skye bo phal po che 'thab pa
181a7(mdo sde): dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa la zhugs shing 'khod do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/
181a8(mdo sde): rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang / ye shes la mnga' rnyes pa/ ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar/ gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/ mi 'jigs pa
181b1(mdo sde): bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ 'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/ skye mched drug la mkhas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod pa/ rnam/
181b2(mdo sde): par thar pa brgyad la btan pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ yang dag pa'i seng ge'i
181b3(mdo sde): sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni/ chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/ nyin mtshan dus drug du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la
181b4(mdo sde): gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni darang / su ni phongs shing 'dug/ su ni nyam nga bar gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang /
181b5(mdo sde): gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song ba pa/ su ni ngan song nas phyung ste/ mtho rasi dang thar pa dang /
181b6(mdo sde): 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'ang du bying ba las/ lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las/ 'phags
181b7(mdo sde): pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las/ bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed
181b8(mdo sde): zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtswa rnams su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis gtol bar bya/ su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan
182a1(mdo sde): las brgyanapa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu yod par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa la 'jug go// rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas// dus
182a2(mdo sde): bslabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid// gdul bar bya'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/
182a3(mdo sde): skye bo phal po che gdul ba'i dus la bab ste/ de dag ngas 'thab pa dang / tshang 'dru ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / brtsod pa las bzlog ste/ g.yung drung gi mthar
182a4(mdo sde): thug pa/ grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dgod par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/ snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed snam
182a5(mdo sde): nas/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs te/ skye bo phal po che ga la ba der gshegs nas/ skye bo phal po che de dag gis thag ring po zhig nas/
182a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bdan bshams nas/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
182a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs bzhugs su gsol// de nas bdan bshams pa la bzhugs nas// bcom ldan 'ad/
182a8(mdo sde): kyis skye bo phal po che la bka' stsal pa/ grogs ci byed cing 'khod// gzhan dang 'thab dgos na// gzhan dang 'thab cing 'dug gam/ de rnams kyis
182b1(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag su dang 'tshal lags// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag 'on na 'khod cig dang / ngas
182b2(mdo sde): khyed la rgyas par brjod par bya'o// de nas skye bo phal po che de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir sman
182b3(mdo sde): sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo pha po che de dag la bka' stsal pa/ khyed ni nyon mongs pa rnams dang / 'thab dgos kyis nyon mongs
182b4(mdo sde): pa spangs pa'i phyir 'bad par gyis shig ces/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la de lta bu dang dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ de dag gis khro ba'i kun nas
182b5(mdo sde): dkris pa med par gyur nas/ stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs
182b6(mdo sde): pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de dag gis bden pa mthong nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal
182b7(mdo sde): mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba tu byung ba dang /
182b8(mdo sde): gnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis thad du tshangs pa spyod pa spyad 'tshal lo// de nas bcom
183a1(mdo sde): ye brgya pade nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/
183a2(mdo sde): de dag gi lung phog ste/ de dag gis kyang btson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du
183a3(mdo sde): byas te/ de dag dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang / bral bar 'gyur nas/ gser dang bong par mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag 'thil
183a4(mdo sde): du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsal bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /
183a5(mdo sde): so so yang dag par rig pas thob pa/ srid pa'i snyed pa dang chags pa dang / bkur sti le mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing
183a6(mdo sde): brjod pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis kyi bo bal po che
183a7(mdo sde): 'thab pa las zhi bar mdzad nas g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa/ grub pa dang / bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das
183a8(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ da ltar 'ba' shig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas skye bo phal po che 'di dag bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga
183b1(mdo sde): la ji ltar bkod pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ ri khrod kyi grong zhig na/ bram ze zhig mchod sbyin byas te/ mchod sbyin byed/
183b2(mdo sde): pa der bram ze rnams stan gi phyir/ 'thabs pa las de'i tshe bka' thub kyi gnas zhig na/ drang srong 'khor lnga brgya yod pa zhig gnas so// de nas mchod
183b3(mdo sde): sbyin byed pa der/ drang srong des bram ze de dag 'thab pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ de lta ba dang 'thun pa'i chos stan ste/ de nas thab mo de yang zhi bar gyur la bram
183b4(mdo sde): ze rnams kyang skyo ba skyes nas/ de nyid kyi thad du rab tu byung ngo // bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems//
183b5(mdo sde): de'i drang srong du gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smod pa la gnas pa gdu pA de ngu nyid yin no// de'i tshe bram ze lnga brgyar gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ skye bo pha
183b6(mdo sde): po che 'di dag kho na yin te/ de'i tshe yang ngas skye bo phol po che 'thab pa zhi bar byas nas/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod do// da ltar
183b7(mdo sde): yang ngas skye bo phal po 'thab pa zhi bar byas nas/ g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang / bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do// gzhan yang dag par
183b8(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la/ 'di dag thams cad rab tu byung nas/ der 'di rnams kyis tshe cig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/ dbang po rnam
184a1(mdo sde): las brgya @yongs su smin par byas pa de ni/ da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to// klu zhes bya ba ni gleng bzhi mnyan du yod par bzhugs te/ de'i
184a2(mdo sde): tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi blon po chen po zhig gyod gcig la btags te/ ci bdog pa phrogs nas/ khri mon du bcug pa las/ de der zas dang skom gyis mnar te shi'o//
184a3(mdo sde): de nas des smon lam log par btab nas/ shi 'phos te/ dus las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ gnod srin ma rungs pa zhig du skyes nas/ des yul ko sa la de
184a4(mdo sde): thams cad du mi btang ste/ skye bo phal po che dag kha dog par gyur na/ ltas mkhan dag gis smras pa/ blon po chen po des 'chi kar smon lam log pa btab pa nas/
184a5(mdo sde): gnod sbyin ma rungs par skyes te/ des mi nad 'di dag btang ngo zhes byas so// de nas thos mya tu skye bo mang ng+ge dag ci bya gtol med par gyur to// de nas rgyal po
184a6(mdo sde): gsal rgyal gyis bsams pa/ 'di ni sus kyang gdul bar mi nus/ 'di'i phyir bcom ldan 'das lnga gsol pa gdab dgos so snyam ste/ bcom ldan 'das
184a7(mdo sde): ga la ba der song ste phyin nam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal po
184a8(mdo sde): gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis klu ma rungs pa/ dga' bo dang nye dga' bo la sogs pa gzhan
184b1(mdo sde): dang / gzhan dag kyang btul/ gnod sprin ma rungs pa 'phrogs gnas la sogs pa gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang rtul na/ btsun pa blon po chen po che mo zhig gis smon
184b2(mdo sde): lam log par btab ste/ gnod sprin ma rungs par skyes nas/ des bdag gi yul du mi nad btang na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ gnod
184b3(mdo sde): sprin ma rungs pa de gdul bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bar gnang ngo // de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan
184b4(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de/ rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas
184b5(mdo sde): song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis gnod sprin de rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi mngab du bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de gdul ba'i phyir
184b6(mdo sde): me chen po sprul te/ de'i 'khor 'khor yul+la nas/ bdag nyid me chen pos 'khor bar mtho ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung 'ba' zhig zhi bar mthong
184b7(mdo sde): ngo // de nas de 'jigs shing skrag nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin ma rungs pa de la bka' stsal pa/
184b8(mdo sde): bzhin zang khyod bzangs khyod kyis sngon mi dge ba'i las byas pas/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsad pa yin na/ da yang khyod 'dir skyes nas/ skye bo mang po/
185a1(mdo sde): las 'a6kha dog par byed na/ 'di nas shi 'phos pa'i 'og tu khyod kyis 'gro ba ni gang yin/ skye ba'i gnas ni gang yin/ 'gro ba'i/
185a2(mdo sde): sa ni gang yin/ gnod sbyin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdig pa'i las 'di mthong shig/ gnod sbyin gyis gsol pa/
185a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' ci stsal pa gzhin du 'tshal lo// de skad ces gsol te/ de nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams
185a4(mdo sde): blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag gis sdig pa'i las gtang lags te/ btsun pa deng slan chad mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i skye
185a5(mdo sde): bo mang po rnams bsrungs ma dang skyong ba ni bdag lagaso// de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
185a6(mdo sde): kyis gnod sbyin ma rungs pa btul nas/ skye bo phal po che de dag 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas su bkod pa la gzigs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
185a7(mdo sde): da ltar 'ba' shig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas gnod sbyin ma rungs pa 'di btul nas/ skye bo phal po che ji ltar 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas la bkod pa
185a8(mdo sde): de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer ba ra si na/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin rgyal po byed de/ de'i tshe yul ku sha rari klu gdug pa dug mi
185b1(mdo sde): bzad pa zhig byung ste/ des grong yang stongs par byed/ ljongs kyang stongs par byed cing ba ra na si'i phyogs su chas pa las/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis thos
185b2(mdo sde): nas de ma thag tu 'jigs pa chen po skyes te/ des dpung gi tsho gas yan lag gzhi bskon te/ gtang nas/ khyed dong la klu bdug pa de sod cig ces bsgo'o// de
185b3(mdo sde): nas de dag gis rkyang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ gsol ba/ lha na de dpung gi tshogs kyis dgum par mi nus kyis/ sngags sems sman gyis de dgum par nus lag so//
185b4(mdo sde): yang na dge ba'i tshul gyis bkur ba'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyis gdul bar nus lagaso zhes gsol to// de nas de'i tshe ba ra na si de nyid na/ gdol khye'u byam
185b5(mdo sde): pa'i rang bzhin can snying rje che ba sems can la byams pa zhig gnas pa des ske bo mang po de dag ci bya gtol med par gyur pa mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de skyes nas/
185b6(mdo sde): des skye bo mang po rnams la smras pa/ khyod ci bya gtol med par bya mi dgos kyis/ bdag gis klu gdug pa de gdul bar bya'o// zheso de nas de'i pha ma gnyis na re/ de
185b7(mdo sde): ni dbugs gdug pa yin te/ khyod kyis de gdul mi nus so// khye'u smras pa/ byams pa'i go cha gyon pa la des chung zad kyang gnod par byed mi nus so zhes byas nas
185b8(mdo sde): khye'u des phyogs gang na klu gdug pa de 'dug pa'i phyogs der song nas/ klu gdug pa de thag ring po zhig nas/ khye'u de mthong ngo // de mthong nas kyang khros nas khye'u de
186a1(mdo sde): las brtsegal dbugs gtang ngo // des khye'u de byams pa la snyoms par bzhugs nas/ byams pa'i lta bas klu gdug pa de la bltas te/
186a2(mdo sde): des bltas ma thag tu dug med par gyur to// de nas khye'u des sbrul de lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas/ mi gnas pa'i sa phyogs su bzhag go// de nas rgyal
186a3(mdo sde): po tshangs pas byin dang / skye bo mang po gzhan dag gis gdol pa'i khye'u che mo zhig gis/ klu gdug pa btul lo zhes thos nas/ thos ma thag tu rgyal po de rang
186a4(mdo sde): nyid gdol ba'i khye'u thad du song nas/ des khye'u de la dam pa sna gcig 'dam du bcug ste/ khye'u khyed la dam pa sna gcig sbyin zhes byas so// khye'us
186a5(mdo sde): smras pa/ dge bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te gnas par mdzod cig/ yul na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gzung bar mdzod
186a6(mdo sde): cig ces byas so// de nas rgyal po tshangs pa sbyin gyis/ khye'u de longs spyod kyi dbyings chen po byin nas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag par blangs te 'dug go//
186a7(mdo sde): yul na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod do// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe gdol pa'i khye'ur gyur pa byang chub sems
186a8(mdo sde): dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// de'i tshe klu gdug par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni gnod sbyin ma rungs pa 'di kho na yin no// de'i tshe skye bo phal
186b1(mdo sde): po cher gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ yul ko sa pa la na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po 'di dag kho na yin te/ de'i tshe yang ngas klu gdug pa gtul nas/ skye bo phal po che
186b2(mdo sde): 'jigs pa'i gnas su bkod do// da ltar yang ngas gnod sbyin ma rungs pa 'di btul nas/ skye bo bal po che 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas su bkod do// gzhan yang
186b3(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis gsung rab la 'di dag thams cad dge bsnyen du gyur te/ der 'di rnams kyis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spod pa spang nas/
186b4(mdo sde): dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na/ da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to// shi bi gnyis zhes bya ba de la/ shi bi dang po ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyang
186b5(mdo sde): gyi yul du ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/ chu klung 'thud ldan dang / grong khyer ku shi'i bar gyi lam nas gud bzur te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal
186b6(mdo sde): pa/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla gos bzhi lta ba du bgyis te/ thing shig dang / nga'i rgyab mi bde re shig brta bar bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dag
186b7(mdo sde): btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo// zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du mnyan nas/ bla gos bzhi ltab tu byas te bting nas/ bcom ldan
186b8(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla gos bzhi lta ba du bgyis te bting lags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab
187a1(mdo sde): las brgyanapar dgongs su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos snam sbyar stug por bltabs te/ phang bzhag nas/ snang ba'i du
187a2(mdo sde): shes dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / shes bzhin dang ldan pa'i 'du shes thugs la dgongs shing / gro g.yas phyogs kyis gzims te/ zhabs cig
187a3(mdo sde): gi steng du gcig bzhag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ 'khyor 'dir so so'i skye bo'i dge slong ji snyed 'dus shing tshogs pa de dag thams cad
187a4(mdo sde): ci sangs rgyas kyis gdul ba yin nam/ 'on ste nyan thos kyis 'dul ba yin zhig gu su snyam du dgongs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa/ 'di na
187a5(mdo sde): kha cig ni sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ro// kha cig ni nyan thos kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'o la bka' stsal pa/
187a6(mdo sde): kun dga' bo khyod byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs rnams las spobs par gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas 'khor rnams
187a7(mdo sde): thams cad du sgra des gang bar 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs so// de nas dge slong mang po dag gis tshig de lta bu gsung ba'i sgra thos nas/ de dag gis bas
187a8(mdo sde): pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi gtam gyis shig par bskal pas na/ de ni tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos spang
187b1(mdo sde): bu'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba bzhin du chos snyan no// cog ston par 'gyur ro// snyam ste/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/
187b2(mdo sde): bskor de 'khod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la rten pa/
187b3(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral ba la brten pa/ 'gog pa la rten pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba na/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mngon par shes pas/
187b4(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bstan to// tshe da ldan pa dag chos rnams par 'byed pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dga' ba dang shing tu spangs pa dang / ting
187b5(mdo sde): de 'dzin dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la rten pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la rten pa/ 'gog pa la brten pa/ rnam par spong ba
187b6(mdo sde): yongs su sbyar ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mngon par shes pas/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bstan to// zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bya
187b7(mdo sde): chub kyi yan lag 'di dag nyid las brtsams nas/ dge slong rnams la de lta bu dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ de nas nyan thos dang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'brel pa gang yin
187b8(mdo sde): pa de dag gis bstan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das/
188a1(mdo sde): las ca/ kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i gtam gyi 'jug rdzogs par thugs su chud nas bzhugs te/ dkyil mo krung bcas nas
188a2(mdo sde): sku drang por bsrang ste/ dran pa mngon tu bzhag nas bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang / ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod brtson
188a3(mdo sde): 'grus bton tam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'grus ston lags so// bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod brtson 'grus ston tam gsol pa/ bde bar gshegs pa
188a4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus ston lags so// bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo brtson 'grus ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba'o zhes/ bcom ldan 'ad
188a5(mdo sde): kyis byang chub kyi phyogs rnams 'di dag nyid las btsams nas/ de lta bu dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'brel pa gang
188a6(mdo sde): yin pa de dag gis stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom nyid mngon gsum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i
188a7(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag 'thil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ btsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil
188a8(mdo sde): bar gyur pa// rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa
188b1(mdo sde): bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing brjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas de'i tshe dge slong zhig gis
188b2(mdo sde): tshig su gcad de smras pa/ snyam pa'i chos ni gsan pa'i phyir ston pa snang bzhin nyid kyis bskul// khyod la byang chub yan lan rnams// yod na dge slong chos
188b3(mdo sde): shod cig/ gnas brtan kun dga' mkhas shing grags// byang bar gyur pas legs shes gsol// dpa' bo khyod kyi gsung rab la// dkar ba'i chos/
188b4(mdo sde): rnams de dag lnga// dran dang rnam 'byed brtson 'grus dang // dga' dang rab spangs ting nge 'dzin dang // btang snyoms 'di dag rdul med pa// khyod kyi byang chub
188b5(mdo sde): yan lag lags// byang chub yan lag bcud thos nas// byang chub yan lag bcud kyang rtogs// bcom ldan skung tshabs che ba las// gnod pa de las
188b6(mdo sde): bzhengs par 'gyur// dam chos rin chen 'di ston pa'i// chos kyi mnga' bdag de nyid kyang // dam chos gsan par bzhed gyur na// gzhan lta ji ltar/
188b7(mdo sde): de mi nyan/ stobs bcu mnga' bas nye rgyal ni// dge slong rnams kyi shes rab mchog/ snyan pa gang yin de nyid kyang // chos nyan 'dod pas gzir
188b8(mdo sde): par gyur// mdo sde 'dul ba ma mo 'dzin// mkhas shing tshul dang tshul min shes// de dag dam chos nyan byed na// gzhan ltar ji ltar de mi nyan//
189a1(mdo sde): #mkhas pa shes 'dod sems bzhag nas// chos bzhin nyan par byed pa ni// sangs rgyas gsung rab skyon med la/
189a2(mdo sde): de bzhin dga' ba thob par 'gyur// yid dga' lus kyang shin tu sbyangs// bde ba yang ni myong bar 'gyur// bde bar gyur na sems nyid kyi// ting 'dzin la
189a3(mdo sde): yang reg par 'gyur// sems ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa// 'du byed g.yul gyi rnam par rig/ srid pa'i 'gro las skyo bar 'gyur// chags med sems
189a4(mdo sde): kyis grol bar 'gyur// rtag tu srid 'gro skyo gyur na// lha dang mi la chags pa med// bud shing med pa'i me bzhin du// dgra bcom rnams ni mya ngan 'da'// dam
189a5(mdo sde): chos nyan pa'i phan yon ni// mang po gzhan yang rgyal bas bstan// de phyir 'di ni yod mnyam du// ston pa'i bka' ni mnyan par bya// de nas dge slong rnams kyis
189a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun bcom ldan 'das ni legs par smras pa gsung pa dang / legs par smras pa bzhed pa lags te/ legs/
189a7(mdo sde): par smras pa'i don gyi slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bskul ba mdzad nas/ bkur ti dang ldan pas gsan kyang gsan/ bshad
189a8(mdo sde): kyang bshad pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar 'ba' zhig legs par smra ba gsung ba dang /
189b1(mdo sde): legs par smras pa ma yin gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'das pa'i dus na yang legs par smras pa gsungs pa dang / legs par smras pa bzhed pa ma yin/
189b2(mdo sde): gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'das pa'i dus na yang legs par smras pa gsungs pa dang / legs par smras pa bzhed pa yin te/ legs par smras pa ba'i
189b3(mdo sde): don gyi phyir ngas mchog tu dga' ba ji ltar spyad pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ rgyal po brang zhi ldan zhes bya ba na/ rgyal po shi bi zhes
189b4(mdo sde): bya ba rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos gang pa dang / gtsod pa dang / 'thab
189b5(mdo sde): ba zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang khrug dang / chom rkun dang / nad dang mu ge med pa dang / 'bras sa lu dang / bu raMs shing dang / ba lang dang /
189b6(mdo sde): ma te dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la/ bu gcig pa sdug pa la bya bzhin du chos bzhin du rgyal srid byed do// rgyal po de yang
189b7(mdo sde): byams pa'i rang bzhin can sAd+d+hi can dang ldan pa/ sems can la byams pa/ sbyin pa la sred pa zhig ste/ de sbyin pa de dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa la/
189b8(mdo sde): zhugs te/ zas 'dod pa la ni zas sbyin par byed// skom 'dod pa ni skom sbyin par byed// gos 'dod pa la ni gos sbyin par byed// rgyan 'dod pa la ni
190a1(mdo sde): las @/ rgyan sbyin par byed// mal btan 'dod pa la ni mal bstan sbyin par byed// gzhon pa 'dod pa la ni gnon pa sbyin par byed// mo/
190a2(mdo sde): byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad gzhan smin par byed do// nad bso ba'i nad brangad bcas te/ yo byad thams cad sbar nas/ sman pa rnams dang / nad g.yog rnams
190a3(mdo sde): bskos de/ nad pa rnams dang / mgon med pa rnams kyi rim gro byed do// bza' ba dang bca' ba mang po dag kyang sta gon byas te/ na mkha' la gnas pa dang /
190a4(mdo sde): thang la gnas pa'i srog chags la sbyin par byed do// des yid dam 'di lta bu yang bcas te/ da phyin chad bdag gis thams cad la/ thams cad sbyin par byas
190a5(mdo sde): te/ 'jig rten dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi las la dgod par bya'o zhes dam bcas nas/ des 'jig rten thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod do// der
190a6(mdo sde): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang par blangs pa'i phyir/ sems can pa'i cher shi ba'i 'og tu lha'i nang du skyes nas/ de dag gis lha'i gnas rnams gang bar gyur to// /
190a7(mdo sde): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/ 'di ci zhig sbub/ brgya byin du 'gyur ba sgrub bam/ 'on te/ tshangs par gyur pa sgrub ci gu snyam mo//
190a8(mdo sde): nas des bltas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub cing 'dug go// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsam pa/ ci 'di sems can brtan
190b1(mdo sde): po yin rnam 'on te/ sems can mi brtan pa yin/ bdag gis je brtags la/ gal te sems can brtan po yin na ni mchod pa bya'o// de ste sems
190b2(mdo sde): can bstan po ma yin na yang 'di'i sems stobs bskyed par bya'o// snyam nas/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis bdag nyid srin po'i gzugs su mngon par
190b3(mdo sde): sprul nas/ rgyal po shi ba'i khang bzangs kyi char khab la 'dug ste/ tshigs su bcad pa'i phyed smras pa/ kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag/ kyi zhing jig
190b4(mdo sde): pa'i chos can yin zhes smras nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can/ can mi zer bar 'dug go// de nas rgyal po shi bsis lha'i dbang po/
190b5(mdo sde): brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can gyis tshig de lta bu brjod pa thos so// thos nas kyang des bsams pa/ gcig tu na ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i rten
190b6(mdo sde): cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sgo phye'o// gcig tu na ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam bstan to snyam mo// de nas rgyal po shi bis lha'i dbang po
190b7(mdo sde): brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can/ khang bzangs kyi cha khab la 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang sbyin par langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bza
190b8(mdo sde): te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ smras pa/ grogs po tshigs su bcad pa de
191a1(mdo sde): las / tshang par smros shig dang / bdag gis slob ma bgyis te mnyan no// rgya byin gyis smras pa/ khyod kyis bdag gi slob ma
191a2(mdo sde): byas pa ci la phan/ bdag ni bkres shing skom pas gzir te/ tsi to la med pa'i bla zhing 'dug go// byang chub sems dpa' sbas pa grogs po tshig su
191a3(mdo sde): bcad pa chad par smros shig dang / bdag gis khyod kha zas kyis tshim par bya'o// lha'i dbang po rgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can gyis smras pa/ grogs
191a4(mdo sde): po khyod kyis nga kha zas kyis tshims par byed nus nga'i zas dang skom ji lta bu yin pa de ni/ khyod kyis sbyin par bya'o// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khyod
191a5(mdo sde): kyi zas dang skom ci yan/ des smras pa/ mi 'phral du bsad pa'i sha dron po ni za khrag dron po ni 'thung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' bsams pa/ de
191a6(mdo sde): lta bu'i sha khrag ni gsad par ma byas kyis bar du mi snyed la/ bdag gisi legs par smras pa'i don gyis phyir sems can gzhan su la yang gnod pa byed mi
191a7(mdo sde): phod do snyam nas/ smras pa/ gal te bdag gi sha khrag khyod za zhing 'thung na ni/ grogs bdag gis sbyin nus ches kyis/ tshigs su bcad pa tshang bar spros
191a8(mdo sde): shig dang / legs par smras pa'i don gyis phyir/ bdag gis khyod la rang gi sha khrag sbyin no// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshigs su bcad pa tsha
191b1(mdo sde): bar smras pa/ kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag/ skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin// skyes nas 'gag par 'gyur ba ste// de dag nye bar zhi ba bde//
191b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i tshigs su bcad pa tshang ba de gus par mnos nas/ yun ring mo zhig du kha ton du spangs nas/ bsams pa/ 'di ni mya ngan
191b3(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i grong khyer gyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sgo yin no// 'di ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer gyi lam yin no// lam 'dis yang dag
191b4(mdo sde): par rdzogs sangs rgyas thams cad nges par 'byung ngo // snyam nas mtshon cha rnon po blangs te smras pa/ grogs po legs par smras pa'i don gyis phyir
191b5(mdo sde): yon bzhes sheg ces byas nas/ brang gi phyogs cig nas sha bcad te/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs la byin te/ lha'i dbang po rgya
191b6(mdo sde): byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs la byin te/ smras pa/ grogs pa 'drangs sam/ des smras pa/ ma 'drangs so// de bzhin du brang gi phyogs
191b7(mdo sde): yang cig nas bcad de byin no// de bzhin du dpung pa'i sha rnams nas lus thams cad kyi sha bcad cing bcad cing byin nas smras pa/ grogs po
191b8(mdo sde): 'drangs sam/ des smras pa/ dam 'drangs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bsams pa/ de ni lus ril gyis yongs su btang ba'i dus kho
192a1(mdo sde): las brgyag nal bab bo snyam nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab te/ skye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na
192a2(mdo sde): bdag 'jig rten long ba/ 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde
192a3(mdo sde): bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyis ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
192a4(mdo sde): gyur cig ces byas nas/ tshig su bcad de smras pa/ sbyin pa chen por gyur pa 'dis yis na/ srid pa dag tu rang byung sangs rgyas shog/ sngon gyi rgyal dbang rnam
192a5(mdo sde): kyis ma bsgral ba'i// skye bo phal chen rgal nas bsgral bar gyi// de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub smon lam btab nas/ smras pa/
192a6(mdo sde): grogs po bdag gi lus 'di ci dga' bar gyis shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpas sems bskyed ma thag tu sa rnam drug du g.yos so// na mkha' la
192a7(mdo sde): 'khod pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang me tog gi char phab nas/ legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ grogs po legs so legs so// khyod kyis mchog tu dka' ba'i las
192a8(mdo sde): byas so zhes mdzer to// de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis bsams pa/ grogs po legs so legs so// khyod kyis mchog tu dka' ba'i las byas so zhes
192b1(mdo sde): mdzad to// de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis bsams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dis mchog tu dka' bar byas te/ bdag gis 'di'i lus snga mkhon
192b2(mdo sde): bzhin du bsgyur bar nus mod kyi// 'on kyang bdag gis 'di kyi spro ba chod zin par bskyed dgos so snyam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ grogs po
192b3(mdo sde): khyod sha rnams gcod cing rgyus pa dang rtsa breng rnams gseb na/ sems mi dga' cung zad tsam ma skyes sam// byang chub sems dpa' sa smras pa grogs po
192b4(mdo sde): khyod sha rnams bcod cing rgyus pa dang / rtsa breng breng rnams gseb na/ sems mi dga' cung zad kyang ma skyes kyi bdag gi sdug bsngal myong ba na/ sems
192b5(mdo sde): can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang / yi dgas su skyes pa'i sems can rnams 'ba' shig la snying rje'i dbang du gyur to// lha'i dbang po rgya byin mi ma yin
192b6(mdo sde): pa'i cha lugs kyis smras pa/ grogs po kha khyod de las su zhig yid ches/ byang chub sems dpa' smras pa/ bdag gis khyod la bden pa bskul ba
192b7(mdo sde): de lta bus yid ches par bstan to// rgya byin gyis smras pa/ de ltar khyod kyis bden pas skul bar chad nas/ je khyod bdag gi lus 'di bden pa
192b8(mdo sde): bskul bas snga ma kho bzhin du gyur cig/ de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' las smras pa/ bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis
193a1(mdo sde): las brgya'adi ltar bdag gi sha rnams bcod cing rgyus pa dang / rtsa brang breng rnams gseb na/ sems can cung zad kyang mi dga' ba
193a2(mdo sde): ma skyes te/ bdag gdag gi sdug bsngal myong ba na/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yid dgas su skyes pa'i sems can rnams 'ba' shig
193a3(mdo sde): la snying rje'i dbang du gyur na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi lus 'di snga ma kho bzhin du gyur cig ces byas so// de skad ces brjod ma thag tu
193a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i lus snga 'khon bzhin du gyur to// de nas de mthong ma thag tu lha'i dbang po rgya byin yid rangs te/ cha lugs de med par byas nas/
193a5(mdo sde): rang bzhin gyi gzugasu bsgyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas// smras pa bdag gis khyod la gnod pa'i bsams pas mi dga'
193a6(mdo sde): bar byas par ma yin gyi/ khyod nyid kyi spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ bdag gis khyod mi dga' bar byas par zad do// khyod nyid kyi spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir/
193a7(mdo sde): bdag gis khyod mi dga' bar byas par zad do// khyod kyi brtson 'grus 'dra ba dang / spro ba 'di 'dra ba las na/ gdon mi za ba khyod yang dag par
193a8(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i 'tshang rgya ba 'gyur gyis/ de'i tshe dran par mdzod cig/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la bzod pa gsol
193b1(mdo sde): nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// dge slong dag ji snyams du sems/ de'i tshe rgyal po shi bar gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa
193b2(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/ de'i yang nga legs par smra ba smra ba dang / legs par smra bar 'dod par gyur na/ da ltar de bzhin gshegs par gyur
193b3(mdo sde): pa na/ legs par smra ba smra bar 'dod pa ci te mi mdzad/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag da ni chos rnams dang po byed pa'i yin pa'i phyir ro// /
193b4(mdo sde): shi bi gnyis pa ni/ gtan tshigs dang / sngon gyis rgyud snga ma dang 'dra ba las/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ khyod
193b5(mdo sde): kyis bdag gi slob ma byas pa ci la phan pa/ khyod kyis bdag gi slob ma byas phan pa/ nga khyod la gnod pa zhig zer gyis/ gal te gnod pa de khyod
193b6(mdo sde): gyis byed phod na ni de'i 'og tu tshig su bcad pa de ngas khyod la brjod par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' smras pa/ grogs po tshigs su bcad pa de je
193b7(mdo sde): brjod cig dang / khyod kyis bdag la gnod pa byed du bcug pa de dag thams cad bdag gis bgyi'o// grogs po tshigs bcad pa de tshang bar smos
193b8(mdo sde): shig/ de skad ces spras ma thag tu/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du tshigs su bcad pa de tshang bar brjod do// de nas/
194a1(mdo sde): las pa #byang chub sems dpas bla gos phrag pa cig tu bzar nas/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can ga la ba de logs
194a2(mdo sde): su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ tshigs su bcad pa de tshangs par mnos te/ yun ring po zhig du kha ton spangs nas/ khab sor bzhi pa stong pa shing leb la btsugs
194a3(mdo sde): pa de lta bu'i shi leb gnyis bar du bdag nyid nyal te 'chir bar byed do// de de na 'dug bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab te/
194a4(mdo sde): skye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa/ ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig
194a5(mdo sde): pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs
194a6(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas nas/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sbyin pa chen por gyur pa 'di yis ni/ srid pa dag tu rab byung sangs rgyas shog
194a7(mdo sde): sngon gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyis ma sprul ba'i// skye bo phal chen rgal nas bsgral bar bgyi// de nas shing leb gyi bar du btsir ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i lus
194a8(mdo sde): thams cad las khrag 'bab par gyur nas/ sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// nam mkha' la 'khod pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang me tog gi char phab nas legs so//
194b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba 'byin no// lhag ma rnam ni shi 'i gtam rgyud snga ma bzhin du bden pas bskul nas/ lus snga mkho bzhin du sor chud par gyur pa'i bar du 'dzod
194b2(mdo sde): par bya'o// // ko'u sha bi zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ko'u sha ma bi na/ khyim bdag mdangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug
194b3(mdo sde): te/ de'i tshe ko'u sham bi na ko'u sham pa'i dge slong ma rungs pa'i mthu rtsal che ba mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa/ rtsa mdzad
194b4(mdo sde): che ba/ g.yog 'khor mang ba zhig gnas te/ de'i de'i dge slong grogs mang po gzhan dag kyang yod la/ de dag kyang ma rungs pa/ mthu rtsal che
194b5(mdo sde): ba/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa/ rtsa 'jing che ba/ g.yog 'khor mang ba sha stag go// yul yangs pa can gyi dge
194b6(mdo sde): slong zhing gis kyang / yul ko'u sham pa ri 'ongs te/ de yang ma rungs pa/ mthu rtsal che ba/ mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo/
194b7(mdo sde): 'dzin pa rtsa mjid che ba/ g.yog 'khor mang ba zhig yin la/ de'i dge slong grogs po mang po// gzhan dag kyang yod la/ de dag kyang ma rungs
194b8(mdo sde): pa/ mthu rtsal che ba/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa/ rtsa 'jing che ba/ g.yog 'khor mang ba sha stag go
195a1(mdo sde): las lan@de nas de dag dbyar gnas bcas nas/ nang khrims bcas nas/ nang khrims bcas te/ bdag cag gi nang nas gang gis chur stong pa
195a2(mdo sde): ci yang med pa/ chu med pa mthong na/ de nyid kyis dgang bar bya'o// yang na yo byad kyi zhal ta byed pa la bsten par bya'o// bdag gis kyang ma bkang / yo byad kyi zham
195a3(mdo sde): khyad pa la yang ma sbran na/ de bdag cag gis de bdag cag gis gzhi de las nyes pa 'chags su gzhug go zhes zer ro// de nas der dbyar gnas bcas pa rnams
195a4(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i gtam gtan la 'bebs na/ tshig rtsub pos 'dres nas cig la gcig grags 'ba' shig lta zhing 'khod do// de'i tshe khyim bdag gcig gis sangs rgyas
195a5(mdo sde): la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du bshos la spyan drangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong mang pos zham ring byas te/ khyim bdag de'i khyim du gshegs so//
195a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gshegs nas/ yangs pa can gyi dge slong de khung sar song ste// bkru bshal byas nas/ chu ra'i nang du chu nyung ngu zhig las ma lus par mthong
195a7(mdo sde): nas/ bsams pa/ dge slong thams cad dong zin pas/ da ni su yang chab khung sar 'gro bar med kyis/ bdag gis chur 'di rang gis dag gang bar yang mi dgos
195a8(mdo sde): so// yo byad kyi zhal ta byed pa la sgran yang mi dgos snyam nas/ des chu nyung ngu bzhin bor te song nas/ ring zhig lon pa'i 'og tu/ ko'u sham pa'i dge slong de cha
195b1(mdo sde): khung sar 'gro bar chas pa las des ltas na/ chu ra'i nang du chu nyu du zhig las med pa mthong nas// des kyang sngar yangs pa can gyi dge slong des bkru bshal byas
195b2(mdo sde): nas song ba mthong nas/ des bsams pa dge slong 'di ni las rnam gnyis byed par 'gyur te/ yang na ni bdag nyid kyis chur 'gengs par byed par 'gyur ro// /
195b3(mdo sde): yang na ni yo byad kyi zhal ta byed pa la sbron par byed do snyam nas/ de la sdod cing 'dug go// de nas de la lhan cig 'khod pa'i slob ma rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan/
195b4(mdo sde): po dge slong thams cad ni dong lags na/ khyod 'di ni tsi las bzhes/ des smras pa/ bkru bshal bya bar 'dod de/ yangs pa can gyi dge slong des bkra bshal
195b5(mdo sde): byas te song ba las nas/ de 'ongs te yang na ni kho bdag gis chu ra 'gengs par 'gyur ro// yang na ni yo byad kyi zhal ta byed pa la sbron par 'gyur ro// de dag gis
195b6(mdo sde): smras pa/ mkhan po de 'khor dang bcas pa ni dong lags gyis/ 'dir ma bzhes shing / de nas des chu ra de dge slong rnams la bstan te/ khyed ltos shig
195b7(mdo sde): chu 'di tsam gyis bkru bshal byar rung ngam/ de dag gis smras pa/ mkhan po khyod kyis 'di na chur na chu med do zhes/ de nyi tshe zhig gsungs shig dang / bdag
195b8(mdo sde): cag gis khyod kyi 'jing dang / mthu dang grogs bgyi'o// zhes byas nas dong ngo // yangs pa can gyi dge slong de yang 'gyod pa skyes nas/ de nas lhan cig gam
196a1(mdo sde): las ba6/ pa'i slob ma rnams la smras pa/ kye bdag gis 'dir bsku ba shal byas pa las chu ra'i nang na chu nyung shas shig las ma lus
196a2(mdo sde): bzhin du bor te/ 'ongs la dge 'dun gyi nang khrims bcas pa ni yang na bdag nyid kyis dgang bar bya ba dang / yang na yo byad kyi zhal ta byed pa la spyan dgos pa
196a3(mdo sde): yin na/ de bdag rang gis kyang ma bkang la/ yo byad kyi zhal ta byed pa la yang ma sbran na/ bdag 'dir 'ongs pa'i 'og tu dge slong 'ga' zhig bkru bshal byed
196a4(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur grang ba zhes byas so// de nas de dag gis smras pa/ mkhan po khyod kyis 'di skad du de'i nang na chu'i yod do zhes de nyi tshe zhig gsungs shig dang /
196a5(mdo sde): bdag cag gis khyod kyi 'jing dang / mthu dang grogs bgyi'o// zhes byas nas/ de nas de dag khyim der dzan zos nas phyir dong ngo // de dag gis nas ko'u
196a6(mdo sde): sham mi ba rnams kyis bsams pa/ yangs pa can gyi dge slong des/ dge 'dun gyi nang khrims las 'gal bar byas kyis/ des nyes pa byas pa'i phyir/
196a7(mdo sde): bdag gcag gis nyes pa 'chags su bzhug go snyam de/ bdan bshams nas/ 'gan te brdungs te/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing 'khod par
196a8(mdo sde): gyur nas/ ko'u sham bi'i dge slong des yangs pa can gyi dge slong de la glengs pa dang / des smras pa dang / de'i nang na chu yod do// des smras pa/ chu de
196b1(mdo sde): rjes su 'brang ba dang / dkar bas bcad pa'i
196b2(mdo sde): tsam gyis bkru bshal byar chog gam zhes byas nas/ de dag gis de la yus med par bsnyen pa'i phyir dgar ba'i las byas so// de nas yangs pa can
196b3(mdo sde): gyi dge slong de dag gis las de bshig ste/ gyes nas gso sbyongs gis las log shig tu byas so// de nas gzhi de dag 'thab pa dang / 'tshang 'dru
196b4(mdo sde): ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod par 'gyur nas/ de dag 'thabs shing mtshangs grus la bkye zhing brtsad nas 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
196b5(mdo sde): dgar bas bcad pa'i dge slong dang / dgar bas bcad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams bkug nas bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag khyed 'thabs te/
196b6(mdo sde): 'tshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la rtsod par gyur pa bden naMs/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lagaso// bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed thabs de/
196b7(mdo sde): mtshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la/ rtsod cing ma 'khod cig/ dge slong dag khyed 'thabs te/ mtshang 'dru zhing 'gyed pa la rtsod cing 'khod na ni/ dge ba'i
196b8(mdo sde): chos rnams 'grib par 'gyur gyis/ 'phel bar mi 'gyur bar rig par gyis shig/ dge slong dag khyed mi 'thab ste/ mtshang mi 'dru zhing mi 'gyed
196b9(mdo sde): la/ mi rtsod par 'khod na ni/ dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel bar 'ba' shig tu 'gyur gyi/ 'grib par mi 'gyur bar rig par gyis shig/ dge
197a1(mdo sde): las la slong dag gzhan yang dag rabs gcad pa'i dge slong gis ni 'di ltar bya dgos te/ dgar bas bcad pa'i dge slong
197a2(mdo sde): ni ma rungs pa/ mthu rtsal che ba/ mdo sde 'dzin pa 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa/ rtsa 'jing che ba/ g.yog 'khor mang ba yin la/
197a3(mdo sde): dge slong grogs po mang po gzhan dag kyang ma rung ba/ mthu rtsal che ba/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa/ rtsa 'dzin
197a4(mdo sde): che ba/ g.yog 'khor mang ba yin na/ de dag gis bdag la 'dod pa yin pas gleng bar byed la/ 'dod pa ma yin pas dran par byed kyis/ bdag gis
197a5(mdo sde): kyang de dag gis nyes pa gleng ba de/ chos bzhin du mnyan par mi bya'o// de dag gis bdag kyang mi snang bar dgar bar byed de/ phyir bcos su med pa dang / phyir
197a6(mdo sde): 'byung du med pa'i lta bas dgar bar byed do// gzhi des na dge 'dun gyis 'thab mo dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'gyed pa dang rtsod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam du rig
197a7(mdo sde): nas/ glengs pa'i dge slong gis nyes pa bzhin du phyir bcos na ni legs/ de ltar phyir bcom na 'gal bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgar bar
197a8(mdo sde): bcad pa'i dge slong dang / dgar bas bcad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / dgar bas bcad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams btang nas/ dgar bar byed pa'i dge slong
197b1(mdo sde): dang / dgar bar byed pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / dgar bar byed pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams bkug nas/ bka' stsal pa/ dge slong khyod 'thabs te/
197b2(mdo sde): mtshang 'dru zhing 'gyed pa la rtsod par gyur pa bden nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lags so// bka' stsal pa dge slong dag khyod 'thab ste/
197b3(mdo sde): mtshang 'gyed pa la brtson cing ma 'khod cig/ dge slong dag khyed 'thabs te/ mtshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la rtsod cing 'khod na ni dge ba'i chos rnams 'grib par
197b4(mdo sde): 'gyur gyi/ 'phel bar mi 'gyur bar rig par gyis shig/ dge slong khyod mi 'thab ste/ 'tshang mi 'dru zhing mi 'gyed la/ mi brtsod par 'khod na ni dge
197b5(mdo sde): ba'i chos rnams 'phel ba 'ba' shig tu 'gyur gyi// 'grib par mi 'gyur bar rig par gyis shig/ dge slong dag bzhan yang dag ri byed pa'i dge slong gis
197b6(mdo sde): ni/ 'di ltar bya dgos te/ dgar bar byed pa'i dge slong ni ma rungs pa/ mthu rtsal che ba/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa ma mo 'dzin pa/
197b7(mdo sde): mjing che ba/ g.yog 'khor mang ba yin pa/ dge slong grogs po mang po gzhan dag kyang ma rungs pa/ mthu rtsal che ba mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin
197b8(mdo sde): kha/ ma mo 'dzin pa/ rtsa 'jing che ba/ g.yog 'khor mang ba yin te/ bdag gis de la 'dod pa ma yin pas gleng ba byas/ 'dod pa ma yin pas dran par
198a1(mdo sde): bka byas byas na/ gdes nyes pa'i chos bzhin du mnyan par mi byed na/ de dag gis mi snang bar byas te/ gzhi ngas na dge 'dun gyi 'thab mongs
198a2(mdo sde): mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'gyed pa dang rtsod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas/ 'dod pa ma yin pas gleng bar ma byed gcig/ 'dod pa ma yin pas dran par ma byed cig/
198a3(mdo sde): gal te/ 'dod pa ma yin pas gleng bar byed na 'gal bar 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal kyang / de bzhin nu 'thab cing 'tshang
198a4(mdo sde): 'drul 'gyed cing gcod de 'khod nas/ da rung yang gso sbyong byas par mi rtsi nas/ skabs kyi gtam de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas/
198a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis dgar bas bcad pa'i dge slong dang / dgar bas bcad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / dgar bas bcad pa'i rjes su 'dra ba rnams bkug nas/
198a6(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed 'thabs te/ mtshang 'bru zhing 'gyed la rtsod cing / ma 'khod cig ngas bsgo yang de bzhin khyed 'thabs te/ mtshang 'dru zhing
198a7(mdo sde): 'gyed la rtsod cing 'khod do// da dung yang gso sbyong byas par mi rtsi ba bden nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das med lags so// bka' stsal pa dge slong dag
198a8(mdo sde): khyed 'thabs te/ mtshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la rtsod par ma byed cig/ dge slong dag khyed 'thabs te/ 'tshang 'dru zhing 'gyed pa la brtsod cing 'khod na ni/ gso sbyo
198b1(mdo sde): byed dam/ skabs 'byed pa'i las byed dam/ gsol ba dang / gnyis kyi las byed dam/ gsol pa dang / gzhi'i byed kyang rung ste/ las de dag 'jig
198b2(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/ gzhag dgos pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong khyed ni de dag tha dad par byed la/ de dag kyang khyed las tha dad par byed pa'i phyir ro// /
198b3(mdo sde): dge slong dag tha dad par gnas pa ni 'di nyis yin te/ gang bdag nyid kyis bdag tha dad par gnas par 'dogs pa dang / gang dge 'dun 'thun pas tha dad par
198b4(mdo sde): gnas 'dogs pa'o// de la dge slong bdag gis bdag tha dad par 'dogs par ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di ltar dge slong gis shes bzhin du chos bzhin gyi phyogs
198b5(mdo sde): la/ chos bzhin ma yin pa'i phyogs yin par 'jog pa de lta bu ni/ bdag gis bdag tha dad par gnas par 'dogs pa yin no// dge 'dun gyi chos bzhin
198b6(mdo sde): du tha dad par 'dogs pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong mi snang bar dgar byas te/ phyir bcos su med pa dang / phyir dbyung du med pa'i sdig pa
198b7(mdo sde): lta bas dgar bar byed pa ste/ de lta bu ni dge 'dun gyis tha dad par gnas par 'dogs pa yin no// dge slong dag lhan gcig tu gnas pas ni 'di gnyis
198b8(mdo sde): yin te/ gang gis bdag lhan gcig tu gnas par 'dogs pa dang / gang dge 'dun gyis bzhin du lhan gcig tu gnas par 'dogs pa'o// de la bdag
199a1(mdo sde): las chagis bdag la lhan cig tu gnas par 'dogs pa/ ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di ltar dge slong gis shes bzhin du chos bzhin ma yin la'i srog latsham
199a2(mdo sde): gyi phyogs yin par 'jog pa ste/ de lta bu bdag gis bdag lhan cig tu gnas par 'dogs pa yin no// dge 'dun gyis chos bzhin du lhan gcig tu gnas par
199a3(mdo sde): 'dogs pa ji lta bu ni dge 'dun gyis chos bzhin du lhan gcig tu gnas par 'dogs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgar bar bcad pa'i dge slong dang dgar bas
199a4(mdo sde): bcad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / dgar bas bcad pa'i rjes su 'brang rnams btang nas/ dgar bar bya ba'i dge slong dang blar byed pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / dgar khas byed pa'i rjesu 'ang
199a5(mdo sde): ba rnams bkug nas/ bka' stsal pa/ dge slong khyed 'thabs te/ mtshangs dru zhing 'gyed la brtsod cing ma 'khod cig ces ngas bsgo yang / de bzhin du khyed la
199a6(mdo sde): te/ mtshang 'dru zhing 'khod la rtsod cing 'khod do// da dung yang gso sbyong byas par sa la gso sbyong byas par mi bden nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang
199a7(mdo sde): lags so// zhes bya ba nas/ de lta bu ni dge 'dun gyis chos bzhin du lhan cig tu gnas par 'dogs pa'o// zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin sbyar ro// de
199a8(mdo sde): ltar de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du 'thab cing mtshang 'dru la/ 'gyed cing btsod de 'khod do// de nas khyim bdag gcig gis
199b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das logs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du bshos la spyan drangs nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dag der dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan
199b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis yo byad bzhal ta byed pa la/ bshos 'dir drongs shog ces bka' stsal te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rnams pa lnga'i phyir yo byad kyi
199b3(mdo sde): zhal ta byed pa la bshos len tu 'jug par mdzad de/ nang du yang dag par 'jog par bzhed pa dang / lha rnams la chos ston par bzhed pa dang / nad pa la gzigs
199b4(mdo sde): par bzhed pa dang / mal stan la gzigs par bzhed pa dang / nyan thos rnams la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa rnams kyi phyir ro// skabs 'dir ni
199b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'dul ba la/ slabs pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa'i phyar yo byad tu byed pa la shos len tu btang ngo // de nas dge slong mang po khyim der dong
199b6(mdo sde): ba rnams mal bstan las khod nas 'thabs te/ mtshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la/ brtsod par gyur to// de dag 'thab ste/ mtshang 'dru zhing 'gyed pa la rtsod cing
199b7(mdo sde): 'khod do// 'tshams pa yang ma yin pa'i ngag gis las byed cing 'khod la ji rtsa ma ni rdeg par yang byed do// de nas bshos len du song bas bshos blangs nas
199b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la de song ste/ phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs cig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das
200a1(mdo sde): las bcagakyi bshos len pa'i dge slong de la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong ci dge slong gi dge 'dun kha zas blos tshim par gyur/ gsol pa/
200a2(mdo sde): brdzun pa de ni lags te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun kha zas bzang pos ni tshim par gyur lags na/ btsun pa 'on kyang dge slong mang po khyim der mchis pa rnams
200a3(mdo sde): 'thabs te/ mtshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la brtsod par gyur to// de dag mtshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la brtsod cing 'khod de/ 'tsham pa ma lags pa'i lus kyi las
200a4(mdo sde): dang / mtsham pa ma lags pa'i ngag gi las bgyid cing mchis la ji tsam na rdeg par/ yang bgyid do zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshos
200a5(mdo sde): gsol nas/ gtsug lag khang phyi rol tu zhabs bkrus te/ nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i phyir/ gtsug lag khang gi nang du gshegs so// de nas bcom
200a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das phye ma red de nang du yang dag 'jog las zhes nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la bdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// gdan bshams pa la
200a7(mdo sde): bzhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal kyang / dge slong dag khyed khyim der dong ba rnams 'thab te/ 'tshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la
200a8(mdo sde): rtsod par gyur nas khyed 'thab ste/ mtshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la rtsod cing 'khod de/ 'tsham pa ma yin pa'i lus kyi la dang / 'tsham ma ma yin pa'i ngag gis las
200b1(mdo sde): gis las byed cing 'khod la/ ji tsam na rdeg par yang byed pa bden nam/ btsun pa ma lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka'
200b2(mdo sde): stsal pa/ khrim der dong ba'i dge slong sde sder chad pa rnams la khrims su byas pa'i chos rnams ngas bcas par byas te/ dge slong sde sder chad pa rnams kyis rtsod
200b3(mdo sde): pa'i bcugs kyis gnas so so spongs shig/ dge slong tha mal par 'dug pa rnams dang / nyin par yang rung / mtshan mo yang rung / nang par yang rung //
200b4(mdo sde): dro la yang rung ste/ gtsug lag khang gcig gam/ dgon pa 'am/ grong med pa gcig tu gnas par ma byed cig/ lhan gcig tu yang gnas par ma
200b5(mdo sde): byed cig/ lam gcig tu yang ma 'grogs shig/ brda yang ma byed cig/ brda skad kyang ma len cig/ tha mal bar gnas pa'i brtsod pa'i gcugs
200b6(mdo sde): te khong du chud nas/ chos bzhin dang / 'dul ba bzhin du bar byed nus la ston pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir/ 'thun pa'i byed nus na ni/ zhi bar byed
200b7(mdo sde): pa'i thabs dag cing / 'dul ba dang 'thun pa'i gcig gis rtsod pa'i gcugs de zhi bar byas pa zhes par byas so// las brgya pa las sdom gyi tshig sa
200b8(mdo sde): bcad pa bcu rngog s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ lo ka prad nya ba te/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten
201a1(mdo sde): 1/ gdags pa bam po dang go/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sbom ni'i rnams dang ni rgya mtsho dang / @/
201a2(mdo sde): song rnams dang gling shing dang / klu rgyal dang ni nam mkha' ldi // rgyal chen ba'i dang 'dun sa rnams/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom
201a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rbalta bu bred kyi cha la mgon med zas sprin gyi kun dga' na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la
201a4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'jig rten gyis khams gsum po 'di dag yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
201a5(mdo sde): dang / stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams so// stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
201a6(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ ji tsam du stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ nyi ma rnam par snang ba rnams kun tu 'khor zhing phyogs snang bar byed pa/ ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyis yin te//
201a7(mdo sde): zla ba zang dang / nyi ma snying dang / ri'i rgyal pa ri rab stong dang / shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang / lha'i 'dzam bu'i grong stong dang / nub kyi ba lang thung stong byung gi
201a8(mdo sde): sgra mi mnyan stong dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i stong dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa stong dang / 'thab bral stong dang / dga' ldan stong dang / 'phrul dga' stong nga/
201b1(mdo sde): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed stong dang / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong de/ dge slong dag 'di ni stong spyi phud gyi 'jig rten gyi khams shes bya'o// stong gnyis pa'i bar
201b2(mdo sde): ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhe na// stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong gang yin pa de ni/ stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyis khams shes bya'o//
201b3(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhe na/ dge slong dag stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten khams stong pa gang yin pa de ni/ stong gsum gyi stong
201b4(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams shes bya'o// dge slong dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de lta bur/ shar phyogs su mtha' yas mu med de/
201b5(mdo sde): 'jig pa 'am/ zhig par gnas la/ 'chags par gnas te/ gzhan 'jig cing gzhan zhig par gnas la/ gzhan 'chags shing / gzhan 'chags par
201b6(mdo sde): gnas so// dge slong dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de lta bu dag/ lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs su mtha' yas mu med de/ 'jig
201b7(mdo sde): pa 'am/ zhig par gnas la/ 'chags pa 'am/ chags par gnas te/ gzhan 'jig cing / gzhig par gnas la/ gzhan chags shing / gzhan 'cha
201b8(mdo sde): par gnas so// dge slong dag dper na/ bar snang la char ba'i rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam 'bab la/ chu'i rgyun rnams rab tu 'bab pa na/ mtshams sam/
202a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten#bar chad med par de bzhin du/ dge slong dag ngas lha'i mig rnam par dag par mi las 'das pas shar phyogs su stong gsum gyi stong
202a2(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de lta bu/ mtha' yas med de/ 'jig pa 'am/ zhig par gnas pa/ 'chags pa 'am/ 'chags par gnas te/ gzhan
202a3(mdo sde): 'jig cing / gzhan 'jig par gnas la gzhan 'chags shing / gzhan 'chags glanas par/ de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs su yang sto
202a4(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de snyed mtha' yas mu med de/ 'jig pa 'am/ zhig par gnas la/ 'chags pa 'am/ ma chags par gnas
202a5(mdo sde): te/ gzhan 'jig cing / gzhan zhig par gnas la/ gzhan 'chags shing / gzhan chags par gnas pa dag kyang / mthong ngo zhes bka' stsal pa nas/
202a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag par 'jog pa'i phyir/ gnas khang gi nang du gshegs so// de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'khor de nyid
202a7(mdo sde): kyi nang na 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ dge slong rnams la smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa dag ci tsam du
202a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa dang / 'di ltar shing rta'i srog shing gi dpes bstan pa 'di ni legs te ngo mtshar to// de la stong chung ngu'i 'jig
202b1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams na ri chen po nyi stong yod de/ ri'i rgyal po re rab khor khor yug stong ngo // stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rgya mtsho chen po nye stong yod de//
202b2(mdo sde): nang gi rgya mtsho chen po stong dang / phyi rol gyi rgya mtsho chen po stong ngo // stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na ngan song sum stong yod de/ sems can dmyal ba
202b3(mdo sde): dang / nga chung du 'jig rten gyi khams/ chen pa yang ya / kyims 'dags dang // 'das bu 'ardza
202b4(mdo sde): dang / nub kyi ba lang spong stong dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan stong dang / stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten khams na/ shing ljon pa chen po bzhi stong yod do// lho'i 'dzam bu'i
202b5(mdo sde): gling pa'i 'dzam bu'i shing ljon pa stong dang / rgya'i mtsho'i 'gram gyi shal ma li mthon po tong dang / lha ma yin gyi ris kyi ci pra pa ta li stong dang / sum bcu rtsa
202b6(mdo sde): bsum pa'i brtol stong ngo // stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ klu'i rigs bzhi stong yod de/ klu'i rigs sgo nga las skyes pa stong dang / mngal nas skyes
202b7(mdo sde): pa stong dang / drod gsher las skyes pa stong dang / rdzus te skyes pa stong dang / stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ nam mkha' lding gi rigs bzhi stong yod
202b8(mdo sde): de/ na mkha' lding gi rigs sgo nga las skyes pa stong dang / mngal nas skyes pa stong dang / drod gsher las skyes pa stong dang / brdzus ste skyes pa stong ngo // stong /
203a1(mdo sde): rig rten#chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rgyal po chen po bzhi stong yod de// yul 'khor srung stong dang / 'phags skyes po stong
203a2(mdo sde): dang / mig mi bzang stong dang / rnam thos kyi bu stong ngo // stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 'gro ba lnga po stong yod de/ sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro
203a3(mdo sde): ba stong dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / lha dang mi'i 'gro ba stong yod do// stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 'dun sa chen po nyi stong yod do//
203a4(mdo sde): lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs stong dang / lha ma yin gyi 'dun sa chos bzangs zhes bya ba stong 'jig rten gdags pa/ las tshigs dang po'o// // sdom ni
203a5(mdo sde): skye dang ri dang mtsho rnams dang / de bzhin sems can dmyal brgyad gzhan// sems can gnas dgu rab tu bshad// las lam bcu po de bzhin no// stong
203a6(mdo sde): chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 'dod par skye ba gsum yod de/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'dod pa nye bar gnas pa dang / ldan pa'i sems can dag yod de/
203a7(mdo sde): de dag ni nye bar gnas pa'i 'dod pa rnams la bdag por dbang byed te/ 'di lta te/ mi rnams dang / lha kha cig ste/ 'di ni 'dod par skye ba dang po'o//
203a8(mdo sde): 'dod pa sprul pa dang ldan pa'i sems can dag yod de/ de dag ni sprul pa'i 'dod pa rnams la bdag por dbang byed de// 'di lta ste/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnam
203b1(mdo sde): che/ 'di ni 'dod par skyes pa gnyis pa'o// gzhan gyis sprul pa'i 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems can dag yod de/ de dag ni gzhan gyis sprul pa'i 'dod pa rnam
203b2(mdo sde): la bdag por dbang byed de/ 'di lta ste/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams te/ 'dod par skye ba gsum pa'o// stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
203b3(mdo sde): na/ bde bar skye ba gsum yod de/ sems can gang dag lus 'di nyid la dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bas brlan par byed/ yongasu brlan
203b4(mdo sde): par byed/ yongs su tshim par byed cing / yongs su khyab par byed pa dag yod do// de dag lus 'di nyid la dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde
203b5(mdo sde): bde bas brlan par byed/ yongs su brlan par byas yongs su tshim par byas/ yongs su khyab par byas nas// bde bar reg pa la gnas so// de dag bde
203b6(mdo sde): ba de dang / bde ba la gnas pa des/ tshe ring zhing yun ring por gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams te/ 'di ni bde bar skye ba dang po'o//
203b7(mdo sde): sems can gang dag lus 'di nyid la/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde bas brlan par byed/ yongs su brlan par byed/ yongs su
203b8(mdo sde): tshim par byed cing / yongs su khyab par byed pa dag pa dag yod do// de dag lus 'di nyid la ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde bas/
204a1(mdo sde): jigazhen/ brlan par byas/ yongs su tshim par byas/ yongs su khyab par byas nas/ bde bar reg pa la gnas so// de dag bde ba
204a2(mdo sde): de dang / bde ba la gnas pa des/ tshe ring zhing yun ring por gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ 'od gsal gyis lha rnams so// 'di ni bde bar skye ba gnyis pa'o// sems can
204a3(mdo sde): gang dag lus 'di nyid la dga' ba med pa'i bde bas brlan par byed/ yongs su brlan par byed/ yongs su tshim par byed cing / yongs su khyab par byed pa dag yod do// /
204a4(mdo sde): de dag lus 'di nyid la dga' ba med pa'i bde bas brlan par byas/ yongs su brlan par byas/ yongs su tshim par byas yongs su khyab par byas nas/ bde bar
204a5(mdo sde): reg par gnas so// de dag bde ba de dang / bde ba la gnas pa des/ tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas ste/ 'di lta ste/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams te/ 'di ni bde
204a6(mdo sde): bar skyes pa gsum pa'o// stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gser gyi ri chen po bdun stong yod de/ ri'i rgyal po gnya' shing 'dzan stong dang / gshos mda'
204a7(mdo sde): 'dzin stong dang / seng lteng can stong dang / blta na sdug stong dang / ta na ri stong dang / mu khyud 'dzin stong dang / ra'i rgyal po rnam par bdud stong ngo // stong chung ngu'i
204a8(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams na/ mtshe chen po bdun stong yod de/ gnya shing 'dzin gyi mchod stong dang / gshol mang 'dzin gyi stong dang / seng ldeng can gyi stong dang blta na sngas
204b1(mdo sde): gi stong dang / rta na ri stong dang / mu khyud 'dzin gyi stong dang / rnam par 'dud kyi mtsho stong ngo // stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems dmyal ba chen po
204b2(mdo sde): brgyad stong yod de/ sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos stong dang / thig nag stong dang / bsdus gzhom stong dang / ngu 'bod stong dang / ngu 'bod chen po stong
204b3(mdo sde): dang / tsha ba stong dang / rab tu tsha ba stong dang / sems can dmyal ba gnar med stong ngo / stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can gyi gnas dgu stong
204b4(mdo sde): yod de/ sems can gzugs yod la lus tha dad cing / 'du shes tha dad pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ mi rnams dang / lha kha cig ste 'di ni sems can
204b5(mdo sde): gyi gnas dang po'o// sems can gzugs yod la lus tha dad pa la/ 'du shes gcig pa dag pa yod de/ 'di lta ste/ tshangs ris kyi lha dang po byung ba gang
204b6(mdo sde): yin pa de/ 'di ni sems can gyi gnas gnyis po'o// sems can gyis gzugs yod pa/ lus gcig pa la 'du shes tha dad pa dag yod de// 'di lta ste/
204b7(mdo sde): 'od gsal gyi lha rnams te/ 'di ni sems can gyi gnas gsum po'o// sems can gzugs yod pa lus gcig cing / 'du shes gcig pa dang yod do// /
204b8(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams te/ 'di ni sems can gyi gnas bzhi pa'o// sems can gzugs yod pa 'du shes med cing 'du shes dang bral ba dag yon
205a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten de/ 'di lta ste/ 'dus shes med pa'i lha rnams te/ 'di ni sems can gyi gnas lnga pa'o// sems can gzugs med pa//
205a2(mdo sde): rnams rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cig/ sna tshogs kyi 'du shes
205a3(mdo sde): rnams yid la mi byed la/ na mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ na mkha' mtha' yas skyes mched bsgrubs nas gnas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ namakha'
205a4(mdo sde): mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams te/ 'di ni sems can gyi gnas drug pa'o// sems can gzugs med pa rnams pa thams cad du/ na mkha'
205a5(mdo sde): las skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam pa shes mtha' yas skye ched bsgrubs nas gnas pa yod de/
205a6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams te/ 'di ni sems can gyi gnas bdun pa'o// sems can gzugs med pa gang dag rnam
205a7(mdo sde): bar thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las dag par 'das te/ ci yang med do snyam nas/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs nas gnas pa dag yod de/
205a8(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams te/ 'di ni sems can gyi gnas brgyad pa'o// sems can gzugs med pa rnams pa
205b1(mdo sde): 'du shes me
205b2(mdo sde): thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med mini skye mched bsgrubs nas gnas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/
205b3(mdo sde): 'du shes med 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams te/ 'di ni sems can gyi gnas dgu pa'o// stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten
205b4(mdo sde): gyi khams na/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag yod de/ srog bcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun
205b5(mdo sde): du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag brtsub po dang / tshig kyal ba dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba rnams so// srog gcod pa
205b6(mdo sde): shas cher bkris shing bsgoms te/ lan mang du byas pas ni/ sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skye bar 'gyur ro// de bas ches shas bya dang /
205b7(mdo sde): de bas ches yang bas ni rab tu tsha bar 'gyur ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni tsha bar 'gyur ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang //

206a1(mdo sde): pa ma la sa man par 'a #
206a2(mdo sde): sha kun tu zlams te/ sanamang du byas pa dang / 'dod pas mig par gsas pa dang / du ts+tsha pa dang / bral dang / ngan bcub

206a4(mdo sde): ba chen po mnar med par 'gyur ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni rab tu che bar ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches
206a5(mdo sde): yang bas ni tsha bar ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni du 'bod chen por ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni
206a6(mdo sde): ngu 'bod du'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni bsdus gzhom du'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni/ thig

206b1(mdo sde): chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ klu'i rigs bzhi stong rgya mtsho chen po na gnas so// na mkha' lding rigs bzhi stong yin/ shing shal ma li'i mthon na
206b2(mdo sde): la gnas te/ sgo nga las skye ba stong dang / mngal nas skye ba stong dang / drod gsher las skye ba stong dang / rdzus te skye ba stong rnams so// na mkha' lding
206b3(mdo sde): gi rigs sgo nga las skye ba ni bza' ba'i phyir/ klung sgong las skye ba 'byin par byed te mngal skye ba mi 'byin/ drod gsher las skye ba mi 'byin brdzus ste skye
206b4(mdo sde): ba mi 'byin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te de len na de nyid thal ba bzhin du byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// na mkha' lding mngal nas skye ba ni bza' ba'i
206b5(mdo sde): phyir/ klu sgo nga las skye ba dang / mngal nas skye ba 'byin par byed de/ drod gsher las skye ba mi 'byin rdzus te skye ba mi 'byin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
206b6(mdo sde): gal te de len na de thal bzhin du byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// na mkha' lding drod gsher las skye ba ni bza' ba'i phyir/ klu sgo nga las skyes pa dang /
206b7(mdo sde): mngal nas skye ba dang / drod gsher las skye ba 'byin par byed de/ rdzus te skye ba mi 'byin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te de len na de nyid thal bzhin du byed/
206b8(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// nam mkha' lding rdzus te skye ba ni bza' ba'i phyir/ klu sgo nga las skye ba dang / mngal nas skye ba dang / drod gsher las skye ba dang /
207a1(mdo sde): 'dzin te 'dag pa#rdzus te skye ba 'byin par byed do// klu la klu chen po bskal par gnas shing / sa 'dzin pa dag yod de/ de dag kyang gang zhe
207a2(mdo sde): na/ 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' gnyis dang / klu'i rgyal po brtas rgal dang / klu'i rgyal po btang gzung dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi
207a3(mdo sde): can dang / klu'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung dang / klu'i rgyal po nag po chen po dang / klu'i rgyal e la'i 'dab ma rnams te/ 'di dag dang / gzhan
207a4(mdo sde): yang klu chen po bskal bar gnas shing sa 'dzin pa na mkha' lding dag gis 'byung ba mi nus pa gang yin pa 'di dag lha ma yin gyi yul myong bar byed cing so sor
207a5(mdo sde): myong bar byed de/ shes shing rab tu shes la/ kun tu rab tu shes so// ji skad du shin du mthu che ba'i klu dag yod de ma mtha' srung zhing chu na gnas pa ste/
207a6(mdo sde): de dag lha min dag dang / g.yul 'gyed pas/ 'di dag brgya byin gyi ni dpung yang yin// stobs kyang che zhing 'dug che klu yin te/ shin tu drag po
207a7(mdo sde): po dgra thabs sna tshogs can// lha myin rnams dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyes pas/ de dag brgya byin gyi ni dpung yang yin// zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o//
207a8(mdo sde): bar sdom ni// dga' bo nye dga' rtas rgal dang // btang gzung dang ni gzi can dang // yul 'khor srung dang nag po che// e la'i 'dab ma phyi ma yin//
207b1(mdo sde): stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na// dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag yod do// srog gcod pa spong ba dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas
207b2(mdo sde): log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du ji smra ba dang / phra ma dang / dag brtsub mo dang / tshig rgyal ba spong ba dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems med pa
207b3(mdo sde): dang / yang dag par lta ba rnams so// srog gcod pa spong ba shas cher kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te/ lan mang du byas pas ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha

207b5(mdo sde): bas ni 'bral ba rnam so// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni sum bcu rtsa gsum rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung bas dang / de bas
207b6(mdo sde): ches yang bas ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams su'o// de bas shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang pa dang / mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skyes par
207b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag bcu pa po dang / tshig kyal pa spang ba dang //

208a1(mdo sde): 'dzin 'dag / @#byed kyi lha rnams dang / skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches shas chung ba de bas ni

208a6(mdo sde): chung ma 'gran zla med par 'gyur ro// brdzun du smra ba spongs pas ni/ skur ba mang bar mi 'gyur ro// phra ma spong bas ni/ mdza' bo dang / dbye bar mi 'gyur ro// ngag
208a7(mdo sde): brtsub po spong bas ni/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra thos par mi 'gyur ro// tshig kyal pa spong bas ni/ tshig mnyan par 'gyur ro// brnab sems med pas ni/ 'dod
208a8(mdo sde): chags che bas mi 'gyur ro// gnod sems med pa ni zhe sdang bar mi 'gyur ro// yang dag par lta bas ni gti mug ches par mi 'gyur ro// // bar sdom ni/

208b7(mdo sde): rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed pa de mchog yin no// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni/ las gang gis rnams par

209a1(mdo sde): 'dzin 'dag smin pas rab 'thab bral gyis rab 'thab bral nyid thob pa de mchog yin no// dga' ldan myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi/

211a3(mdo sde): dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnam dang / 'bras bu che ba rnam
