211a5(mdo sde): de bzhin no// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched pa rnams dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched pa dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched pa dang / 'du shes
211a6(mdo sde): med min skye mched pa rnams la ni kha dog med do// ji ltar mdzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi khang pa ched du byas pa dang / byas pa ma yin pa dang / khang
211a7(mdo sde): bzangs dang / sa gang rnams yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin no// byang gi sgra
211a8(mdo sde): mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi khang pa ni ched du byas pa ma yin pa las gang dag go// rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams kyi gzhal med khang ni ched du byas pa
211b1(mdo sde): dang / mched du byas pa ma yin pa dag go// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab
211b2(mdo sde): bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul rga ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang de bzhin
211b3(mdo sde): no// tshangs ris pa rnams kyi gzhal med khang pa rnams ni ched du byas pa ma yin pa dag go// tshangs ris pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin
211b4(mdo sde): du/ tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'do chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'do gsal ba rnams
211b5(mdo sde): dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod
211b6(mdo sde): rnams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / 'og min
211b7(mdo sde): ba rnams kyi bar gyi gzhal med khang rnams kyang ched du ma byas pa yin no// gzugs med pa rnams la ni khang pa dag med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la/
211b8(mdo sde): gding ba dang / bgo ba 'di lta ste/ bal gos dang / shA nA'i ras dang / gsoras dang / zar ma'i ras dang / ras gos dang / zab dang / ko tam pa'i nas dang /
212a1(mdo sde): 'dzin ladu ku la'i gos dang / a pa ran hi ka'i gos dang / ras dang be'u ras yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba laM/
212a2(mdo sde): spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams kyi mi ni dpag bsam shing las byung ba'i gos dag gyon no// ji ltar byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams dpag bsam shing las byung
212a3(mdo sde): ba'i go dag gyon pa bzhin du/ rgyal chen bzhi pa'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga'
212a4(mdo sde): ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ni gos gyen bzhin du skye'o// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og min gyi
212a5(mdo sde): bar dag kyang gos gyon pa bzhin du skye'o// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi pi rnams kyi dpag bsam gyi ko kyi shing rnams ni rnam pa bzhi te/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar
212a6(mdo sde): pa rnamaso// bzhag gos kyang rnams pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam so// dpag bsam shing las byung ba'i gos kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon
212a7(mdo sde): po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams te/ dpag bsam shing las byung ba'i gos ji lta bu'i 'dod pa de lta bu skyes pa 'am/ bud med dag gis sems bskyed
212a8(mdo sde): ma thag tu de la yal ga 'dud par byed do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyis dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i gos kyis shing rnams kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang /
212b1(mdo sde): dmar po dang / dkar po rnams so// bzhag gos kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon pa dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar ba rnam so// dpag pasam shing las byung na
212b2(mdo sde): gos kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams te/ dpag bsam shing las byung ba'i gos ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu lba 'am/
212b3(mdo sde): lha'i bu mo dag gis sems bskyed ma zad tu yal ga 'dud par byed do// de'i lag du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du/ gzhan
212b4(mdo sde): 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar dag gi yang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi rnams la ni dpag bsam shing las byung ba'i gos med do// de yan chad pa yang med do// ji ltar 'dzum
212b5(mdo sde): bu'i gling gi mi rnams la gi dang ba dang / go ba balci ba dang / yang ba yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod
212b6(mdo sde): do// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi dpag bsam shing las byung ba'i gos la ni srang cig yod do// rgyal chen bzhi lha rnams kyi ni srang byed do// sum bcu rtsa gsu
212b7(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams kyi ni srang gi bzhi cha gcig go/ 'thab bral ba rnams kyi ni srang gi brgyad cha cig go/ dga' ldan pa rnams kyi ni srang gi bcu drug cha cig go// 'phrul
212b8(mdo sde): dga' ba rnams kyi ni srang gi sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi cha cig go/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi ni dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i gos ni srang gi drug cu
213a1(mdo sde): rtsa bzhi'i cha cig go// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi gos ni gzhal du med pa'i gos yin no// tshangs ris pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og min gyi lha
213a2(mdo sde): rnams kyi yang gzhal du med pa'i gos yin no// nye zer gyi rdul gyi bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i cha cig ni rdul phra ba ba yin no// rdul phra rab bdun la ni rdul phra mo gcig go// rdul phra mo bdun
213a3(mdo sde): la ni nyi zer gyi rdul gcig go/ nye zer bdun lA nI ri bod+ma gI rdul bdun la ni lug rdul gcig go/ lug rdul bdun la ni glang rdul gcig go/ glang rdul bdun la ni sro ma gcig
213a4(mdo sde): go/ sro ma bdun la ni a ba ga na gcig go/ a ba ga na bdun la ni ba ti ka gcig go// nas 'bru bdun la ni sor cig go/ sor nyi shu rtsa gzhi la ni khru gang ngo // 'dzam bu'i gling
213a5(mdo sde): mi kha cig ni khru chad de ltar brtsis pa'i khru phyed dang bzhi'o// kha cig ni bru bzhi'o// kyis 'dun la ni nas 'bru gtsog/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams ni khru brgyad pa'o// nub kyi ba lang
213a6(mdo sde): spyod pa rnams ni/ khru bcu drug pa'o// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams ni khru sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// rgyal chen gzhi pa'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lus thob pa ni/ rgyang grags kyi
213a7(mdo sde): bzhi cha gcig go// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi ni rgyang grags kyi byed do// 'thab bral ba rnams kyi ni rgyang grags kyi bzhi cha gsu mo// dga' ldan pa rnams
213a8(mdo sde): kyi ni rgyang grags gcig go/ 'phrul dga' rnams kyi ni rgyang grags gcig/ rgyang grags kyi bzhi cha gcig go/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi ni rgyang grags byed dang
213b1(mdo sde): gnyis so// tshangs ris pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad phyed do// tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad gcig go/ tshangs pa chen po pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad phyed
213b2(mdo sde): dang gnyis so// 'od chung ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad gnyis so// tshad med 'od pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad bzhi'o// 'od gsal ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad brgyad do//
213b3(mdo sde): dge chung ba rnams kyi dpag tshad bcu drug go/ tshad med dge ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad sum bcu rtsa gnyis so// dge rgyas pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad drug bcu rtsa bzhi'o//
213b4(mdo sde): sprin med pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// bsod nams skyes pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad gnyis brgya lnga bcu'o// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi ni dpag tshad lnga
213b5(mdo sde): brgya'o// 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams kyi yang de dang 'dra'o// mi che ba lha'i lus thob pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad stong ngo // mi gdung ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad
213b6(mdo sde): nyis stong ngo // gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi ni dpag tshad bzhi stong ngo // shin tu mthong ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad brgyad stong ngo // 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lus thob pa rnam
213b7(mdo sde): kyi ni dpag tshad khri drug stong ngo // gzugs med pa rnams la ni bsags pa'i lus med do// nyi zer gyi rdul gyi bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i cha gcig ni rdul phra rab yin//
213b8(mdo sde): rdul phra rab bdun la ni/ rdul phra mo gcig go// rdul mo bdun la ni nyi zer gyi rdul gcig go/ rgyas par khru gang gi bar du ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi kha cig
214a1(mdo sde): 'dzinani gos khru tshang 'di lta bu brtsis pa'i khru brgyad pa gyon/ kha cig ni bcu pa'o// shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams kyi khru nyi shu pa'o// nub
214a2(mdo sde): kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams kyi ni khru bzhi bcu pa'o// byang gi mi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi ni dpag bsam gi shing las byung ba'i gos khru brgya bcu pa gyon no// rgyal chen bzhi'i
214a3(mdo sde): ris kyi lha rnams kyang lus la ci ran pa'i gos gon no// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 'og min gyi bar dag gi yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam
214a4(mdo sde): bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi dbang po tha dad de/ kha cig la ni mo'i dbang po dang / kha cig la ni po'i dbang po yod pa de bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang /
214a5(mdo sde): nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang /
214a6(mdo sde): dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni me'i dbang po yang med/ po'i
214a7(mdo sde): dbang po yang med do/ tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og min gyi bar dag gi yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la bag ma tong ba dang /
214a8(mdo sde): bag ma len pa yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsuM/
214a9(mdo sde): byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la ni yang med do//
214b1(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang yod do// tshangs
214b2(mdo sde): ris kyi lha rnams la ni bag tong ba yang med do// bag ma len pa yang med do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og min gyi bar dag kyang de bzhin no//
214b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten bdags pa las tshigs bzhi pa'o// sdom ni/ gangs dang dus tshigs mtshan mo dang / pha dang ma ni rje gol dang / nor dang 'bru dang mngon par zhen/ bcu mtshan
214b4(mdo sde): yongasu brjod pa yin/ ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la shin tu grang ba dang / shin tu tsha ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba
214b5(mdo sde): lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la ni med do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams la yang med do// de yan chad la yang med do// ji ltar 'dzam
214b6(mdo sde): bu'i gling gi mi rnams la dus tshigs 'di lta ste/ dgun dang / dpyid dang / dbyar yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod
214b7(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams/ rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnam
214b8(mdo sde): dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni dus tshigs med do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams
215a1(mdo sde): 'jig la ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og min gyi bar dag la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la mtshan mo dang / nyin mo yod pa bzhin
215a2(mdo sde): du shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi sman pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa
215a3(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'thab 'bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris kyi
215a4(mdo sde): lha rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni mtshan mo yang med/ nyin mo yang med do// tshangs ris pa rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du 'og min gyi bar dag la yang de
215a5(mdo sde): bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la ba dang ma yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan
215a6(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba dang / gzhan 'phrul
215a7(mdo sde): dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni ma yang med/ ba yang med do// tshangs ris gyi lha rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du 'og min gyi bar dag la
215a8(mdo sde): yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la jo bo dang / bran yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang skyong pa rnams la
215b1(mdo sde): yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa'i mi rnams la ni jo bo yang med/ bran kyang med do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams la ni jo bo dang bran yang med do// rgyal chen bzhi
215b2(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang /
215b3(mdo sde): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang de bzhin no/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni jo bo yang med/ bran yang med do// tshangs rig kyi rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/
215b4(mdo sde): 'og min gyi bar dag la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la nor dang 'bru dag yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub pa lang spyod
215b5(mdo sde): pa rnams la ni yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la ni 'bru ni yod la nor ni med do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams la ni nor yod la 'bru ni med do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams
215b6(mdo sde): ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la
215b7(mdo sde): yang de bzhin no// tshangs rigs kyi lha rnams la ni nor yang med 'bru yang med do// tshangs rigs kyi lha rnams la ni ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og min gyi bar dag la yang de bzhin no//
215b8(mdo sde): ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la pa dang / bu pho 'am bu mo 'am/ jo bo 'am bran nam/ nor 'am/ 'bru la mngon par zhen pa yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams
216a1(mdo sde): dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams ni ci la yang mngon par zhen pa med do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i
216a2(mdo sde): bral ba rAm/
216a3(mdo sde): rnams ni 'bru ma togs pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yod do// rgyal chen bzhi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang /
216a4(mdo sde): 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhino// tshangs rigs kyi lha rnams la ni ci yang mngon par zhen pa med do// tshangs rigs kyi lha
216a5(mdo sde): rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'ong pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba
216a6(mdo sde): rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams
216a7(mdo sde): dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / 'og gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// 'jig rten bdag pa las tshigs lnga pa// / bam po gnyis pa/ sdom ni/ zla mtshan
216a8(mdo sde): 'khrig dang khu chu dang / tshe dang nag po chu klung brag/ sa la rdzing dang glang po dang / srungs ma 'khor los sgyur ba'i lam// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la/ bud med zla
216a9(mdo sde): mtshan dang / sbrum ma dang / bu tsa ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la yang yod do//
216b1(mdo sde): rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi ni/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi khye'u 'am/ bu mo dang / bu lo lnga lon pa ci tsam pa de bzhin du/ lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo'i phrag pa 'am
216b2(mdo sde): bang bar/ sems can rdzus te skye bar 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de na lha 'am/ de lha'i bu mo dag 'di snyam du 'di ni/ bdag gis bu mo'o snyam du sems so// khye'u dang bu
216b3(mdo sde): mo de dag kyang 'di snyam du 'di ni/ bdag cag gi ma 'am pa'o snyam du sems so// sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi ni lo drug lon pa ci tsam pa bzhin no// 'thab bral ba rnam
216b4(mdo sde): kye ni lo drug lon pa tsam pa bzhin no// 'thab bral ba rnams kyi ni lo bdun lon pa tsam pa bzhin no// dga' ldan pa rnams kyi ni lo brgyad lon pa ci tsam pa bzhin no//
216b5(mdo sde): 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi ni/ lo dgu lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin no// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi ni/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi khye'u dang / bu mo la
216b6(mdo sde): bcu drug lon pa'i ji tsam pa de bzhin du/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo'i phrag pa 'am pang bar rdzus te skye ba'i sems can 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de na lha 'am lha'i bu mo dag 'di snyam
216b7(mdo sde): du 'di ni bdag gi bu 'am bu mo'o snyam du sems so// khye'u dang bu mo de dag kyang 'di skad du 'di ni bdag cag gi ma 'am pa'o snyam du semaso// tshangs rigs kyi lha rnams
216b8(mdo sde): ni thog ma nyid nas lus kyi yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad rdzogs par skye zhing 'chi ba na yang de kho na bzhin no// tshangs rigs kyi lha rnams ni ji lta ba bzhin du/
217a1(mdo sde): 'og min gyi bar dag kyang de bzhin no// gzugs med pa rnams la ni thog ma nyid nas lus kyi gzugs med de/ de bas na de dag ni skye ba
217a2(mdo sde): yang mi mngon par 'chi 'pho ba la yang mi mngon no// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams/ mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos sten pa na/ gnyis kyi gnyis spor
217a3(mdo sde): ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang /
217a4(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// 'thab bral ba rnams ni khyad pa tsam gyis gdung bzhi par 'gyur ro// dga' ldan pa rnams kyis ni lags pa nas gzung
217a5(mdo sde): ba tsam gyis so// 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyis ni brgad pa tsam gyis so// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi ni bltas pa tsam gyis gdung ba zhi bar 'gyur ro//
217a6(mdo sde): tshangs ris pa rnams ni 'dod chags med do// tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og min gyi bar dag kyang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams
217a7(mdo sde): la khu chu mi gtsang ba 'byung ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la yang
217a8(mdo sde): de bzhin no// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi ni rlung 'byung ngo // rgyal chen bzhi pa'i rigs kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /
217b1(mdo sde): 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / bzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyis yang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi
217b2(mdo sde): lha rnams la ni 'dod chags med do// tshangs rigs pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og min gyi bar dag kyang de bzhin no// sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams
217b3(mdo sde): kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa gcig ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni bskal pa
217b4(mdo sde): gcig ste/ bar d+mor 'chi ba ni yod do// mi rnams kyi nyin zhag sum cu gang yin pa de ni/ yi dgas rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig ste/ nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba
217b5(mdo sde): gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig te/ yi dgas rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni lo de lta bu brtsis pa'i lnga brgya ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// mi ltar
217b6(mdo sde): brtsis na lo khri lnga stong po yod do// shar gyi lus 'phags po mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi ra ba ni/ lo nyi brgya lnga bcu ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// nub
217b7(mdo sde): kyi ba lang spyod rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni lo lnga brgya ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni rab kyi lo stong ste/ bar
217b8(mdo sde): mdor 'chi ba ni med do// ci'i phyir byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la bar ma dor 'chi ba med ce na/ de dag la bdag gi 'chi ba med cing yong su 'dzin pa med de/
218a1(mdo sde): 'dzin tshe des shing khyad pa du 'gro ba yin pas/ de'i phyir byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la bar ma dor 'chi ba med do// 'dzam bu'i gling gi
218a2(mdo sde): mi rnams la ni yar skye ba dang / mar grib pa yod do// 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams res 'ga' ni tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur la/ res 'ga' ni tshe lo bcu par
218a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// mi rnams kyi tshe lo lnga bcu gang yin pa de ni rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/ nyin zhag de gsum bcu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu
218a4(mdo sde): gnyis la lo gcig te/ rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni/ lo de lta bu brtsis pa'i lha'i lo lnga brgya ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// mi'i
218a5(mdo sde): ltar brtsis na lo sa ya phrag dgu yod de/ de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag de sum bcu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis
218a6(mdo sde): la lo cig te/ sems can dmyal ba yang sos kyi sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni/ lo de lta bu'i brtsis pa'i sems can dmyal ba pa'i lo lnga brgya ste/
218a7(mdo sde): bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag 'bum drug khri nyi stong yod do// mi rnams kyi lo brgya gang yin pa de ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
218a8(mdo sde): rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/ nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad rab ni/
218b1(mdo sde): de lo de lta bu brtsis pa'i lha'i lo stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag gsum dang / sa ya phrag drug yod de sems can dbyal
218b2(mdo sde): ba chen po thig nag gi nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po thig nag gi tshe'i
218b3(mdo sde): tshad kyi rab ni/ lo de lta bu brtsis pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i lo stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i brtsis na lo bye ba phrag 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang /
218b4(mdo sde): bye ba phrag dgu khri drug stong yod do// mi rnams kyi lo nyi brgya gang yin pa de ni/ 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/
218b5(mdo sde): zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi ra ba ni/ lo de lta bu brtsis pa'i lha'i le nyi stong ste/ de mi ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag bcu
218b6(mdo sde): bzhi dang / sa ya brag bzhi yod de/ de ni sems can dmyal ba bsdus 'joms kyi nyin zhag gcig go/ nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la la
218b7(mdo sde): gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus 'joms kyi sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni/ lo de lta bu'i brtsis pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i lo nyid
218b8(mdo sde): stong ste/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ de ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag gcig dang / bye ba phrag sum 'bum dang / bye ba phrag drug khri brgyad stong yod do//
219a1(mdo sde): mi rnams kyi lo bzhi brgya gang yin pa de ni dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/ nyin zhag de gsum bcu la zla ba gcig go// zla
219a2(mdo sde): ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni/ de lo de lta bu brtsis pa'i lha'i la stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i
219a3(mdo sde): ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang / lo sa ya phrag drug yod do// de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod kyi nyin zhag gcig go/ nyin zhag de
219a4(mdo sde): gsum bcu la zla ba gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod kyi sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi tshe tshad kyi rab ni lo bzhi stong ste/ bar ma dor
219a5(mdo sde): 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag brgyad dang / bye ba phrag sa ya dgu 'bum bzhi khri bzhi stong yod do// mi rnams kyi lo brgyad brgya gang yin pa de ni/
219a6(mdo sde): 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi ni nyin zhag gcig go/ nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba bcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni/
219a7(mdo sde): lha'i lo brgya stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de'i mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag gnyis brgya sum bcu dang / lo sa ya phrag bzhi yod de/ de ni sems can dmyal
219a8(mdo sde): ba chen po ngu 'bod chen po'i nyin zhag gcig go/ nyin zhag de sum bcu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod chen po'i
219b1(mdo sde): nyin zhag gcig ga/ sa nyin zhag de sum bcu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod chen po'i tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni/
219b2(mdo sde): brgyad stong dang / bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na/ bye ba drug bcu rtsa drug dang / bye ba phrag sa ya 'bum dang / bye ba phrag lnga 'bum lnga khri nyi stong
219b3(mdo sde): yod do// mi rnams kyi lo stong drug rgya gang yin pa de ni/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag cig go nyin zhag de sum bcu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis
219b4(mdo sde): la lo gcig ste/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni/ lha'i lo khri drug stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo
219b5(mdo sde): bye ba phrag dgu brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / lo sa ya phrag drug yod de/ de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i nyin zhag gcig go/ nyin zhag de gsum bcu la zla ba gcig/
219b6(mdo sde): zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen blo tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni/ lo ni de lta bur brtsis pa'i dmyal ba'i lo khri drug stong ste/
219b7(mdo sde): lo bye ba phrag khri drug stong yod do// bar sdom ni/ dgu dang sum dang / bcu bzhi/ lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang / nyes brgya dgu brgya rnams ni mi'i grangs lha tsher bshad/ de
220a1(mdo sde): nabazhin cig dang bcu gnyis gcig brgyad drug bcu dang lnga rgya dag ni sems can dmyal ba'i tsher bshad do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi
220a2(mdo sde): tshad kyi rab ni skal ba byed de/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// sems can dmyal ba chen po rab tu tsha ba'i tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni skal ba byed de/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do//
220a3(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe tshad kyi rab ni skal pa gcig ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa'i tshe'i tshad kyi
220a4(mdo sde): rab ni bskal pa cig ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// tshangs pa chen po'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i ched kyi rab ni skal pa phyed dang gnyis te/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do//
220a5(mdo sde): 'od chung gi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni bskal pa gnyis/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni bskal pa bzhi ste/ bar ma
220a6(mdo sde): dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni bskal pa brgyad de/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// dge chung gi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni bskal
220a7(mdo sde): ba bcu drug ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// tshad med dge ba'i rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni bskal pa sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ bar dor 'chi ba ni yod do// dge rgyas kyi wa
220a8(mdo sde): rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni bskal pa drug bcu rtsa bzhi ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// sprin med kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni bskal pa brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga ste/ bar ma
220b1(mdo sde): dor 'chi ba ni yod do// bsod nams skyes kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni bskal pa gnyis brgya lnga bcu ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi
220b2(mdo sde): tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni bskal pa lnga brgya ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'du shes med pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni de dang 'dra'o// mi che ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni
220b3(mdo sde): bskal pa stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni skal pa nyi stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams
220b4(mdo sde): kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni bskal pa gzhi stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni bskal ba brgyad stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do//
220b5(mdo sde): 'og min pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni bskal pa khri drug stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni bskal
220b6(mdo sde): pa nyi khri ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rabs ni bskal pa bzhi khri ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// ci
220b7(mdo sde): yang med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni bskal pa drug khri ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi rnams kyi tshe'i
220b8(mdo sde): tshad kyi rab ni bskal pa brgyad khri ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'di nas byang phyogs na ri nag po gsum yod do// ri nag po gsum po de dag gi byang gi phyogs na ri
221a1(mdo sde): nag po gzhan gsum yod do// ri nag po gzhan gsum po de dag gi byang phyogs na yang / ri nag po gzhan gsum yod do// ri nag po gzhan
221a2(mdo sde): gsum po de dag gi byang phyogs na/ ri'i rgyal po gangs can shes bya ba yod do// ri'i rgyal po gang can gyi byang phyogs na/ ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldan zhes bya ba yod do//
221a3(mdo sde): ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldan nas/ dpag tshad bcu'i tshur rol na mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba yod de/ ma dros pa zhes kyang bya'o// mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba de la tshur dpag
221a4(mdo sde): tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad lnga bcu yod do// 'khor yug tu ni dpag tshad nyi rgya yod do// dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ chu bsil zhing chu sbrang rtsi
221a5(mdo sde): lta bus gang la me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma kar pos kun tu khyebs par 'dug go// de'i nang na klung chen po bzhi la 'di lta ste/ gang ga dang / sin du
221a6(mdo sde): dang / si ta dang / bag shu dang / 'di rnams 'bab po gang ga ni shar phyogs nas glang po che'i kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba la g.yas phyogasu bskor
221a7(mdo sde): nas klung lnga brgya dang / lhan cig tu shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o// sin du ni lho phyogs nas khyu mchog gi kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya
221a8(mdo sde): ba la g.yas phyogasu bskor nas klung lnga brgya dang / lhan cig tu lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o// bag shu ni nub phyogs nas rta'i kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen
221b1(mdo sde): rachu mtsho yod de gzhan yang ni/
221b2(mdo sde): po chu shes bya ba la g.yas phyogasu bskor nas klung lnga brgya dang / lhan gcig tu nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o// srin ta ni byang phyogs nas seng ge'i kha nas 'bab
221b3(mdo sde): ste/ de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba la g.yas phyog su bskor nas klung lnga brgya dang / lhan cig tu byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'gro/ ji skad du byang phyogs kha gur 'gyur
221b4(mdo sde): ba'i/ de na mtsho chen chu zhes bya ba ni/ tha dad rgyun rnams 'byung gnas yod/ chu klung gang gi sin du bag shu dang si ta baba' rlabs dbu ba'i 'phreng ba can// chu gang khyud par
221b5(mdo sde): 'phags pa bzhi 'bab ste// phyogs bzhi dag tu kun tu rnam par 'bab// gang ga shar phyogs rgya mtshor 'gro ba yin// sin du yang ni lho phyogs rgya mtshor 'gro// bag shu
221b6(mdo sde): yang ni nub phyogs rgya mtsho chen por 'gro// de'i byang phyogs rgya mtsher si ta 'gro/ chu klung rab mchog bzhi po 'di dag ni/ mchog tu bzang zhing so sor 'bab pa ste/
221b7(mdo sde): re re zhing yang lnga rgyar khyer nas ni/ chu'i rgyun rnams rgya mtsho chen por 'gro zhes kyang 'byung ba lta bu'o// ri spos kyi ngad ldang de'i byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ gser gyi
221b8(mdo sde): brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos zhes bya ba yod de// tshur dpag tshad lnga bcu zheng du yang bcu/ khor khor yug tu dpag tshad nyis brgya// 'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi
221b9(mdo sde): yod pa// dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod de// de'i nang gi sa gzhi yang dbyings legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal
222a1(mdo sde): nacing // tsan dan gyis chus chag chag btab ste// der yid du mi 'ong ba'i shing ngam gseg ma 'am/ gang yang rung ba dag ltung na/ de mi yin pa
222a2(mdo sde): rnams kyis klung gi mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro// de'i kho ra khor yug na gser gyi brag bya skyibs brgya stong yod do// de dag thams cad kyang dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la
222a3(mdo sde): mdzes pa/ gser gyis bye ma bdal cing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa ste/ de dag tu yang yid du mi 'ong ba'i shing ngam gseg ma 'am/ gyo mo gang ci yang rung ba dag
222a4(mdo sde): ltung na/ de mi yin pa rnams kyis rlung gis mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro// de'i lam srid du dpag tshad nyi shu/ zheng du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing
222a5(mdo sde): blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal cing / tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod de/ der yang yid du mi 'ong ba shing ngam/ gseg ma 'am/ gang ci
222a6(mdo sde): yang rung ba dag lung na/ de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol du 'thor ro// brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos de'i byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ shing sa
222a7(mdo sde): la'i rgyal po chen po rab brtan zhes bya ba sa lo'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba yod do// sa le'i rgyal po rab brtan de'i rtsa ba ni/ 'dom bcu bzhi thur du zug
222a8(mdo sde): go/ sa la'i phreng ba dang po'i rtsa ba ni/ 'dom bcu gsum mthur du bcug go// gnyis pa'i ni bcu gnyis so// gsum pa'i ni bcu gcig go/ bzhi pa'i ni
222b1(mdo sde): bcu'o// lnga pa'i ni dgu'o// drug pa ni brgyad do// sa la'i phreng ba 'dun pa'i rtsa ba ni/ 'dom bdun thur tu zug go/ sa la'i rgyal po rab brtan de'i yal ga dang /
222b2(mdo sde): lo ma dang / yal ga rnams gang yin pa de ni sa la'i 'phreng ba dang / po la thug go/ sa la'i phreng ba dang po'i yal ga dang lo ma dang / yal ga gang yin pa de ni gnyis pa
222b3(mdo sde): la'o// gnyis pa'i gang yin pa ni gsum pa la'o// gsum pa'i gang yin pa de ni bzhi pa'o// bzhi pa'i gang yin pa de ni lnga pa la'o// lnga pa'i gang yin pa de ni drug
222b4(mdo sde): pa la'o// drug pa'i gang yin pa de ni bdun pa la'o// sa le'i phreng ba bdun pa'i yal ga dang / lo ma dang / yal ga gang yin pa de ni na mkha' khyab par 'dug go/ de'i
222b5(mdo sde): nang gi sa gzhi yang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal cing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa ste/ der yang yid du 'ong ba'i shing dang /
222b6(mdo sde): gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag ldang na/ de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis rlab gi mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro// de'i lam du srid du dpag tshad nyi shu/ zheng du dpag tshad
222b7(mdo sde): phye dang gnyis yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ der yang yid du 'ong ba shing ngam/ gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na/ de mi ma
222b8(mdo sde): yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol tu 'dor ro// sa la'i rgyal po rab brtan gyi shar phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab ces bya ba chur dpag tshad
223a1(mdo sde): 'an#lnga bcu la tshon du yang dpag tshad lnga bcu ste/ mtha' bskor du dpag tshad nyis brgya yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing ldan sdug pa/ mdzes
223a2(mdo sde): pa la chu bsil zhing chu sbrang ci lta bus gang ba/ me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma kar pos khyebs pa yod de/ rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyis nang gi
223a3(mdo sde): pad+ma'i lo rnams che zhi/ mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ ba lang g.yog pa tsam mo// pad ma'i sdong bu rnams che zhing mchog tu che te/ 'di lta ste/ gshol mnga' tsam mo// bar
223a4(mdo sde): ma'i me tog rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam mo// pad ma'i btsa ba rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ skyes bu chen po'i rla tsam mo//
223a5(mdo sde): ro mngar zhing ni mchog tu mngar te/ 'di lta ste/ sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba bzhin no// bcad na yang 'o ma 'dzag go/ rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi kho ra khor yug na rdzing
223a6(mdo sde): bu brgyad stong yod de/ de dag thams cad kyang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ chu bsil zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ngo // de dag gi nang gi pad+ma'i lo ma rnams kyang
223a7(mdo sde): che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ ba glang g.yog pa tsam mo// pad ma'i sdong bu rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ gshol mda' tsam mo// pad ma'i me
223a8(mdo sde): tog rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ shing rta'i phar lo tsam mo pad ma'i rtsa ba rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ skyes bu che po'i brla tsam mo// ro mdar
223b1(mdo sde): zhing mchog tu mngar ste/ 'di lta ste/ sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba bzhin no// bcad na yang 'o ma 'dzag go/ de'i lam srid du dpag tshad nyi shu/ zheng du dpag tshad
223b2(mdo sde): phye dang gnyis yod do// dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gyi bye ma 'dal cing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod ste/ der yang yid
223b3(mdo sde): du mi 'ong ba'i shing ngam/ gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag ltung na/ de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol tu 'dor ro// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
223b4(mdo sde): lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po g.yul dor bcad pa rab tu brtan pa zhes bya ba/ gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod de/ me tog kun da'i mdog ltar
223b5(mdo sde): thal kar du 'dug la yan lag bdun shing tu legs par gnas te/ de'i mgo bo yang dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sngo zhing srog chags lham bu chu gsher
223b6(mdo sde): gyi mdog lta bu dmar la mche ba drug yod do// glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'i srid du dpag tshad phye dang gsum/ zheng du dpag tshad gcig/ 'phang du dpag tshad phye
223b7(mdo sde): dang gnyis/ mtha' bskor du dpag tshad bdun yod do// de'i 'khor glang po che brgyad stong yod do// de dag thams cad kyang gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa/
223b8(mdo sde): me tog kun ta'i mdog ltar thal kar du 'dug cing yan lag bdun shin tu legs par gnas te/ de dag gi mgo bo yang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa
224a1(mdo sde): @!/ sngonang srog chags ma bu cu gsher gyi mdog gar dbus dpa la mched drug yod pa shasas ste/ thang ba che'i rgyal po rab 'anan de la
224a2(mdo sde): dang bcas pa dgun zla bzhi ni brag bya ba skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos kyi nang na gnas shing 'khod do// dpyid zla bzhi ni shing sa la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'i nang na gnas
224a3(mdo sde): shing 'khod do// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos kyi nang na gnas shing 'dug pa de'i tshe glang po che brgyad stong po rnams 'di
224a4(mdo sde): lnga ste/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang mdzes par bya ba'i phyir brag bya sgribs brgyad stong dag gi nang na nye bar gnas shing 'khod do// gang gi
224a5(mdo sde): tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu bstan pa brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos kyi nang nas shing sa la'i rgyal po rab brtan pa'i nang du 'gro ba na/ res 'ga' ni tha mal ba'i tshul
224a6(mdo sde): gyis 'gro/ res 'ga' ni 'di lta ste/ lha 'am lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing / mthu che ba gang yin pa rung ba dang / 'dra bar bdag gnyid mngon par sprul nas/ glang po che de
224a7(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyi nang na/ dbang che bar grags pa gang yin pa de nyid kyis mgo bo 'am brgyab du zhon te/ sil snyan dang leg rdob pa dag rgya chen byed cing 'gro'o// gang
224a8(mdo sde): gi glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa shing sa la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'i nang na gnas shing 'dug pa de'i tshe ni/ glang po che'i brgyad stong po de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ glang
224b1(mdo sde): po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan bsrung ba dang sba ba dang / mdzes par bya ba'i phyir shing sa la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun po dag gi nang na khang nang du ltas shing 'khod de/ shing sa la'i
224b2(mdo sde): phreng ba dang po'i nang na/ 'dug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du blta te 'khod do/ gnyis pa'i nang na 'dug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang na lta'o// gsum pa'i
224b3(mdo sde): nang na 'dug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang ltas te 'khod do// bzhi pa'i nang na 'dug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du lta'o// lnga pa'i nang na 'dug pa gang yin pa
224b4(mdo sde): de dag kyang kha nang du lta'o// drug pa'i nang na 'dug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang tu ltas te 'khod do// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa shing sa la'i
224b5(mdo sde): rgyal po rab tu brtan pa nas rdzing dal gyi 'bab par 'gro ba na/ res 'ga' ni tha mal ba'i tshul gyis 'gro'o// res 'ga' ni 'di lta ste/ lha 'am lha'i bu rdzu
224b6(mdo sde): 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gang yang rung ba dang 'dra bar/ bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ glang po che de dag thams cad kyi nang na dbang che bar grags pa gang yin
224b7(mdo sde): pa nyid kyi mgo bo 'am/ rgyab du zhon te/ sil snyan dang / pheg rdol ba dag rgya chen byed cing 'gro'o// gang gi tshe glang po rab tu brtan pa rdzing bu dal gyis 'ad
224b8(mdo sde): gyi nang du zhugs nas rtsi zhing dga' mgur spyod pa'i tshe/ glang po che brgyad stong po de dag 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i rgyal po de rab tu bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang /
225a1(mdo sde): yinamadzes par bya ba'i phyir/ rdzing bu dal kyis 'bab kyi mtha' khar nadzang zug nas 'anar te/ kha nang du lus shing 'khod do/
225a2(mdo sde): gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi nang na rtse brtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur myong nas/ phyir byung ba de'i tshe nang ngan glang po ched la
225a3(mdo sde): che bar grags pa gang yin pa de rdzing bu dal gyi 'bab kyi nang du zhugs nas pad ma'i rtsa ba rnams grangs te/ shin tu bkrus shing rab tu bshal nas/ glang po che'i rgyal ba
225a4(mdo sde): rab tu brtan pa la 'bul lo// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pas zos shing 'thungs te/ 'grangs par gyur de'i tshe/ glang po che gzhan brgyad bstong de dag kyang
225a5(mdo sde): rdzing bu brgyad stong gi nang du rdzing bu re re zhugs nas/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de/ pad+ma rtsa ba dag blangs nas bsdus shing rab tu bshal te za'o// sum bcu rtsa
225a6(mdo sde): gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis glang po che'i rgyal po g.yul ngor spyad pa rab tu brtan pa de'i mthu ni de tsam mo// sems can thams cad ni srungs ma dang bcas shing bsrung ba dang /
225a7(mdo sde): skyobs pa dang / sbed pa dang / mi 'bral te/ sems can gang dbang chung bar grags shing / bsod nams chung la gzi brjid chung ba de dag ni rgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag
225a8(mdo sde): mang po la gcig gis bsrung ste/ dper na ba lang ngam lug brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po la gcig gi bsrung ba de bzhin du/ sems can gang dbang chung bar
225b1(mdo sde): grags shing bsod nams chung la dbang chung ba gzi brjid chung ba de dag ni brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po la gcig gis srung ngo // sems can gang dbang chen
225b2(mdo sde): grags shing bsod nams che ba la gzi brjid che ba de dag ni rgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po dag gis gcig pu bsrung ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
225b3(mdo sde): po 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la rgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po dag gis gcig pu srung ba de bzhin du/
225b4(mdo sde): sems can gang dbang che bar grags shing bsod nams che la gzi brjid che ba de dag la rgya phrag mang po dag gis gcig pu srung ngo // 'dir smras pa/ ci ste sems can thams
225b5(mdo sde): cad srung ba dang / bcas shing srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa dang / mi 'bral na/ ci'i phyir che ba dag yod par 'gyur/ smras pa/ srungs ma mthu chung ba zhig
225b6(mdo sde): yin na de'i zil gyis ma non nas 'tshe ba dag yod do// srungs ma bag med cing bag med pa la gnas pa zhig yin na/ de'i bag med pa'i rgyu las kyang 'tshe ba dag yod do// /
225b7(mdo sde): srungs ma gnyis spongs nas kyang zil gyis ma non nas 'tshe bar byed do// mi rnams chos ma yin pa spyod cing mi rigs pa byed pa zhig yin na chos ma yin par spyod pa dang /
225b8(mdo sde): mi rigs par spyod pa de dag la yang 'tshe ba dag yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis/ mi rnams kyi srungs ma 'di lta ste/ lam po che dang / srang dang bzhi
226a1(mdo sde): mdo dang / sum mdo dang / spos 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / me tog gi phreng ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / zong dgram pa'i gnas rnam
226a2(mdo sde): dang / btung ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang / gsod byed kyi gnas rnamasu bkod pa dag yod de/ zla ba phyed kyi tshes brgyad la
226a3(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis g.yog zho shas 'tsho ba rnams kyis lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / gsum mdo dang / spos 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang /
226a4(mdo sde): me tog gi phreng ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / zong dgram pa'i gnas rnams dang / btung 'tsho ba gnas rnams dang / gtag tu spyos pa'i gnas rnams dang / gsod
226a5(mdo sde): byed kyi gnas rnams nas su zhig 'dug ces 'jig rten 'di thams cad la nyul te/ gal te de dag gis skyen par tshor na ni de dag gnas 'thon po la 'god do// gal te
226a6(mdo sde): de dag gis skyen par mtshor ba ni/ de dag gnas dma' ba la 'god do// zla ba phyed kyi tshes bcu bzhi la ni rgyal po bzhi po dag gi bu rnams kyis lam po che dang / srang dang /
226a7(mdo sde): bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / spos 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / me tog gi phreng ba'i gnas rnams dang / zong dgram pa'i gnas rnams dang / btung ba 'tshong ba'i
226a8(mdo sde): gnas rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang / bsod nams rnams dang / su zhig 'dug ces 'jig rten 'di thams cad la nyul te/ gal te de dag gis skyen
226b1(mdo sde): par tshor na ni de dag gnas 'thon po la 'god do// gal te de dag gis sbyin par mtshor na ni de dag gnas dma' ba la 'god do// zla ba phyed kyi tshes bco lnga la ni rgyal
226b2(mdo sde): chen po bzhi po de dag nyid kyis lam po che dang / srang dang bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / spos 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / me tog gi phreng ba 'tshong ba'i gnas
226b3(mdo sde): rnams dang / btung ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang / gsod byed kyi gnas rnams na su zhig 'dug ces 'jig rten 'di thams
226b4(mdo sde): cad la nyul te/ gal te dag gis skyen par tshon na ni de dag gnas mthon po la 'khod do// gal te de dag gis skyen par ma tshor na ni de dag gnas dma' ba la 'khod do// /
226b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du/ de dge slong dag zla ba phyed kyi tshes brgyad la ni rgyal po bzhi dag gi g.yog zho shas 'tsho ba rnams ci mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig
226b6(mdo sde): rten na mar 'dzin pa dang / phar 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi gtso bo la ri mo byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya
226b7(mdo sde): ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang / tshe phyi ma la yang kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis ji ltar 'jigs par blta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin
226b8(mdo sde): zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag med dam zhes 'jig rten 'di thams cad
227a1(mdo sde): 'dzin du nyul la/ zla ba phyed kyi tshes bcu bzhi la ni rgyal po chen po dag gis bu rnams ci mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang /
227a2(mdo sde): par 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi gtso bo la rim mor byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang /
227a3(mdo sde): bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang phyi ma la kha na mtho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye
227a4(mdo sde): bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag med dam zhes 'jig rten 'di thams cad la nyul lo// zla ba phyed kyi tshes bco lnga ni rgyal po ngan
227a5(mdo sde): bo de dag nyid ci/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten mar 'dzin pa dang / bar 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na gtso
227a6(mdo sde): bo la ri mor byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phye ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par
227a7(mdo sde): lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag med dpa zhes 'jig
227a8(mdo sde): rten 'di thams cad la nyul lo// gal te mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten pa na mar mi 'dzin pa dang / par mi 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer mi
227b1(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na gtso bo la ri mor mi byed pa dang / don mi byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa mi byed pa dang / bsod nams mi byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang
227b2(mdo sde): tshe phyi ma la kha nas ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par mi lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag mi byed pa/ gso sbyong la nye bar mi gnas pa dag dang / tshul
227b3(mdo sde): khrims yang dag par blangs te/ mi 'dug pa dag mang na ni rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lha'i mdun sa na/ chos bzangasu 'dus shing 'khod
227b4(mdo sde): pa'i nang du song nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'di shes par gyis shig/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar mi 'dzin pa dang / phar mi 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du
227b5(mdo sde): mi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi gtso bo la ri mor mi byed pa dang / don mi byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa mi byed pa dang / bsod nams mi byed pa dang /
227b6(mdo sde): tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par mi lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag mi byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar mi gnas pa dang / tshul khrim
227b7(mdo sde): yang dag par blangs te mi 'dug pa dag mang ngo zhes bsnyad do// de dag las thos nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams yid ma rangs nas/ yid ma rangs pa nyid kyang byir
227b8(mdo sde): zlog par byed de/ kye ma grogs po dag 'di ltar mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar mi 'dzin pa dang / bar mi 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer mi
228a1(mdo sde): 'dzina'adzin pa dang / rigs kyi gtso bo la ri mor mi byed pa dang / don mi byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa mi byed pa dang / bsod nams mi byed pa
228a2(mdo sde): dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par mi lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams ngag mi byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar mi gnas
228a3(mdo sde): ba dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te mi 'dug pa mang ba ni mi rnams kyi chos bzang po ma yin no// rkyen tu bab pa ma yin no legs pa ma yin no// dge ba ma
228a4(mdo sde): yin no// de ltar na lnga rnams kyi tshogs ni yongasu 'grib par 'gyur la/ lA ma yin rnams kyi tshogs ni mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// zhes zlas so// gal te mi
228a5(mdo sde): dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar 'dzin pa dang / bar 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi gtso bo la ri mor byed pa dang /
228a6(mdo sde): don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na tho ba rnam kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing
228a7(mdo sde): bsod nams dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag mang na ni/ rgyal po chen po rnams dang / su
228a8(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lha'i bdun sa chos bzangasu 'dus shing 'khor ba'i nang na song nas 'di skad du grogs po dag 'di shes par gyis shig/ mi dang mi ma yin
228b1(mdo sde): ba'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang / bar 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi gtso bo la ri mor byed pa dang / don byed pa
228b2(mdo sde): dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa sbyin zhing bsod
228b3(mdo sde): nams dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag mang ngo zhes snyad nas ni de dag las thos nas sum
228b4(mdo sde): bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams yi rangs te/ mgu bar gyur nas yid rang pa nyid kyang zlog par byed de/ kye ma grogs po dag 'di ltar mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na
228b5(mdo sde): mar 'dzin pa dang / bar 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi gtso bo la ri mor byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i
228b6(mdo sde): rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nas byed pa
228b7(mdo sde): dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag mang ba ni mi rnams kyi chos bzang ngo // rkyen du 'bab bo leg so//
228b8(mdo sde): dge'o// de ltar na lha rnams kyis tshegs ni mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur la/ lha ma yin rnams kyi tshogs ni yongasu 'grib par 'gyur ro// zhes zlos so// de
229a1(mdo sde): 'dzin@#/ nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i 'khor rab tu dga' la bde ba skyes par rig nas/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad bde sbas pa/
229a2(mdo sde): 'dir ni zla byed tshes brgyad dang / de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga dang / cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la'ang / gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la shin tu mnyam bzhag dam pa 'dapa
229a3(mdo sde): nga ci 'dra ba de 'drar 'gyur/ dge slong dag lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis gang 'di skad du/ 'dir ni zla phyed tshe brgyad dang / de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga la/ cho 'phrul gyi ni
229a4(mdo sde): zla byed la 'ang / gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la/ shin tu mnyam bzhag gnas byed 'dir/ nga ci 'dra ba de 'drar 'gyur/ zhes tshig su gcad pa smras pa de ni/ nye bar smras
229a5(mdo sde): ba yin gyis/ legs par smras pa ni ma yin no// nyes par stong pa yin gyi/ legs par stod pa ni ma yin no// nyes par brjod pa yin gyi/ legs par brjod pa ni
229a6(mdo sde): ma yin no// dge slong de dag ci'i phyir zhes na/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin de ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/ gti mug dang bcas pa ste/ skye ba dang
229a7(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'dod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongasu ma grol zhing /
229a8(mdo sde): sdug bsngal las yongasu ma grol lo// zhes nga smras pa'o// de lta bas na des gang 'di skad du/ 'dir ni zla phyed tshe brgyad dang / de bzhin bcu bzhi bcwo lnga dang /
229b1(mdo sde): cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la'ang / gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la// shin tu mnyam bzhag gnas byed 'dir// nga ci 'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur// zhes tshig su bcad
229b2(mdo sde): pa 'di nyes par smras pa yin gyi/ legs par smras pa ma yin no// nyes par bstod pa yin gyi// legs par bstod pa ma yin no// nye bar brjod pa yin no// legs
229b3(mdo sde): bar brjod pa ma yin no// dge slong dag dge slong gang dgra bcom pa yin zhing / zag pa zad pa bya ba byas/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor la/ bdag gis don rjesu thob
229b4(mdo sde): pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongasu zad pa/ yang dag par shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ des ni gang 'di skad du/ 'dir ni zla byed tshes brgyad dang /
229b5(mdo sde): de bzhin bcu bzhi bcwo lnga dang // cho 'phrul gyi zla byed la'ang / gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la// shin tu mnyam bzhag gnas byed 'dir// nga ci 'dra ba de bzhin
229b6(mdo sde): 'gyur zhes tshag su bcad pa 'di smras na/ legs par smras pa yin ste/ nyes par smras pa ma yin no// legs par bstod pa yin te/ nyes par bstod pa ma yin no//
229b7(mdo sde): legs par brjod pa yin te/ nyes par brjod pa ma yin no// dge slong dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba// zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti
229b8(mdo sde): mug dang bral ba ste/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / sde sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba rnams las yongs
230a1(mdo sde): 'dzina'agrol zhing / sdug bsngal las yongasu grol ba'o// zhes ngas se/ de lta bas na des gang 'di skad du/ 'dir ni zla byed chos brgyad
230a2(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin bcu bzhi bcwo lnga dang / cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la 'ang / gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la shin mnyam bzhag gnas byed 'dir/ nga ci 'dra bar de bzhin
230a3(mdo sde): 'gyur// zhes tshig su bcad pa 'di smras na/ legs par smras pa ma yin te/ nyes par smras pa ma yin no// legs par bstod pa yin te/ nyes pa stong pa ma yin// /
230a4(mdo sde): legs par brjod pa yin te/ nyes par brjod pa ma yin/ zhes gsungs so// 'dzam bu gling gi kho ra khor yug na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i lam dpag
230a5(mdo sde): tshad gcig tu gser gyis bye ma mngal te/ ba rgya mtsho chen po'i chus dbus mo// nub pa tsam du yongasu khyab po// gang gi tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig
230a6(mdo sde): rten du 'byung ba de'i tshe/ rgya mtsho chen po dpag tshad gnyis kyi bar du chu skam zhing med par 'gyur te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i lam yin no// bcom ldan 'das
230a7(mdo sde): kyis kyang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag sngon 'byung ba 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po glang po rin po che brtag par 'dod pas/ nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe glang po rin
230a8(mdo sde): la zhon nas/ sa chen po rgya mtsho la thug pa 'di nyid bskor te/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de nyid du song nas khye'u gsum gyi bya ba byed do// dge slong dag gzhan yang
230b1(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rta rin po che brtag par 'dod la/ nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe la zhon nas sa chen po rgya mtsho la thug pa 'di nyid bskor te/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor
230b2(mdo sde): de nyid du song nas khye'u gsum gyis bya ba byed do// zhes gsungs so// spyi sdom ni/ ri dang skye ba'i gnas dag dang / nam mkha' lding dang nyo tshong ba dang / grang ba dang ni lnga
230b3(mdo sde): bar byas/ dus tshigs kyang ni tha ma yin/ 'jig rten bdags pa las tshigs drug pa'o// // bam po gsum pa
230b4(mdo sde): sdom ni srungs ma lha'i grong khyer srang dang rnam rgyal byed/ chos bzangs rgyu ba'i lam dang / 'obs dang skyed mos 'tshal/ sa bzhi dang ni yongasu rdo dang blang chen rnams/ lnga
230b5(mdo sde): ma yin rnams kyis yang de dang 'dra ba yin/ lha'i grong khyer dang lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gyi bar du gsum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi/ srungs ma rnam pa lnga bkod pa la
230b6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ chu na gnas pa'i klung rnams dang / lag na yol god thogs pa'i lha rnams dang / phreng thogs kyi lha rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams dang / rgyal po
230b7(mdo sde): chen po gzhi rnams so// gang gi tshe lha ma yin rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / lhan gcig tu g.yul 'gyed par gyur pa de'i tshe/ dpung gyi tshogs yan la
230b8(mdo sde): bzhi pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams go cha gyon no// go cha rnams bzhi gyon la 'di lta ste/
231a1(mdo sde): 'anagaser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shes las byas pa rnams so// ga cha rnams gzhi gsar
231a2(mdo sde): las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams bgos nas/ mtshon cha rnams pa bzhi las 'di lta ste/
231a3(mdo sde): ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'bang mdung dang / mnga' bu rnams len to// mtshon cha ni rnam pa bzhi ral gri dang / mdud dang / 'phang mdung dang / mnga' zhu rnams blangs
231a4(mdo sde): nas/ dpung gi tshogs glang po che'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams kyi go cha 'gos te/ go cha rnams pa bzhi/ gser las byas
231a5(mdo sde): dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams bgos nas/ mtshon cha rnam bzhi/ ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang /
231a6(mdo sde): mda' zhu rnams blangs te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang 'gyed pa'i phyir/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer nas byung ba de dag/ chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams kyis mthong /
231a7(mdo sde): mthong nas chun gnas pa'i klu rnams kyang / dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu
231a8(mdo sde): chung gi tshogs rnams kyis go cha bgos te/ go cha rnams bzhi gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams
231b1(mdo sde): bgos nas/ mtshon cha rnams bzhi/ ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / mda' zhu rnams blangs te/ lha ma yin rnams dang / lhan cig tu g.yul 'gye'o//
231b2(mdo sde): der gal te klu rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams 'pham par gyur na ni klu rnams kyis/ lha ma yin rnams thub cing 'pham par byed te/ zlog cing rgyab ston cing 'pham par
231b3(mdo sde): byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gal te lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ klu rnams 'pham na ni/ lha ma yin rnams kyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
231b4(mdo sde): lha rnams kyis bsrungs ma dang po klu rnams thub cing 'pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston cing 'pham par byas nas/ rgya mtsho chen po nas ri'i rgyal po rid kyi ngang
231b5(mdo sde): rim dang po lag na yol god thogs kyis lha rnams gang na 'khod par rna zhing 'gro'o// de nas lag na yol lo gang thogs kyis lha rnams dang / chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams dang /
231b6(mdo sde): srungs ma gnyis gcig tu spongs nas lha ma yin dang / lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// der gal te srungs ma gnyis rgyal te/ lha rnams 'pham na ni/ bsrung ma gnyis rgyal
231b7(mdo sde): te/ lha ma yin rnams 'pham na ni/ bsrung ma gnyis kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing 'pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du
231b8(mdo sde): 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gal te lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ bsrungs ma gnyis 'pham na ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi bsrungs ma gnyis lha ma yin rnams kyis thub
232a1(mdo sde): #/ @ nga ma ma ma tsha

232b1(mdo sde): byas nas lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gal te lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ srungs ma gzhi po rnams 'jam na ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srung
232b2(mdo sde): ma bzhi po dag lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing 'pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim gsum pa nas/ bzhi pa rgyal po chen
232b3(mdo sde): po bzhi pa rnams gang na 'khod par rtsu zhing 'gro'o// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams dang / phreng thogs kyi lha rnams dang / lhag na yol
232b4(mdo sde): god thogs kyi lha rnams dang / chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / srung ma lnga po rnams gcig tu spongs nas/ lha ma yin rnams dang / lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// der gal
232b5(mdo sde): te skung ma lnga po rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams 'pham na ni/ srungs ma lnga po rnams kyis thub cing 'pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab sten par byas nas/ lha ma
232b6(mdo sde): yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gal te lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ srungs ma lnga po rnams 'pham na ni/ sum bcu rtsa gsum po rnams kyi/ lha ma yin rnams
232b7(mdo sde): kyis rngub cing 'pham par byas te/ bzlog te rgyab ston par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi 'ang rim bzhi pa nas steng gi gzhi sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams gang
232b8(mdo sde): na 'khod bar du zhi 'gror// de nas rgyal po chen po la rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gangan ba der sang na byin nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang ba rgya byin la 'di skad ces pas/
233a1(mdo sde): 'dzinakye'u shi ka gang bdag cag srungs ma lnga po rnams lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing 'bam par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas/
233a2(mdo sde): ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng gi gzhir nus ste/ mchis pas mkhyen par mdzod cig/ kye'u shi ka da ltar gang gi dus la bab par dgongs shig/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya
233a3(mdo sde): byin gyi rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyis ltar mnyan nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag gang srungs ma lnga po rnams lha ma yin rnams kyi
233a4(mdo sde): mthus thub cing phab par byas te/ bzlog bcing rgyab ston par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng gi gzhir nur te/ 'ongs par shes par gyis shig/ grogs pa
233a5(mdo sde): dag gi da ltar gis dus la bab par soms shig/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po rgya byin gyis/ glang+ga che'i rgyal po rab stan la bsam so// des nas glang po che'i rgyal po
233a6(mdo sde): rab brtan gyis lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyi mtshan ma rtogs nas/ dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lags pa bskums pa las kyang ba'am/ brkyang ba las skum
233a7(mdo sde): pa bzhin du glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan 'dzam bu'i gling nas mi snang bar 'gyur te/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song ngo // song nas mgo bo sum cu rtsa gnyis
233a8(mdo sde): mngon par sprul te/ mgo bo re re la mche ba drug drug/ mche ba re re la yang rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu re re la pad ma bdun bdun/ pad ma re re la sdong bu bdun bdun/
233b1(mdo sde): sdong bu re re la lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo re re la g.yog mo bdun bdun/ g.yog me re re la sil snyan bdun bdun/ mngon par sprul ste/ mgo bo de dag thams
233b2(mdo sde): cad kyi nang na khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin pa de lha'i dbang po rgya byin zhe no// de las gzhan pa'i mgo bo lhag ma rnams ni nye dbang po sum cu rtsa gnyis po rnams
233b3(mdo sde): zhon no// de las gzhan pa'i glang po che rnams la ni/ de bas gzhan pa'i sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams zhon no// de shin tu mgyogs pa ste dper na 'jig pa'i klung
233b4(mdo sde): ngam 'chags pa'i rlung bzhin te/ de na lha 'am lha'i bu mo su yang 'di snyam du/ 'di ni bdag gi mdun du 'gro'o zhes 'am/ phyi nas 'ong ngo snyam du sems pa med do//
233b5(mdo sde): de nas glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgo nas byung ste/ skyed mo tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal du phyin nas rdzu 'phrul mngon
233b6(mdo sde): par 'du byed pa de btang ste/ 'di lta ste lha 'am lha'i bu mo rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gang yang rung ba dang / 'dra bar bdag mngon par sprul te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
233b7(mdo sde): rnams dang / lhan gcig tu lha'i dog pa lnga dag 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur te/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu myong nyams du myong ngo //
233b8(mdo sde): ji tsam du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams/ skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal du rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa de tsam du lus kyang rtsub par 'gyur la/ sems kyang
234a1(mdo sde): 'dzin#brtsub par 'gyur te/ de dag lus brtsub pa dang sems brtsub pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa la mngon par mos par gyur nas/ dpung
234a2(mdo sde): gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams go cha gyon ste/ dpung bu
234a3(mdo sde): chung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta'i tsho gas dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshegs rnams kyis go cha rnam
234a4(mdo sde): gzhi 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shes las byas pa rnams dgos so// go cha rnams zhi 'di gser
234a5(mdo sde): las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams dgos nas/ mtshon cha thogs nas/ mtshon cha rnams bzhi 'di lta ste/
234a6(mdo sde): ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / mda' zhu rnams blangs so// mtshon cha bzhi ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / mda' zhu rnams blangs nas/
234a7(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams dang / lhan gcig tu g.yul 'gyed do// ji ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams 'pham na ni/ lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing 'pham par
234a8(mdo sde): byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas/ shing rtag byang phyog su lha'i pho brang gi grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go/ 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams kyi phyi bzhin du stegs
234b1(mdo sde): par byed na ni/ der lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin snyegs pa las na/ yang lan gnyi su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do//
234b2(mdo sde): snyam du shes nas lha rnams phyir ldog te/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan gcig tu g.yul byed do// gal te lan gnyi su yang lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams pham na ni/
234b3(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams kyi sa lha rnams thub cing 'pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas na/ shing rta'i byang phyogasu lha'i grong khyer gang na/ bar phyir log go/ 'on
234b4(mdo sde): kyang lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin du snyegs par byed na ni/ der lha rnams 'di snyam du sems so// 'di ltar ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyegs
234b5(mdo sde): pa las na/ yang lan gsum du g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do// snyam du shes nas lha rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha ma yin rnams dang / lhan gcig tu g.yul 'gyed do//
234b6(mdo sde): gal te lha ma yin rnams 'ba' zhig rgyal te/ lha rnams pham na ni/ lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing 'pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par
234b7(mdo sde): byas nas/ lha'i grong khyer du 'jug go/ lha'i grong khyer du zhugs nas sgo rnams bcad de/ lha rnams la lha ma yin kyang mi tshugs kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang
234b8(mdo sde): ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas so// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams kyis der mi rdzi bzhin du lha ma yin rnams kyang / 'di ltar lha rnams la ni/ lha ni'i grong khyer
235a1(mdo sde): 'dzin#na 'dug kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyi/ bdag cag gis der mi rdzi'o// snyam du shes pa'i
235a2(mdo sde): mthong bar 'jug go/ gal te lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams 'bam na ni/ lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing 'pham par byas te/ bzlog cing
235a3(mdo sde): rgyab ston par byas nas/ shing rta lho phyogasu lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang na bar phyir bzlog go/ 'on kyang lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin du stegs par byed na ni/ der
235a4(mdo sde): ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'di bdag cag gi phyi bzhin snyegs pa las na/ yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do// snyam du shes
235a5(mdo sde): nas lha ma yin phyir log ste/ lha rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// gal te lan gnyi su yang lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams 'pham na ni/ lha rnams
235a6(mdo sde): kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing 'pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas/ shing rta lho phyogasu lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go//
235a7(mdo sde): 'on kyang lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin du snyegs par byed na ni/ der lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di lta lha 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du bsnyegs pa las
235a8(mdo sde): na yang lan gsum du g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do// snyam du shes nas lha ma yin rnams phyir log ste/ lha rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed/ gal te lan gsuM
235b1(mdo sde): du lha rnams 'ba' zhig rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams 'pham na ni/ lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing 'pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas
235b2(mdo sde): nas lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'jug go// lha ma yin grong khyer du zhugs nas sgo bcad do// lha ma yin rnams la lha rnams kyis mi tshugs kyang 'jigs shing skrag
235b3(mdo sde): pa dang / ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas so// 'on kyang lha rnams kyis der mi rdzi zhing / lha rnams kyang 'di ltar/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer na 'dug kyang 'jig
235b4(mdo sde): shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyi/ bdag cag gis ni der mi rdzi'o// snyam du shes pa mthong ba 'jug go// bcom ldan 'das kyi
235b5(mdo sde): kyang 'di skad du dge slong dag/ sngon byung ba'i lha dang lha ma yin g.yul du zhugs pa na/ lha ma yin rgyal rnams te/ lha rnams 'pham na ni lha ma yin gyis/ lha rnas
235b6(mdo sde): thub cing 'pham par byas nas/ shing rta'i byang phyogasu lha'i grong khyer gang na bar phyir log go/ 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams dang / lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin du sreg
235b7(mdo sde): bar byed na ni/ der lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gis phyi bzhin du snyegs pa las na/ yang lan gnyi su g.yul
235b8(mdo sde): 'gyed par 'dod do// snyam du shes nas lha rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// gal te lan gnyis su yang lha ma yin rnaMs
236a1(mdo sde): 'jin@#/ rgyal te/ lha rnams 'jam na ni/ lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing 'pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas/
236a2(mdo sde): shing rta byang phyogasu lha'i grong khyer gang na bar ldog go/ 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams kyi phyi bzhin du snyegs par byed na ni/ der lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di
236a3(mdo sde): ltar lha ma yin 'di dang bdag cag gis phyi bzhin du snyegs pa las na/ yang lan gsum du g.yul 'gyed do// snyam du shes nas lha rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha ma yin
236a4(mdo sde): rnams dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed do// dge slong dag gal te lha ma yin rnams 'ba' shig rgyal te/ lha rnams 'pham na ni/ lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub
236a5(mdo sde): cing 'pham par byas te/ zlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas/ lha'i grong khyer du 'jug go// lha'i grong khyer du zhugs nas/ sgo rnams bcad do// lha rnams la lba
236a6(mdo sde): ma yin rnams kyis mi tshugs kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas ches gnas so// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams kyis der mi brdzi bzhin du/
236a7(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams kyis 'di ltar lha rnams ni lha'i grong khyer na 'dug kyang / 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyi/ bdag
236a8(mdo sde): cag gis der mi brdzi'o// snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba 'dug go/ dge slong dag 'di ltar snga ma 'das pa'i dus na lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul du zhugs pa
236b1(mdo sde): na lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams 'pham na ni/ lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas/ shing
236b2(mdo sde): rta lho phyogasu lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha rnams lnga ma yin rnams kyi phyi bzhin du snyegs par byed na ni/ der lha ma yin rnam
236b3(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du stegs pa las na/ yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do/ snyam du shes
236b4(mdo sde): nas/ lha ma yin rnams phyir log ste/ lha rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// gal te lan gnyi su yang lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams 'pham na ni/
236b5(mdo sde): lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog bcing brgya pa so// zla ba khams pa lta bur yongasu 'grub pa dang / ba lang mi mgo lta bu dang /
236b6(mdo sde): me long rnams kyang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi yod do// dbyibs legs shing blta
236b7(mdo sde): na sdug la mdzes pa yin no// sgo re re ru sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bsrungs pa'i phyir dang / bskyab pa'i phyir dang / mdzes par bya ba'i phyir bsrung ma go cha
236b8(mdo sde): dges shing mtshon cha thogs pa lnga brgya lnga rgya bkod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lam srang srid du/ dpag tshad nyi stong lnga brgya yod la/ zheng du dpag
237a1(mdo sde): 'dzin tshad bcu gnyis yod pa dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal cing / tsan dan gyi chus chag
237a2(mdo sde): chag btab pa dag de/ srang de'i ngos g.yas g.yon na/ rdzing bu gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shal las
237a3(mdo sde): byas pa'i nga gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs pa'i rdzing dag yod do// rdzing de dag gi phyogs bzhin them skas byas pa yod de/ jim skas de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ gser
237a4(mdo sde): las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i ba gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing de dag gi lan kan/ gser
237a5(mdo sde): las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shes las byas pa rnams pa bzhis kun nas skor te/ gser gyi lan kan gyi rten
237a6(mdo sde): ma dang / gaka' nan dang / shar pa ni dngul las byas so// dngul gyi ni gser las byas so// bai DUr+ya'i shel las byas so// shel gyi lan kan gyi rten ma dang /
237a7(mdo sde): gnya' nan dang / shar ba ni bai DUr+ya las byas te/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes so// rdzing dag kyang chu bsil zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang te/ mi
237a8(mdo sde): tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma kar pos yongasu khye ba te/ de dag na chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang skad/
237b1(mdo sde): yid du 'ongs pa dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod rgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// rdzing de dag gi nye 'khor na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang /
237b2(mdo sde): 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing / dbyibs legs la yongasu grub pa ste/ me tog thod bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog phreng rgyud dam/
237b3(mdo sde): me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas/ me tog gi phreng ba tha gu la rgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna brgyan legs par byas pa bzhin ste/ skam las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan
237b4(mdo sde): cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod rgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// de dag gi nye 'khor na dpag bsam gyi
237b5(mdo sde): shing ljon pa dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go// gzhag gos dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / gser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar
237b6(mdo sde): po dag go/ dpag bsam shing las byung ba'i/ gos dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go/ rgyan sna tshogs lag brgyan dang / rkang
237b7(mdo sde): brgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo dag gis ji lta bur 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma thag tu/ de lta bu de dag gi
237b8(mdo sde): lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rol mo'i cha spyang sna tshogs pi 'ang dang / gling bu dang / bang bar rgyud gsum ba dang / khar rnga dang / sgra sman rnams 'byung ba'i shing ldan pa dag yong ngo //
238a1(mdo sde): lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma thag tu/ de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyuraro// bdud rtsi rnams pa bzhi dang / sbrang
238a2(mdo sde): rtsi dang / sbrang chang gis gtung ba dag kyang yod do// yang tog rnams dang / khang brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / gsil khang rnams dang / bltad mo lnga
238a3(mdo sde): ba'i sa rnams dang / sti khang rnams bud med kyis mdzes par byas shing lha'i bu mo mang pos/ bstan pa dang / sil snyan dang / phag rdo ba dag gi sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs
238a4(mdo sde): kyis legs par bsgom pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang ldan pa dag kyang yod de/ de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa brtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod
238a5(mdo sde): do// rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyam su myong ngo // lha'i grong khyer gyi dbus na/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba/ chur dpag tshad gnyid brgya
238a6(mdo sde): lnga bcu brgyar yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod de// lha'i grong khyer las dpag tshad
238a7(mdo sde): phyed dang lngas gyen tu 'phags so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed de'i rmang rten pa bzhi las byas pa la 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las
238a8(mdo sde): byas pa dang / shel las byas rnams so// khang bzangs blar rgyal byed kyi them pa rnam pa bzhi bkod pa la 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / de
238a9(mdo sde): las byung ba dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed kyi ka ba rnam pa bzhi btsugs pa la 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas
238b1(mdo sde): pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams te/ gser gyi ka ba ni ka brten dang ka zhu dang / bre phul dang / gdung rnams dngul las byas so// bai DUr+ya ni/ shel
238b2(mdo sde): las byas so// shel gyi ni ka rten dang / ka shu dang bre phul dang / gdung bai DUr+ya las byas so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed de'i phya ma rten rnam pa bzhi las byas pa dag yod de//
238b3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed la/ phyam stobs dang
238b4(mdo sde): ldan pa rnams pa bzhi las byas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnamaso// khang
238b5(mdo sde): bzangs rnam par rgyal byed las them ska de dag ni 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa
238b6(mdo sde): bzhi brtsigs so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed la lan kar gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam bzhis kun nas bskor te/ gser
238b7(mdo sde): gyi lan kan gyi rten ma dang / gnya' nan dang / shar pa ni dngul las byas so// dngul gyi ni gser las so// bai DUr+ya'i ni shel las so// shel gyi rten dang / gnye' nan
238b8(mdo sde): shar ba ni bai dur+ya las so// // bar sdom ni/ rmang rten theb pa ka ba dang / phye ma rten dang stobs ldan bya ma/ 'khor sa dang ni spang leb khang / ya phub sa dag ni tha
