238b9(mdo sde): ma yin/ khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed la ba gam brgyad yod de/ ba ga ma re re la yang khang pa brtsegs pa bdun bdun yod do// khang pa brtsegs pa re re la yang gnas
239a1(mdo sde): khang bdun bdun/ gnas khang re re la yang lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu me re re la yang g.yog mo bdun bdun/ g.yog mo re re la yang sil
239a2(mdo sde): snyan bdun bdun yod do// khang bzang rnam par rgyal byed kyi nang na rdzing bu byas pa yod do// rdzing bu de la chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ kha tshon du yang dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha'
239a3(mdo sde): bskor du dpag tshad nyis brgya yod do// rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhi na/ them skas byas pa dag yod de/ them skas de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul
239a4(mdo sde): las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa'i pha gu rnam par bzhis rtsigs so// rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhir yang lan kar dag gis kun nas bskor te/ lan kar rnam
239a5(mdo sde): pa bzhi dag gis snga ma bzhin te/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ chu bsil zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ste/ me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mun
239a6(mdo sde): ta dang / pad ma kar pos yongasu khe bas la/ chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan bcing 'jobs pa dang / mdzes pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang /
239a7(mdo sde): 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan par 'byin to// rdzing bu de'i nyen dkor na me tog shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa rnam pa sna tshogs yod pa rnam
239a8(mdo sde): legs par skyes shing / dbyibs legs la yongasu grub pa ste/ me tog thong bzhin gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas/ me tog gi phreng ba tha gu
239a9(mdo sde): la rgyus pa dang / me tog gi rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ skams las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing / 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad
239b1(mdo sde): nyen pa dang / 'dong gur rgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan par 'byin to// dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang /
239b2(mdo sde): dmar po dang / dkar po dag go/ bzhag gos dag rnam pa bzhi ste sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go/ dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i gos/
239b3(mdo sde): dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / rgyan sna tshogs lag brgyan dang / rkang brgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba dag byu ba/ shing
239b4(mdo sde): ljon pa dag yod do// rol mo'i cha spyad sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ pi bang dang / gling bu dang / pi bang rgyud gsum pa dang / khar rnga dang / sgra snyan rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag
239b5(mdo sde): yod do// lha dang lha'i bu mo rnams kyi ji lta bur 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma thag tu/ de lta bu de dag gis lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud ci rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang chang gi
239b6(mdo sde): btung ba dag kyang yod do// yang tog rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad me blta ba'i
239b7(mdo sde): sa rnams dang / bsti khang rnams bud med kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mo mang pos bsten pa dang / bsil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa de dag gi sgra sgrogs pa dang /
239b8(mdo sde): dri sna tshogs kyis legs par bsgos pa dang / bza' ba dang btung ba dang ldan pa yod do// de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgu
239b9(mdo sde): spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyam su myong ngo // lha'i grong khyer gyi shar lho mtshams na/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi/ lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs shes bya ba yod
240a1(mdo sde): de/ chur dpag tshad sum brgya/ rgyar yang dag tshad sum brgya/ mtha' bskor du yang dpag tshad dgu rgya mdzad// lha'i grong khyer las
240a2(mdo sde): dpag tshad byed dang bzhis 'phags so// lha'i mdun sa ches bzangs kyi sa bzhi dang / yang tog dang / dpag pa dang / spyi 'dus kyi bdud dang / yang tog gi rtse gzhi dang /
240a3(mdo sde): bya mas gzungs dang / byam dgu po thams cad shel las byas pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul
240a4(mdo sde): las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams pa bzhis kun nas bskor to// de la sgo dang ya phubs dang g+ha na dang / yang tog gi rtse bzhi dang / lu na
240a5(mdo sde): dang / phya ma dgu po yod de/ phya ma dgu po re re la yang ka ba bcu drug bcu drug gi kun nas brten to// rgyu ba'i lam ni rim pa bdun yod do// de'i dbus ni bai DUr+ya las byas
240a6(mdo sde): ba'i ka ba zur brgyad pa gsal zhing phan med pa mtshan dang ldan pa ba zhig yod de/ skra'i rtse mo tsam gyis khang pa brtsegs pa spyi 'dus kyi rten la mi reg go/ de'i 'og na
240a7(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khri bzang po dang / sum bcu gsum pa'i lha lhag ma rnams kyi khri bshams pa yod pa/ der sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'dus shing 'khod nas/
240a8(mdo sde): lha rnams dang mi rnams kyi don dang / chos sems shing dpyod de yongasu rtog par byed do// lha'i grong khyer na rgyu ba'i lam kha mtshan du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs
240a9(mdo sde): legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal cing tsan dan gyi chu chag chag btab pa yod do/ de'i ngos g.yas g.yon na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i
240b1(mdo sde): shing ljon pa dang / sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs par yongasu grub ste/ me tog thog bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog phreng rgyud dam/
240b2(mdo sde): me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ skam las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad
240b3(mdo sde): snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can rnams skad sten par 'byin to// lha'i grong khyer 'obs bdun
240b4(mdo sde): rims kyi kun nas bskor te/ 'obs de dag kyang zabs dang / kha mtshon du dpag tshad gcig cig tsam yod de/ pha gu gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa
240b5(mdo sde): bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams bzhis brtsigs la chu bsil zhing / chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang te/ me te go ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku
240b6(mdo sde): mu ta dang / pad ma dkar pos yongasu khebs la/ chu na gnas pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad gnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sbyar
240b7(mdo sde): ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// 'ob de dag ni chus dka' dang / rgyu mo khung dang / gru sna tshogs byas pa dag yod de/ de na sum cu rtsa gsuM pa'i lha rnam chu'i rtse mo la rtse zhing
240b8(mdo sde): dga' la dga' mgur spyodado// 'obru de dag gi nyen dkor na/ me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs yod pa rnaMs legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongasu grub pa ste/ me to/
240b9(mdo sde): thod bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog phreng rgyud de// me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkha ba/ be tog phreng ba tha gu la rgyus pa dang / me tog rna rgyan leg pa byas pa bzhin te/ skaM lA skyes pa'i bya sna tshog skad snyan cing 'dzeb pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang /
241a1(mdo sde): skad gnyen pa dang / 'dod dkur sbyar ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// de na sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang
241a2(mdo sde): bcas par rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // lha'i grong khyer gyi shar phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i
241a3(mdo sde): lha rnams kyi skyed mos 'tshal shing ta sna tshogs can zhes bya ba yod de/ tshur dpag tshad nyi rgya lnga bcu/ rgyar dpag tshad nyi brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du yang dpag tshad stong
241a4(mdo sde): yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi ra bas kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod la/ ra ba de la cog gser
241a5(mdo sde): las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi yod do// gyen tu 'phang ba dang / thur du 'phyang ba'i mda'
241a6(mdo sde): yab dang / bsti khang rnam pa bzhi yod do// gser las byas pa dang / dngul byas pa dang / bai dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// de'i nang gi
241a7(mdo sde): sa zhi dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes gser gyi bye ma bdal cing shin tu dkra ba mtshon brgya brtsa cig gis bkra ba ste/ 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni/ dper
241a8(mdo sde): na shing bal mdab ma 'am/ ras bal gyi mdab ma bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag pa ni nems shes byed/ rkang pa bteg na ni par ces byed la/ me tog ma da ra ba mang pos rus
241b1(mdo sde): mo nub pa tsam du yongasu khyabs ste/ rlung gi mthus me tog skyings pa rnams ni 'dor// me tog bsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems te/ ji skad du lbabu skyong rnams dbang
241b2(mdo sde): gi rkyen gyis na/ shing rta sna tshogs can na rlung chen ldang / me tog snyid pa rnams ni 'dor ba byed/ me tog sar ba rnams ni legs par 'grems// shes 'byung ba lta bu'o//
241b3(mdo sde): skyed mo 'tshal shing rta sna tshogs can gyi nang na/ rdzing bu zhig yod de/ chur dpag lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyi rgya yod de/ rdzing de yang
241b4(mdo sde): gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / be du r+ya las bla dang / shel las byas pa'i phagu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing de'i phyogs bzhin them skas
241b5(mdo sde): byas pa yod de/ thems skas de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang / de dul las byas pa dang / bai dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las bya ba'i pha gu rnams pa bzhis brtsigaso//
241b6(mdo sde): rdzing de'i lan kar gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / be durar+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ chu bsil
241b7(mdo sde): ba dang / chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang zhing me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma kar pos yongasu byebs la/ chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad
241b8(mdo sde): snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ongs pa dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan po dag 'byin to// rdzing de'i nyen kor na/ me tog
242a1(mdo sde): gi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing / dbyibs legs pa la yongasu grub pa dag yod de/
242a2(mdo sde): me tog thod bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog phreng rgyud ngam/ me tog phreng rgyud kyi bslob ma mkhas pos/ me tog gi phreng ba tha gul brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rnangan
242a3(mdo sde): legs par byas bzhin te/ skams las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can rnams
242a4(mdo sde): skad snyan pa dag 'byin to// dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dag rnam pa bzhi te/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go/ bzhag gos dag rnam pa
242a5(mdo sde): bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go/ dpag bsam shing las byung ba'i gos dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang
242a6(mdo sde): dkar po dag go/ rgyan sna tshogs lag brgyan dang / rkang brgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba dang rnams/ 'byung ba'i shin ljon pa dag yod do// rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs
242a7(mdo sde): 'di wa stA te/ pi bang dang / gling bu dang / pi dang rgyud gsum pa dang / khar rnga dang / sgra snyan pa dag rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod do// lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams
242a8(mdo sde): ji lta bu'i sems skyed ma thag tu/ de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyu ro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang tsi dang sbrang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do// yang thog rnams dang /
242b1(mdo sde): khang pa rtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / lhad mo blta ba'i sa rnams dang / bsti khang rnams bud med kyi tshogs
242b2(mdo sde): kyis mdzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mo mang pos bsten pa dang / bsil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag gis sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs kyis legs par bsgos
242b3(mdo sde): pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / ldan pa dag yod de/ de na sum bcu rtsa gsum lha rnams g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de/ rang gi
242b4(mdo sde): las kyi 'bras bu nyamasu myong ngo // de'i lam chur dpag tshad nyi shu kha tshon du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal cing /
242b5(mdo sde): tsan dan gi chus chag btab pa yod de/ de'i ngos g.yon na/ me tog gi shing ljon pa 'am/ 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs pa lta
242b6(mdo sde): na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal cing yongasu grub pa dag yod de/ me tog gi thod bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog gi phreng ba rgyud dam/ me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas
242b7(mdo sde): pas/ me tog gi phreng ba za gu la rgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ skam las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad shin tu yod du 'ong ba dang /
242b8(mdo sde): skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can rnams skad sman pa 'byin to// dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dam
243a1(mdo sde): po dang / dkar po dag go// dpag bsam shing las byung ba'i gos dag rnams pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang
243a2(mdo sde): dkar po dag go// bzhag gos dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go/ dpag bsam shing las byung ba'i gos dag rnam pa bzhi ste/
243a3(mdo sde): sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go// rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pi bang dang / gling bu dang / bi dang rgyud gsum dang / khar rnga dang / sgra snyan rnams
243a4(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod do// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang brgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am lha'i bu
243a5(mdo sde): me rnams kyis ji ltar ba'i 'dod pa'i sems skyed ma thag tu/ de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'gyur ro// lam de na gzhon pa sna tshogs bkod pa ni 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i zhon pa dang /
243a6(mdo sde): rta'i bzhon pa dang / shing rta'i zhon pa dang / khyogs kyi bzhon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams dkyis bzhon pa'i ji lta bu 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu'i
243a7(mdo sde): bzhon pa la zhon par 'gyur ro// skyed mo 'tshal shing rta sna tshogs can du dong nas rtse shing dga' mgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyam su myed ngo // ci'i phyir skyed
243a8(mdo sde): mo 'tshal ming shing rta sna tshogs can na/ dzaMd sna tshogs zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa sna tshogs dang / lo ma sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs dang /
243b1(mdo sde): gos dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / lha'i bu mo sna tshogs yod pa/ gang gi tshe sum bcu rtsa bsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can du rtse zhing dga' la dga'
243b2(mdo sde): mgur spyod pa/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // de'i tshe yang rnam par sna tshogs kyis shin tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu
243b3(mdo sde): nyam su myong nas de'i phyir skyed mo 'tshal gyi ming shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya'o// skyed mo mtshal shing rta sna tshogs can gyi shar phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sa bzhi bzang po sna tshog
243b4(mdo sde): shes bya ba yod de/ mtshur yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ rgyar yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du yang dpag tshad spong yod pa dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la
243b5(mdo sde): mdzes pa/ lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / be durar+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ gser gyi lan kan gyi
243b6(mdo sde): brten ma dang / gnya' gnan dang / shar pa ni dngul las byas so// dngul gyi ni gser las byas so// shel gyi rten ma dang / gnya' gnan dang / shar pa ni be dur+ya las byas so// /
243b7(mdo sde): de'i nang gi sa gzhi dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ bkra shing shin du bkra ba mtshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bkra ba ste/ 'jam zhing shin du 'jam pa ni/ dper na shing bal
243b8(mdo sde): byi mda' ma 'am/ ras bal gyi mda' ma bzhin te/ rkang pa gzhag na ni ma shes byed/ rkar ba bteg na ni par ces byed la/ me tog man da rab nang mang pos pus mo nub pa tsam du
244a1(mdo sde): yongs su khebs te/ de ni mi ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus me tog snying pa rnams ni 'dor/ me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems te/
244a2(mdo sde): ji skad du lha rnams las kyi dbang gi rkyen gyis na/ sa gzhi sna tshogs can na rlung chen po ldang / me tog snying pa rnams ni 'dor bar byed/ me tog sar pa rnam ni legs par 'grems
244a3(mdo sde): shes 'byung ba lta bu'o// de'i lam srid du dpag tshad nyi shu kha tshon du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal bcing
244a4(mdo sde): tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod de/ de'i ngos g.yas g.yon na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa/ sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes
244a5(mdo sde): shing dbyibs legs la yongasu grub pa dag yod do// me tog thod bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog phreng rgyud dam/ me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas/ me tog
244a6(mdo sde): gi phreng ba tha gu la rgyus pa dang / me tog gi brgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ skam las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad gnyen pa dang /
244a7(mdo sde): 'dor dgur gyi ba'i gzugs can skad snyan par 'byin to// dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dang / sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag rnams pa bzhi yod de/
244a8(mdo sde): bzhag gos dag sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsaM kyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang /
244b1(mdo sde): dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rol mo'i cha spyad sna tshogs pi bang dang / gling bu dang / pi bang rgyud gsum pa dang / khar rnga dang / sgra snyan rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod do//
244b2(mdo sde): rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod sems
244b3(mdo sde): bskyed ma thag tu/ de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// lam de na bzhon pa sna tshogs bkod pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i gzhon pa dang / rta'i gzhon pa dang / shing rta'i
244b4(mdo sde): gzhon pa dang / khyogs kyi bzhon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am lha'i bu rnams kyis sa gzhon pa ji lta bu 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma thag tu/ de lta bu'i gzhon pa 'ong bar 'gyur te/
244b5(mdo sde): de las zhon sna tshogs can du 'dong zhing ci bder gnas pas mngon par dga' bar byed do// de na lha'i drang srong rnams rang dgar tshangs pAr spyod do// de bzhin du lha'i grong khyer gyi
244b6(mdo sde): lce'i phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na skyed mo 'tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal zhes bya ba yod do// chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ rgyar yang dpag tshad nyi rgya lnga bcu/ mthar skor tu dpag tshad
244b7(mdo sde): nyi shu na skyed mos tshal brtsub 'gyur tshal zhes bya ba yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu// mtha' skor tu dpag tshad stong yod la/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes
244b8(mdo sde): pa/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ rgyar yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor tu dpag tshad stong yod la/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes la/ gser
244b9(mdo sde): rkyar yang dpa' tshad nyid brgya lnga lu/
245a1(mdo sde): gyi dra bas kun nas bskor te// ra ba'i 'phang du ni dpag tshad gcig yod de/ shing rta sna tshogs can ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyas par byas//
245a2(mdo sde): bye brag ni 'di yin te// ci'i phyir skye mo tshal gyi ming btsu pa 'gyur 'tshal zhes bya zhe na// smras pa/ bskyed mos tshal btsu pa 'gyur tshal na rdzing bu rtsub 'gyur zhes bya ba dang /
245a3(mdo sde): shing rnams dang // lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang // 'bras bu rnams dang // gos rnams dang // rgyan rnams kyang btsub par 'gyur ba dang // lha'i
245a4(mdo sde): bu mo brtsub 'gyur ba rnams yod la// gang gi tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi bskyed mo sa rtsub 'gyur tshal tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de// de'i tshe
245a5(mdo sde): yang lus kyang rtsub par 'gyur zhing // sems kyang brtsub par 'gyur te/ g.yul las mos par 'gyur bas nas// de'i phyir bskyed mos tshal gyi ming yang rtsub
245a6(mdo sde): 'gyur 'tshal zhes bya'o// bskyed mo tshal brtsub 'gyur tshal gyi lho phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na// sa bzhi bzang po bcu ba 'gyur zhes bya ba yod de// tshur dpag tshad nyi
245a7(mdo sde): rgya lnga bcu// rgyar yang dpag tshod nyi rgya lnga bcu// mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod de/ sa bzhi bzang po sna tshogs can ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// lha'i
245a8(mdo sde): grong khyer gyi nub phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na// skyed mo la 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya ba yod de/ mtshur dpag tshad nyi rgya lnga bcu/ rgyar yang dpag nyis brgya lnga bcu mtha' skor du dpag
245b1(mdo sde): tshar stong yod pa/ gser gyi rabs kun nas skor te/ ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod de/ lnga ma rnams ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// bye brag ni/
245b2(mdo sde): 'di yin te/ ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya na/ smras pa/ skyed mos tshal na/ rdzing 'dres pa zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang /
245b3(mdo sde): me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / gos rnams dang / rgyan rnams 'dres pa dang / lha'i bu mo rnams 'dres pa yod la/ gang gis tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i rnams pa'i
245b4(mdo sde): skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshal na rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa'i tshe yang tshol bar 'dres te shin du rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su mod
245b5(mdo sde): bas na de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya'o// skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshal gyi nub phyogs su dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sa gzhi bzang po 'dri zhes bya ba
245b6(mdo sde): yod do// mchur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ rgyar yang dpag tshad nyi rgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod de/ sa bzhi bzang po snga ma rnams ji lta ba bzhin du
245b7(mdo sde): rgyas par brjod par bya'o// lha'i 'grong khyer gyi byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya ba yod do// mtshur dpag tshan+da nyis brgya lnga bcu/
245b8(mdo sde): rgyar yang dpag tshad nyi brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod pa/ gser gyi bas kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i 'bang du ni dpag tshad gcig yod de/
246a1(mdo sde): snga ma rnams ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du/ brjod par bya'o// bye brag ni 'di yin te/ ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming dga' tshal zhes bya zhe na/
246a2(mdo sde): smras pa/ skyed mos tshal na dga' tshal rdzing bu dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / gos rnams dang / rgyan rnams
246a3(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / lha'i bu mo dga' ba rnams yod la gang gi tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal du rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa de'i tshe/ yang kun tu dga'
246a4(mdo sde): zhing rab tu dga' la dga' zhing yid bde bar gyur nas/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su nyong bas na/ de'i phyir skyed mos tshal zhes bya'o//
246a5(mdo sde): bskyed mos tshal dga' tshal gyi byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sa gzhi bzang po dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyi rgya lnga bcu/ rgyar yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/
246a6(mdo sde): mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod la/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sa gzhi bzang po lde ma bzhin du/ rgyas par brjod par bya'o// bam po zhig/
246a7(mdo sde): lha'i grong khyer gyi byang shar gyi mtshams na/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs su sa brtol zhes bya ba yod de/ yongs su sa rtol gyi rtsa ba ni dpag tshad
246a8(mdo sde): stong lnga bcu thur tu zug go/ 'phang du ni dpag tshad brgya yod do// yal ga phyir gyes pa ni dpag tshad lnga bcu yod do// yongs su sa brtol gyi yal ga lnga yod do// yal ga
246b1(mdo sde): gcig ni shar phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcur dung ngo // yal ga gnyis pa ni lho phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcur dud do// yal ga gsum pa ni nub phyogs su dpag tshad lnga
246b2(mdo sde): bcur dung ngo // yal ga bzhi pa ni byang phyogs su dpag tshad bcur dud do// yal ga steng ma ni dpag tshad balnga bcur steng gi na mkha' khyabar 'dug go/ yongasu brtol gyi srid du/
246b3(mdo sde): dpag tshad brgya lnga bcu yod ngo // sboms su yang dpag tshad brgya lnga bcu yod do// mtha' skor du dpag tshad gsum brgya lnga bcu yod do// yongs su sa brtol gyi dri'i rdzing phyogs
246b4(mdo sde): su ni dpag tshad brgyar dad ldang ngo // brdzi phyogs ma yin par lnga bcur dang ldang ngo // dpag tshad brgya bcur ni 'od dang / kha dog gis lam me lhan ne lgang nger 'dug go/ sum
246b5(mdo sde): bcu brtsa gsum gyi lha rnams shi yongs su sa brtol gyi lo ma ser ba na de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / kye ma yongs su sa brtol 'di lo ma ser ba las na/
246b6(mdo sde): de ni ring po mi thogs par 'dab ma lhags par 'gyur ro// snyam nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pas gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la de'i skabs kyang yod do//
246b7(mdo sde): sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs su sa brtol gyi 'dab ma lhags na/ de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams/ kye ma yongs su sa brtol 'di 'dab
246b8(mdo sde): ma lhags pa las na/ de ni ring por mi thogs par sbal mig mngon par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang /
247a1(mdo sde): yod la de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongasu sa rtol sbal mig mthon pa na/ de'i tshe sum
247a2(mdo sde): bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams/ kye ma yongs su sa brtol 'di sbal mig mthon pa las na/ da ni ring por mi thogs par sbal mig 'bye bar 'gyur ro// skam nas/
247a3(mdo sde): kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs su sa
247a4(mdo sde): brtol ba sbal mig byed pa na/ de'i sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams/ kye ma yongs su sa brtol 'di sbal mig bye ba las na/ da ni ring por mi thogs pas me tog kha
247a5(mdo sde): 'bu bar 'gyur ro// snyam nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum
247a6(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongasu sa brtol gyis me tog kha 'bus pa na de'i tshe/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams/ kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di me tog kha 'bus pas
247a7(mdo sde): las na/ da ni rang por mi thogs par me tog kha 'bye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ kun nas dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa'i dus kyang yod la de'i skabs kyang
247a8(mdo sde): yod do// gsum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi zhing yongs su sa brtol gyi me tog kha bye ba na/ de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams/ kye ma yongs 'dus rtol
247b1(mdo sde): de'i sa kyang yo
247b2(mdo sde): 'di me tog kha bye ba las na/ de ni ring por mi thogs par me tog gi 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ro// snyam nas/ kun tu dga' zhing ba tu dga' bas
247b3(mdo sde): gnas pa gang yin pa de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog gi 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas pa
247b4(mdo sde): na yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog gi 'dab ma thams cad yongasu rgyas pa'i dri rdzi phyogs su ni dpag tshad brgyar dang ldang ngo // rdzi phyogs ma yin par ni dpag tshad lnga bcur
247b5(mdo sde): ngad ldang ngo // dpag tshad brgya bcur ni 'od dang / kha dog gis lam me lhan ne lha der 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag sum bcu rtsa gsum
247b6(mdo sde): ba'i rnams kyi shing yongasu 'du sa brtol gyi rtsa ba ni dpag tshad lnga thur du thug go// 'phang du ni dpag tshad rgyar yod do// yal ga dang la mo dang / 'dab ma rnams kyis ni dpag tshad lnga
247b7(mdo sde): bcur khyab po// dge slong dag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi yongs 'du sa brtol gyis lo ma ser bas na/ de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams/ kye ma yod
247b8(mdo sde): 'du sa brtol 'di lo ma ser ba las na/ da ni ring po mi thogs par 'dab ma lhags par 'gyur ro// snyam nas/ kun tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin de'i dus kyang yod do// /
247b9(mdo sde): dge slong dag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongasu 'dus brtol gyi 'dab ma lhags pa na/ de che'i sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams/ kye ma yongs 'dus brtsom
248a1(mdo sde): 'di 'dab ma lhags pa las na/ da ni ring por mi thogs par sbal mig mthon par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga'
248a2(mdo sde): bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge slong dag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yong 'du sa brtol 'di sbal mig mngon pa na/ de'i sum bcu rtsa
248a3(mdo sde): gsum pa'i lha rnams/ kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di sbal mig mnyo pa las na/ da ni ring por mi thogs par me tog kha 'bu bar 'gyur ro// snyam nas/ kun
248a4(mdo sde): tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge slong dag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa rtol gyi me
248a5(mdo sde): rtog kha 'bus pas na/ de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams/ kye ma yongs 'du sa rtol me tog kha 'bus pa las na/ da ni ring por mi thogs par me tog kha
248a6(mdo sde): 'bye bar 'gyur ro// snyam nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge slong dag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi
248a7(mdo sde): shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi khabye ba las na/ de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams/ kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di me tog kha bye ba las na/ da ni ring por mi thogs
248a8(mdo sde): par me tog gi 'dab ma thams cad yongasu rgyas par 'gyuraro// snyam nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge slong dag
248b1(mdo sde): sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog gi 'dab ma thams cad yongasu rgyas pa na/ yongs 'dus rtol gyi me rtog thams cad yongasu rgyas
248b2(mdo sde): pa'i dri'i rdzi phyogs su ni dpag tshad brgyar dad ldang ngo // rdzi ma yin par ni dpag tshad lnga bcur dang ldang // dpag tshad brgyad bcur ni 'od dang / kha dog gis lham me lha na na
248b3(mdo sde): lhang nger 'dug go// shing yongs 'dus brtol thams cad yongasu rgyas pa'i 'og na/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dbyar zla bzhir lha'i long spyod 'dod pa'i yon lnga
248b4(mdo sde): dag 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur te/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // dge slong dag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
248b5(mdo sde): kyi shing yongs 'du sa rtol gyi mthu ni/ de tsam mo zhes gsung so// / bar sdom ni/ dang po lo ma ser ba dang / de bas 'dab lhags sbal mig mthon/ sbal mig
248b6(mdo sde): byed dang me tog dbus/ me tog kha bye thams cad rgyas/ shing yongs 'du sa rtol gyi drung na/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi ar mo nig lta bu'i rdo leb yod de/
248b7(mdo sde): mtshur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis rgya/ 'bang du dpag tshad phyed dang drug dang / dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad cha gcig yod de/
248b8(mdo sde): dbyibs legs shing lha na sdug la mdzes pa/ bkra zhing shin tu bkra ba ni/ tshon sna rgya rtsa gcig gis bkra ba ste/ 'jam zhing shin du 'jam pa ni/ dper na shing bal gyi 'dab
249a1(mdo sde): ma 'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag na ni nems shes byed/ rkang pa brteg na ni par ces byed la/ me tog man
249a2(mdo sde): 'da' ra ba mang pos pus mo nub pa tsam tu yongs su khebs te/ de'i dbus na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi ser ge'i khri bzang po dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha lhag ma
249a3(mdo sde): rnams kyi khri ba shams pa yod do// de na sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dbyar zla ba pa'i lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur te/ rtse zhing dag la
249a4(mdo sde): la dga' mgur sprod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // a ra mo ni ga lta bu'i rdo leb kyi kho ra khor yug na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon
249a5(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs pa rnams legs par skyes shig/ dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa te/ me tog thod bzhin du gyur pa ni dper na/ me tog phreng rgyud dam/ me tog gi
249a6(mdo sde): phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog phreng ba za gu brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna brgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ skam las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs
249a7(mdo sde): pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dbur sbyar ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa dga'abyin to// de'i nye kor na dpag bsam gyi shing ljon
249a8(mdo sde): pa dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go// bzhag gos dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang /
249b1(mdo sde): dkar po dag go// dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i gos dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go// rol mo'i cha spyad
249b2(mdo sde): mang po 'di lta ste/ pi bang dang / gling bu dang / pi bang rgyud gsum pa dang / mkhar rnga dang / sgra snyan rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod do// brgyan sna tshogs lag
249b3(mdo sde): brgyan dang / rkang brgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi smra ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod do// lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod pa'i sems
249b4(mdo sde): skyed ma thag tu de lta bu dag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / snang rtsi dang / sbrang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do// yang tog rnams dang / khang pa
249b5(mdo sde): brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / gang khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo blta ba'i sa rnams dang / bsti khang rnams dang / grong khyer
249b6(mdo sde): du 'dug pa rnams dang / so so na 'dug pa rnams dang / rgyun ma rnams bud med kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mo mang pos bsten pa dang /
249b7(mdo sde): sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag gi sgra bstan pa sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs kyis legs par bsgom pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang ldan te/ de ni sum
249b8(mdo sde): bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de// rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // sum bcu rtsa
250a1(mdo sde): / gsum pa'i lha rnams/ glang po che'i rgyal po skyed mos tshal du spyad pa/ sa bsrung gi bu zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la
250a2(mdo sde): mdzes pa yod de/ me tog ku mu ta'i mdog ltar thal kar 'dug pa/ yan lag bdun legs par gnas pa ste/ de'i mgo bo'i dbyibs legs shing bltan sdug
250a3(mdo sde): la mdzes pa te/ sngo zhing srog chags lham bu chu gsher gyi mdog ltar/ dbus dmar la mche ba drug yod de/ glang po che'i rgyal pos srung gi bu'i srid du/
250a4(mdo sde): dpag tshad phyed dang gsum/ zheng du dpag tshad gcig/ 'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad bdun yod do// glang po che'i rgyal po sa
250a5(mdo sde): srung gi bu'i 'khor glang po che brgyad stong yod do// de dag thams cad kyang gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa/ me tog ku mu ta'i mdog ltar thal kar tu
250a6(mdo sde): 'dug pa/ yan lag bdun shin tu legs par gnas pa ste/ de dag gi mgo bo yang dbyibs legs shing / wA na sdug la mdzes te/ sngo zhing srog chags lham bu
250a7(mdo sde): chu gsher gyi mdog ltar dbus dmar la mche ba drug yod pa/ sha stag ste/ gang gi tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams/ bskyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gro ba 'dod pa
250a8(mdo sde): de'i tshe/ glang po che'i rgyal pos srung gi bus/ mgo bos sum bcu rtsa gsum mngon par basprul te/ mgo bos re re la mche ba drug drug/ mche ba re re la rdzing bu bdun bdun/
250b1(mdo sde): re la lha'i bu me
250b2(mdo sde): rdzing bu re re la pad ma bdun bdun/ pad ma re re la sdong bu bdun bdun/ sdong bu bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo re re la g.yog mo bdun bdun/ g.yog mo re re la sil snyan bdun
250b3(mdo sde): bdun mngon par basprul te/ mgo bo de dag thams cad kyi nang na khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin pa de ni la/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin zhon no// mgo bo lhag ma rnam
250b4(mdo sde): la ni nye ba'i dbang po sum bcu brtsa gnyis po rnam zhon no// glang po che lhag ma rnams la ni sum bcu rtsa gsum rnams zhon no// de'i shin tu mgyogs te dper na 'jig
250b5(mdo sde): pa'i rlung ngam/ 'chags pa'i rang bzhin te/ de nas lha 'am lha'i bu mo su yang 'di snyam du/ 'di ni bdag gis mdun du 'gro'o zhes 'am phyi nas 'ong ngo snyam du sems
250b6(mdo sde): dpa' ba med do// de nas glang po che'i rgyal po sa bsrung gis bus/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams so so'i grong khyer sgo nas 'don to// gton nas so sor skyed
250b7(mdo sde): mo tshal du phyin par byas ste/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa de gtang nas 'di lta ste/ lha 'am lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gang yang rung ba dang / 'dra ba bdag
250b8(mdo sde): nyid mngon par sprul nas/ lha'i 'dod pa'i lnga dag la 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur te/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// ji ltar brgya byin lha'i dbang po sum bcu rtsa
250b9(mdo sde): gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang byed pa/ de bzhin du lA ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris lA ma rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed do// sum
251a1(mdo sde): bcu gsum pa'i/ lha rnam kyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor grong khyer lta na sdug ji lta ba bzhin du lha ma yin rnam kyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khon
251a2(mdo sde): yang grong khyer gser ldan zhes bya'o// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzangs rnam par brgyal ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thag bzangs ris kyi khang
251a3(mdo sde): bzangs kyang bsdoms pa can zhes bya'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs shes bya ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi lha ma yin
251a4(mdo sde): gyi 'dun sa yang nor bzang shes bya'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnam kyi skyed mo tshal bzhi 'di lta ste/ shing rta sna tshogs can dang / rtsa ba 'gyur tshal dang / 'dres pa'i
251a5(mdo sde): tshal dang / dga' ba'i tshal ji lta de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi skyed mos tshal zhi yang 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang / dga' gi
251a6(mdo sde): kun tu dga' ba rnams yin no// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnam kyi sa bzhi bzang po bzhi 'di lta ste/ sna tshogs dang rtsubs 'gyur ba dang / 'dres pa'i dang / dga' ji lta ba
251a7(mdo sde): de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi sa gzhi bzang po bzhi yang kun tu dga' ma dang / rab tu dga' ma dang / dga' ma dang / dga' ba'i kun dga' rab ma rnam so// sum
251a8(mdo sde): bcu rtsa gsum pa'i rnam kyi shing yongasu rtol ji lta ba bzhin du lA ma yin rnams kyi shing yang tsa tra pa ta la zhes bya'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnam kyi ni/ ar mo ni ga lta
251b1(mdo sde): bu'i rdo le baji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnam kyi yang lha ma yin gyi rdo leb ces bya'o// gsum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnam kyi glang po che'i rgyal skyed mo 'tshal du spyad pa/
251b2(mdo sde): sa bsrung gi bu ji lta bu de bzhin du lha ma yin rnam kyi glang po che'i rgyal po skyed mo 'tshal du spyad pa'i yang ti se'i gangs brtsegs pa shes bya'o// sum rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
251b3(mdo sde): kyi glang po che'i rgyal po g.yul ngor spyod pa rab brtan ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyalog yul ngor spyad pa yang bzod par dka' ba zhes bya'o// sum bcu rtsa
251b4(mdo sde): gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs shes bya ba ji lta de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi rta'i rgyal po brag 'gur zhes bya'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnam
251b5(mdo sde): kyis lha'i grong khyer ji ltar 'khor dang ldan pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi grong khyer yang 'khor dang ldan pa yin no// lha ma yin rnams kyi lha ma yin rnam kyi rgyal srid kyang /
251b6(mdo sde): sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnam kyi ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// 'jig rten bdags pa las rigs bdun pa'o// sdom ni phyed dang drug dang / thang cig
251b7(mdo sde): mtha' thung dang drang dang bri ba dang / rnyog pa dang ni bsdu ba dang / phyogs dang / shar phyogs 'du shes dang / zla ba drug du ni nyi ma lho phyogasu 'gro ste/ lho phyog su 'gro ba na dpag
251b8(mdo sde): tshad bye dang drug dang / dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad kyi cha gcig gis 'dzam bu'i gling mi dror rgya mtsho chen po dpag tshad phye dang drug dang / dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad cha gcig khyab par byed
252a1(mdo sde): do// zla ba drug du nyi ma byang phyog su 'gro ste/ byang phyog su 'gro na dpag tshad chad dang drug dang / dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad cha gcig gis rgya
252a2(mdo sde): mtshochen por 'dor ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling dpag tshad bye dang drug dang dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad cha gcig khyab par byed do// zla ba drug tu nyi ma lho phyog su 'gro ste/ lho phyogs
252a3(mdo sde): 'gro ba ni nyin mo las thang gcig re re 'bri zhing / mtshan mo las thang cig re re skye'o// zla ba drug tu ni nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro ba na/ mtshan mo las thang gcig re re 'bri zhing /
252a4(mdo sde): nyin mo la zang gcig re re skye'o// zla ba drug du nyi ma lho phyogs su 'gro ba ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi mtha' myur du 'dor bas de'i phyir na dgun mtshan mor ring la nyin me thung ngo //
252a5(mdo sde): ci'i phyir dpying dang / dbyar nyin mo ring la/ mtshan mo thung zhe na/ smras pa/ zla ba drug du nyi me byang phyogs su 'gro ste/ byang phyog su 'gro ba na 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbusu
252a6(mdo sde): yun ring ba zhig gyis 'dor ba nas/ de'i phyir na/ dpyid dang dbyar nyin mo ring la mtshan mo thung ngo // ci'i phyir rgun drang bar gyur ce na/ smras pa zla ba drug tu nyi ma lho phyogasu
252a7(mdo sde): 'gro ba 'gro na/ dpag tshad bzhi khri nas nyi mi'i 'od zer rnams byung ba rnams rgya mtsho chen por babs pas/ gling rnamasu grang bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir na rgun drang ngo // ci'i phyir
252a8(mdo sde): dpyid dang / dbyar dro bar gyur ce na/ smras pa/ zla ba drug tu nyi ma byang phyog su 'gro ste/ byang phyogasu 'gro ba na/ dpag tshad bzhi khri nas/ nyi ma'i 'od zer byung ba rnamasu gling
252b1(mdo sde): rnam su babs pas gling rnam su dro bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir na dpyid dang byar de'o// ci'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mar gyi ngo tsha bcu drug man chad 'ong 'bri zhing kha dog dang /
252b2(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor dang chu zhing 'bri zhing / spras pa/ nyi ma dang nye bar 'gro zhing phreng gyur te/ nye bar 'gro ba rang gi dkyil 'khor las de'i grib ma slar 'bab te/ des de'i dkyil
252b3(mdo sde): 'khor khebs shing de'i dkyil 'khor yog par gyur te/ mi snang bar de'i phyir na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mar gyis ngo tshes bcu drug phan chad 'od 'dri zhing kha dog dang dkyil
252b4(mdo sde): 'khor dang mchu zheng du 'gro'o// ci'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mar gyi do gnams pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi snang zhe na smras pa/ nyi ma dang rnam pa thams cad
252b5(mdo sde): kyi nye bar 'gro ba ste/ rnam pa thams cad kyi nye bar 'gro ba ste/ des rang gi dkyil 'khor las grib ma slar babs pa las/ de'i dkyil 'khor khyebs shing des de'i
252b6(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor yog par 'gyur te/ mi snang bas de'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mar gyi ngo gnam stong la thams cad du mi snang ngo // ci'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yar gyi ngo
252b7(mdo sde): tshes gcig phan chad 'od skye zhing kha dog dang / dkyil 'khor dang chu zheng skyes zhe na/ spras pa/ nyi ma dang mi nye bar 'gro ste/ nyi ma dang mi nyes par 'gro ba de rang gi dkyil 'khor
252b8(mdo sde): las grib ma chung ngur gyur to/ grib ma chung ngu gyur pas dkyil 'khor de'i phyogs cig snang bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yar gyi ngo ches gcig man chad
253a1(mdo sde): 'od skyes zhing kha dog dang / dkyil 'khor dang mchung zheng skye'o// ci'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yar gyi ngo tshes bco lnga la//
253a2(mdo sde): rnam pa thams cad du yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ nyi ma dang rnam pa thams cad kyis nye bar mi 'gro ste/ rnam pa thams cad kyi nye bar mi 'gro bas/ de'i dkyil
253a3(mdo sde): 'khor la sgrib pa gang yin pa nyi ma'i grib ma de dkyil 'khor las slar log ste/ des nas de'i dkyil 'khor snang bar 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yar kyi ngo//
253a4(mdo sde): tshes bco lnga la/ rnam pa thams cad du yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// ci'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus rnyog pa yod la mtha' rnam dang / zhing rnyog pa med ce na/
253a5(mdo sde): smras pa/ gling gi rkyen kyis de'i dbus rnyog pa yod la/ chu'i rkyen kyis mtha' rnam par dang zhing rnyog med do// gru rnams kyi gzugs brnyan gang yin pa de ni dbus
253a6(mdo sde): rnyog pa yod la/ chu'i gzugs brnyan gang yin pa des ni mtha' rnam par dang / zhing brnyog pa med do// gzhan yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de la kun dga' ra ba dang / skyed
253a7(mdo sde): mos tshal rnams dang / khyim rnam dang / khang brtsegs pa rnams yod pas/ de'i yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus rnyog pa yod la/ mtha' rnam par dang zhing rnyog
253a8(mdo sde): pa med do// gang gis tshe 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma shar ba de'i tshe shar phyogs su nyi ma phye'o// byang gi sgra mi snyan ni nub bo// nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling na ni nam phyed do//
253b1(mdo sde): gang gi tshe 'dzam bu'i gling du'i ma byed par gyur pa'i tshe/ shar gyi lus 'phags na ni nyi ma nub bo// byang gi sgra mi snyan nam byed do// nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling
253b2(mdo sde): na ni nyi ma 'charo// gang gi tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na nyi ma nub pa de'i/ shar gyi lus 'phags pon ni nam phyed do// byang gi sgra mi snyan ni 'char ro// nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling
253b3(mdo sde): na ni nyi ma phye'o// gang gi tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na nam phye du gyur pa de'i tshe/ shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling na ni nyi ma 'cha ro// byang gi sgra mi snyan na ni nyi ma phye'o// nub gi ba lang
253b4(mdo sde): spyod kyi gling na ni nyi ma nub po// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling thog mar smos pa de bshang ba bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags pa dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan dang / nub kyi ba
253b5(mdo sde): lang spyod kyang thog mar smos te thams cad brjod par bya'o// 'dzam bu'i gling gi shar phyogs gang yin pa de shar gyi lus 'phags kyi ni lho phyogaso// byang gi sgra mi snyan
253b6(mdo sde): gyi ni nub phyogs so// nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi ni byang phyogaso// 'dzam bu'i gling gi lho phyogs gang yin pa de ni shar gyi lus 'phags kyi ni nub phyogs so// byang gi sgra mi/
253b7(mdo sde): snyan gyi ni byang phyogs so// nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi ni shar phyogs so// 'dzam bu'i gling gi nub phyogs gang yin pa de/ shar gyi lus 'phags kyi ni byang phyogs so//
253b8(mdo sde): byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi shar phyogs so// nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi ni lho phyogs so// 'dzam bu'i gling gi ni byang phyogs gang yin pa de'i/ shar gyi lus 'phags kyi ni
254a1(mdo sde): shar phyogs so// byang gi sgra mi snyan ni lho phyogs so// nub kyi ba lang sprod kyi ni nub phyogs so// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling thog mar
254a2(mdo sde): spos te/ bshad pa de bzhin du byang gi sgra mi snyan dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod dang / shar gyi lus 'phags kyang thog mar smos te/ thams cad brjod par bya'o// phyogs
254a3(mdo sde): ni bzhi yod de/ shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / shar phyogs la shar phyogs su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod//
254a4(mdo sde): lho phyogs su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag yod/ nub phyogs su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod/ byang phyogasu 'du shes pa'i sems can dag
254a5(mdo sde): kyang yod/ lho phyog su 'du shes pa'i sems can kyang yod// shar phyog su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod/ nub phyogasu 'du shes pa'i sems can
254a6(mdo sde): dag yod/ byang phyogasu 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod do// nub phyogs la shar phyogasu 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod/ lho phyogasu 'du shes pa
254a7(mdo sde): sems can dag kyang long / nub phyogasu 'du shes pa'i sems can dag yod// byang phyogs su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod do// byang phyogs la shar
254a8(mdo sde): phyogasu 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod// lho phyogs su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod/ nub phyogasu 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod//
254b1(mdo sde): byang phyog su 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod do// phyogs de dang de dag de la de ltar tha skad 'dogs so// / 'jig rten bdags pa las tshigs/
254b2(mdo sde): brgyad pa'o// // sdom ni/ zla ba nyi ma gnyis kyi tshad/ skar ma rnams kyang de ltar de bzhin te/ zla drug nyi ma 'gro ba dang / gnod par byed pa tha ma yin/ zla ba'i
254b3(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ji tsam zhe na/ smras pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni mchur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad lnga bcu mtha' skor du yang dpag tshad brgya
254b4(mdo sde): lnga bcu/ rngams su yang dpag tshad phye dang drug dang / dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad cha gcig yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa shel las grub
254b5(mdo sde): ste/ gser gyi ra bas kun nas bskor to// rab de'i 'phang yang dpag tshad phyed yod la/ ra ba de la cog rnams pa bzhi las byas pa dag yod de// 'di lta ste/
254b6(mdo sde): gser las byas pa dang / dngulas byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa dag go// gyen du 'phang ba'i mda' yab dang / mthur du 'phang ba'i
254b7(mdo sde): mda' yab dang / bsti khang rnams pa bzhi yod do// de'i nang gi sa bzhi dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ bkra zhing shin tu legs par bkra ba ni mnon
254b8(mdo sde): sna rgya rtsa gcig gyis bkra ba ste/ 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni dper na/ shing bal gyi mdab ma 'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag na ni nems shes byed/
255a1(mdo sde): rkang pa bsteg ni ni bar ces byed la me tog man ta ra ba mang pos me nub pa tsam du khyebs te/ de na mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyi rlung gis
255a2(mdo sde): mthus me tog rnying pa rnams ni ngor/ me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems te/ ji skad du zla ba'i bsod nams dbang gi rkyen gyis na/ zla ba'i grong khyer pa
255a3(mdo sde): na rlung chen ldang / me tog snying pa rnams ni 'dor bar byed/ me tog gsar pa rnam ni legs par 'grems// zhing 'byung ba lta bu'o// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang na/
255a4(mdo sde): lam srang mchur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ kha mtshon du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis pa yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal cing /
255a5(mdo sde): tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa/ de'i ngos g.yas g.yon na/ rdzing bu byas pa dag yod de/ rdzing bu de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang /
255a6(mdo sde): be dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing de dag gi phyogs bzhi na them kas byas pa dag yod/ them skas de dag kyang gser
255a7(mdo sde): las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / be dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhi brtsigs so// rdzing de dag kyang gser las byas pa
255a8(mdo sde): dang / dngul las byas pa dang / be dUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i lan kar rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ gser gyi lan kar gyi rten ma dang /
255b1(mdo sde): gnya' nan dang / shar ni dngul las byaso// dngul gyi ni gser las byas so// bye da ru las ni shel las byas so// shel gyi ni brten ma dang / gnya' nan dang /
255b2(mdo sde): shar ba ni bai dur+ya las byas pa ste/ dbyibs legs shing lta na bsdug la mdzes pa chu bsil ba dang / chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ba ste/ me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu dang /
255b3(mdo sde): pad ma dang / pad ma kar pos yongasu khebs shing / chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ongs pa dang / skad mnyen pa dang /
255b4(mdo sde): 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnam skad snyan pa dag 'byin to// de dag gi nyen kor na me tog gyi shing ljon pa dang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs yod pa rnam
255b5(mdo sde): legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs pa yongasu grub pa ste/ me tog thod bzhin du 'gyur ba ni/ dper na me tog phreng rgyud dam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma
255b6(mdo sde): mkhas pas/ me tog gyi 'phreng ba theg gu la brgyud pa dang / me tog gyi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ skam las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad
255b7(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa dag 'byin// dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dag rnam pa bzhi ste/
255b8(mdo sde): sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go/ bzhag gos dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag go//
256a1(mdo sde): dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i gos dag rnams pa bzhi sde/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / kar po dag go//
256a2(mdo sde): rol mo'i cha sprad sna tshogs pa'i sri bang dang / gling bu dang / pi bang rgyud gsum pa dang / khar je dang / sgra snyan rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod do//
256a3(mdo sde): rgyan sna tshogs lag brgyan dang / rkang brgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur
256a4(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu de dag kyi lag tu 'ong bar 'bruro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sbrang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do// yang rtog
256a5(mdo sde): rnams dang / khang pa rtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnam dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / sil khang rnams dang / ltad mos blta ba'i sa rnams dang / bsting khang
256a6(mdo sde): rnams bud med kyis tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mo mang pos brten pa dang / sil bstan dang / pheg rdob pa dag gi sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa dang dri sna tshog
256a7(mdo sde): kyis legs par bsgos pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang ldan pa'i ngag yod do// de na lha'i bu zla ba 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/
256a8(mdo sde): rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyam su myong ngo // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ci tsam zhe na/ smras pa nyis ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mchur dpag tshad lnga bcu rtsa gcig zhing du
256b1(mdo sde): dpag tshad lnga bcu rtsa gcig/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum/ rngam su yang dpag tshad phyed dang drug dang dpag tshad bco brgyad kyi cha gcig yod do//
256b2(mdo sde): dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes pa shel las grub pa ste/ gser gyi ra bas kun nas bskor to// ra ba de'i 'phang yang dpag tshad phyed yod la/ ra ba de
256b3(mdo sde): kha cog rnam pa bzhi las byas pa yod // 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa dag go//
256b4(mdo sde): gyen du 'phang ba'i mda' yab dang / 'thur du 'phyang ba'i mda' yab dang / bsti khang rnam pa bzhi dag yod do// de'i nang gis bzhi dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la
256b5(mdo sde): mdzes pa ste/ bkra zhing shin tu kra ba ni tshon sna rgya tsa gcig gis bsla ba ste/ 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni/ dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma 'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma
256b6(mdo sde): bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag na ni nems shes byed/ rkang pa teg na ni par ces byed la/ me tog man da ra ba dag gis pus mo nub btsam du khebs te/ de na mi ma yin pa rnam
256b7(mdo sde): kyis klung gi mthus me tog rnyings pa rnams ni 'dor/ me tog sar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems te/ ji skad du nyi ma'i bsod nams dbang gi rkyen gyis ni/ nyi ma'i
256b8(mdo sde): grong khyer dag na rlung chen ldan/ me tog spring pa rnams ni 'dor bar byed/ me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grem// shes 'byung ba lta bu'o// nyi ma'i dkyil
257a1(mdo sde): 'khor gyi nang snang lam srang mchur dpag tshad lnga ban+d+ha rtsa cig/ kha tshon du dpag tshad phyed dang nyis pa yod de/ dbyibs legs shi
257a2(mdo sde): bstan sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal cing tsan dan gyi chus chug btab pa/ de'i ngos g.yon na rdzing bu byas pa dag yod de/ rjed de dag kyang gser las
257a3(mdo sde): byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsig so// rdzing de dag gyi phyogs bzhin yang / them
257a4(mdo sde): skas de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / be durar+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnams pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing de dag
257a5(mdo sde): kyang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / be durar+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i lan kar rnam pa bzhis kun nas skor te gser gyi lan kar
257a6(mdo sde): kyi brten ma dang / gnya' nan dang / shar ba ni dngul las byaso// be dUr+ya'i ni shel las byas so// shel gyi brten ma dang / gnyal nan dang / shar ba ni bai dur+ya las byas te/
257a7(mdo sde): dbyibs legs shing / lta na sdug la mdzes pa chu bsil ba dang / chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ba ste/ me tog ud bal dang / ku mu ha dang / pad ma dkar pos yongasu khyebs
257a8(mdo sde): te/ chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can rnam skad snyan pa dag 'byin to//
257b1(mdo sde): de dag gi mnyen gor na me tog gyi shing ljon dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs yod pa rnam legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs pa yongasu grub pa ste/ me tog
257b2(mdo sde): phreng bar dam bzhin du gyur pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ me tog 'phreng brgyud dam/ me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas/ me tog gi phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog
257b3(mdo sde): gi rna brgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ skam las skye ba'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzug
257b4(mdo sde): can rnams skad snyan pa dag 'byin to// dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / gar po dag go// bzhag gos
257b5(mdo sde): dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dgo/ dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i gos dag rnams pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang /
257b6(mdo sde): ser po dang / dmar po dang / kar po dag go/ rol mo'i cha spyad sna tshogs pa'i blang dang / gling bu dang / bi bang rgyud gsum pa dang / khar rnga dang / skra snyan rnam 'byung ba'i
257b7(mdo sde): shing ljon pa dag yod do// rgyan sna tshogs lag brgyan dang / rkang brgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnam 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams
257b8(mdo sde): kyis ji lta bur 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ongs par 'gyuraro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang / spang chang gi btung ba dag yod do//
258a1(mdo sde): yang tog rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnam dang / khyim rnams dang // khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnam dang //
258a2(mdo sde): lhad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang / bsti khang rnams bud med kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mo mang pos brten pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg
258a3(mdo sde): rdob pa dag gi sgra snyad pa sgrogs pa rnams dang / dri sna tshogs kyis legs par dgos pa dang / bza' ba dang / bdung ba dang ldan pa dag yod de/ de na lha'i
258a4(mdo sde): bu'i nyi ma'i 'khor dang / bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' 'gur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyam su myong ngo // skar ma'i gzugs rnams kyi tshad
258a5(mdo sde): ji tsam zhe na/ smras pa/ skar ma'i gzugs rnams la thams cad kyi nang na che ba gang yin pa de dag gyi rgyang grags bco brgyad pa'o// thams cad kyi nang na chung
258a6(mdo sde): ba ni gang yin pa de dag ni/ rgyang grags gsum pa'o// phal cher ni rgyang grags bcu pa dang / bcu gnyis pa yin te/ dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la
258a7(mdo sde): mdzes pa shel las grub ste/ gser gyi rabs kun nas bskor to// ra ba de la cog rnam pa bzhi las byas pa dag yod do// gser las byas pa dang //
258a8(mdo sde): dngul las byas dang / bai dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa dag go/ mda' yab dang / ltad mo blta ba'i sa rnam pa bzhi yod de/ de'i nang gi sa gzhi yang
258b1(mdo sde): dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes pa/ bkra zhing shin tu bkra ba ni tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bkra ste 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni dper na
258b2(mdo sde): shing bal gyi 'dab ma 'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag na ni nems shes byed/ rkang pa teg na ni par ces byed la me tog man da ra ba'i dag
258b3(mdo sde): gIs pus mo nub pa tsam khebs te/ rlung gi mthus me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor/ me tog sar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems te/ ji skad du lha'i bsod
258b4(mdo sde): nams dbang gis rkyen gyi na gzhal med khang mchog dag na rlung chen ldang / me tog snying pa rnams legs par 'dor bar byed/ me tog bsar pa rnams ni legs
258b5(mdo sde): par 'grem zhes/ 'byung ba lta bu'o// de dag gi nang na rdzing byas pa dag yod de/ rdzing de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / be durar+ya las
258b6(mdo sde): byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing de dag kyang gser las bya ba dang / dngul las byas pa dang / be dur+ya las byas pa dang /
258b7(mdo sde): shel las byas pa'i lan kar rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor to// gser gyi lan kar gyi rten ma dang / mnya' nan dang / shar ba'i dngul las byas so//
258b8(mdo sde): dngul gyi ni gser las byas so// be dur+ya'i shel las byas so// shel ni brten ma dang gnya' nan dang / shararA ni be dur+ya las byas pas te/ dbyibs legs
259a1(mdo sde): @shing ldan sngags mdzes pa/ chu bsil dang / chu snang cig bus gang ba se/ me to/ ud pal dang / pad ma dang/ krAr+tha
259a2(mdo sde): da dang / padram dkar pos yongs su khebs shing / chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs srid ldan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dzed
259a3(mdo sde): sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa dag 'byin to// de dag gyi gnyen kor na me tog gis shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa dang / sna tshogs yod
259a4(mdo sde): pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs shing yongasu grub pa ste/ me tog thod bzhin du 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste/ me tog phreng rgyud dam/ me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob
259a5(mdo sde): ma mkhas pa la/ me tog gi 'phreng ba tha gu rgyus pa dang / me tog gi sna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang la skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid
259a6(mdo sde): du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan par dag 'byin to// dpag bsams gyis shing ljon pa dag rnam pa bzhi
259a7(mdo sde): ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams yod do// rgyas par ni snga ma bzhin no// de dag na gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams rtse/
259a8(mdo sde): zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyam su myong ngo // nyi mas zla ba drug du bgrod pa gang yin pa de ni zla bas zla ba gcig tu 'gro ba
259b1(mdo sde): dang / 'ong bar byed do// ci'i phyir nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ltas na mig la gnod par 'gyur la/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bltas na/ mig la gnod par
259b2(mdo sde): mi 'gyur zhes na/ smras pa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni shel dang ba yin pa'i phyir dang / chu shel yin pa'i phyir ro// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni me shel yin pas
259b3(mdo sde): de'i phyir na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bltas na ni mig la gnod par 'gyur la/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gnod par mi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten bdag pa la
259b4(mdo sde): datshigs dgu' ba'o// sdom ni 'byung ba chen por 'du shes dang / bdag tu yang ni 'dus shes dang / sa la yang ni nam kar 'du shes dang / nam ka la ni sar
259b5(mdo sde): 'du shes dang / dus ni gnyis su byas pa dang / skad gcig de ni tha ma yin/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / rlung gi kham so//
259b6(mdo sde): sa la sar 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod/ chur 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod/ mer 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ rlung du 'du shes
259b7(mdo sde): pa dag kyang yod do// chu la sar 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ chur 'du shes pa dag kyang yod// mer 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ rlung du 'du shes pa dag
259b8(mdo sde): kyang yod do// me la sar 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod/ chur 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ mer 'du shes pa dag kyang yeng / rlung du 'du shes
260a1(mdo sde): pa dag kyang yod do// rlung la sar 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod/ chur 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod//
260a2(mdo sde): mer 'du shes pa dag kyang yod // rlung du 'du shes pa dag kyang yod do// sa la bdag du 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod/ sa'i khams gang yin
260a3(mdo sde): pa de ni bdag yin la/ bdag gang yin pa de ni sa yin te/ de ltar sa dang bdag nyis ni gcig ste/ gnyis ma yin zhing tha dad pa ma yin ste/ bdag gi bdag
260a4(mdo sde): ni ma ma tshang ba med pa yin no snyam nas/ de dag sa la bkur stir byed/ btsan par byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed do// de dgis bkur stir byed/ btsan par
260a5(mdo sde): byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas nas dga' zhing dgu la yi rangs te/ bkur bstir byed cing mnyen par brten te/ gnas la sems kyis lung du ma snyan par
260a6(mdo sde): gnas so// chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod de/ rlung pa gang yin pa de ni bdag kyang yod de/ rlung gang yin pa
260a7(mdo sde): de ni bdag yin la/ bdag gang yin pa de ni rlung yin te/ de ltar rlung dang bdag nyid ni gcig ste/ gnyis ma yin zhing tha dad pa ma yin te/ bdag gis bdag ni
260a8(mdo sde): ma mtshang ba med pa yin no// snyam nas de dag rlung la bkur stir byed/ btsun par byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed de// de dag gis rlung la bkur stir
260b1(mdo sde): byas nas/ dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ bkur stir byed cing / nye bar brten te/ sems kyis lung ma bstan par gnas so// sa la nam kar 'du/
260b2(mdo sde): shes pa'i sems can dag kyang yod// rnam kar la sar 'du shes pa dag kyang yod do// sa la nam kar 'du shes pa'i sems can ji lta bu zhe na/ dper na til med
260b3(mdo sde): pa'i mi la la zhig gis/ khron pa rko ba'i ma'i ga' zhig la/ 'di skad du/ kye sdong bu ma tshig pa la 'dug pa'i mi glang mthong ngam zhes smras so// des smras pa mthong /
260b4(mdo sde): ngo // til za 'am mi za/ smras pa/ mi za'o zhes byas pa ltar sa la nam kar 'du shes pa'ang de dang 'dra'o// ji ltar na na ma ka la sar 'du shes pa ji ltar bu zhe na/ smras
260b5(mdo sde): pa dper na/ bram ze la la zhig/ bong bu'i shing rtes song nas/ bong bu'i shing rta las babs te/ bong bu'i shing rta phur bu la brtags te/ phur bu nam ka la tAg dag ces
260b6(mdo sde): byas te/ barmugs nas/ mgol bas bkris te sa la gang rgyal tu nyal ba ltar/ nam ka la sar 'du shes pa'ang de dang 'dra de/ lo gcig la dus cig tu mtshan me ni yud
260b7(mdo sde): tsam bco brgyad/ nyin mo yud tsam bcu gnyis pa yod ngo // lo gcig la dus cig du mtshan mo ni yud tsam bco brgyad/ nyin mo ni yud tsam bcu gnyis pa de dag gang zhe na/
260b8(mdo sde): dgun zla ba tha chung yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la/ mtshan mo ni yud tsam bco brgyad/ nyin me ni lung tsam bcu gnyis yod de/ tshes dgu ban chad mtshan me ni 'bris/ rin mon/
261a1(mdo sde): nyin mo ni thang cig re re skye'o//
261a2(mdo sde): skye ste/ mtshan me ni thang cig re re bri'o// lo gcig la dus gcig tu nyin mo yud tsam bcwo brgyad/ mtshan mo ni yud tsam bcu gnyis pa
261a3(mdo sde): yod de lo gcig la dus gcig tu nyin me ni yud tsam bcwo brgyad/ mtshan mo ni yud tsam bcu gnyis pa de gang zhe na/ smras pa ston zla tha chung yar gyis ngos tshes brgyad
261a4(mdo sde): la/ nyin mo ni yud tsam bcwo brgyad/ mtshan mo ni yud tsam bcu gnyis yod do// tshes rku phan chad nyin me ni 'bri/ mtshan mo ni skye ste/ nyin me ni thang bcig re
261a5(mdo sde): res skye'o// lo gcig la dus gnyi su mtshan mo yang yud tsam bco lnga/ nyin mo yang yud tsam bco lnga yod do// lo gcig la dus gnyis su mtshan mo yang yud tsam
261a6(mdo sde): bco lnga/ nyin mo yang yud tsam bco lnga pa de gang zhe na/ smras pa/ dpyid zla tha chungs yar gyi ngos tshes brgyad dang / bston zla tha chungs yar gyi chos brgyad la mtshan mo
261a7(mdo sde): yang yud tsam bco lnga la/ nyin mo yang yud tsam bco lnga yod do// chos bzhin yod de/ bzhi pa gang zhe na/ skad cig dang / de'i skad cig dang / zang cig dang / yud
261a8(mdo sde): tsam mo/ skad cig brgya nyi shu la ni de'i skad cig go/ de'i skad cig drug bcu la ni thang cig gcig go/ thang cig sum bcu la ni yud tsam cig go/ yud tsam sum bcu/
261a9(mdo sde): la ni nyin zhag gcig go/ nyin zhag sum bcu na cig ni yud tsam cig go// yud tsam gyi sum bcu cha gcig ni thang gcig go// thang cig gi drug bcu cha gcig ni de'i skad/
261b1(mdo sde): cig go// de'i skad cig gi brgya nyi shu ma cig gi skad cig go// skad cig gi tshad ji tsam zhe na 'di lta ste/ bud med bal 'khal pa 'bri gis ha cang mi ring / ha cang
261b2(mdo sde): mi thud par bal spyod pa de tsam gyi yun ni skad cig tsam yin no// de lta bu'i skad cig brgya nyi shu la de'i skad cig gcig go// de'i skad cig de lta bu drug bcu la thang cig
261b3(mdo sde): de lta bu sum bcu la// yud tsam gcig go// yud tsam pa de lta bu sum bcu la nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag sum bcu la zla ba gcig go/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo
261b4(mdo sde): gcig go// 'jig rten gdags pa las tshig bcu pa'o// // bam po lnga pa//
261b5(mdo sde): gling bzhi ni mnyan yod ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/ skal pa ni grangs med bzhi ste grangs med pa dag gis skal pa la 'jig go// grangs med pa dag gis
261b6(mdo sde): bskal pa zhig par gnas so// grangs med pa dag gis bskal pa chag so// grangs med pa dag gis bskal pa chags nas gnaso// zhes gsungs te/ bskal pa chen
261b7(mdo sde): po gcig la ni/ bar gyi bskal pa ni brgya bcu ste/ bar gyi bskal pa nyi shus ni 'jig rten 'jig go// bar gyi bskal pa nyi shus ni 'jig rten zhig par gan so// bar byaskal
261b8(mdo sde): pa nyi shus ni chag so// bar gyi bskal pa nyi shus ni 'jig rten chags par gnas so// zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig pa ni rnams pa gsum ste/ mes 'jig pa dang /
262a1(mdo sde): / nus 'jigs pa dang / rlung gi 'jig pa'o// 'jig pa gsum gyi rtse mo ni 'od bsal ba dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu chen pa rnams/
262a2(mdo sde): te/ gang gis tshe mes 'jig par 'byung ba'i de'i tshe/ 'od gsal gyis lha rnams la 'jig pa'i rtse mo thug go// gang gi tshe chu 'jig pa 'byung ba de'i tshe/ dge
262a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi lha rnams la 'jig pa'i rtse mo thug go// gang gis tshe rlung gi 'jig pa 'byung ba de'i tshe/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams la 'jig pa'i rtse mo thug go// mes 'jig
262a4(mdo sde): pa lan bdun zhing chus 'jig pa'i lan gcig/ chus 'jig pa lan bdun zhing mes 'jig pa lan cig 'byung ngo / bar gyi bskal pa ni gsum ste/ mtshon gyi bar gyi bskal
262a5(mdo sde): pa dang / nad gyis bar gyi bskal pa dang / mu ge'i bar gyi bskal pa ste/ bskal pa ni mtshon dang nad mu ge gsum gyis thar thug par 'gyu ro// gang gi tshe mtshon gyi bar gyi skal
262a6(mdo sde): pa 'ong du cha zhing 'byung du nye bar gyur pa'i tshe/ mi rnams kyis tshe/ lo bcu thub par 'gyur te/ tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams kyis nang na gang yun ring du mtsho ba des lo bcu
262a7(mdo sde): thub ste/ dper na/ da ltar gyi mi rnams kyi nang na gang yun ring du 'tshe zhing ba ci legs ci bder rim 'gror byed pa des/ tshe lo brgya 'am/ ba cung zad lhag par thub
262a8(mdo sde): pa de bzhin du/ tshe lo bcu pa'i mi nem gyi nang na gang yun ring 'tsho ba des lo bcu thub bo// tshe lo bcu'i mi rnams kyis bu gcig pa sdug cing yid du 'ong ba la mas leg su
262b1(mdo sde): smon pa na bdag gis bu lo bcu'i bar du yun ring bar 'tsho bar 'gyur cig ces legs su ston par byed de/ dper na da ltar gyis mi rnams kyi bu cig bsdug cig yid
262b2(mdo sde): du 'ong ba la mas leg su smon pa ni/ 'di skad du bdag gis bu lo brgya'i bar du yun ring 'tsho bar gyur cig ces legasu smon par byed pa de bzhin du tshe lo bcu pa'i rnams
262b3(mdo sde): kyi bu cig pa sdug yid du 'ong ba'i las mas leg su smon pa na/ 'di skad du bdag gis bu lo bcu'i bar du yun ring por 'tsho bar gyur cig ces legasu smon par byed do// /
262b4(mdo sde): tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams kyi bu mo btsas pa nas zla ba lnga lon pa na/ khyim thab la gtong bar 'gyur te/ dper na da ltar gyi mi rnams kyi bu mo lo bco lnga 'am bcu drug
262b5(mdo sde): lon pa na/ khyim thabs la btong ba de bzhin du/ tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams kyi bu mo btsas nas zla ba lnga lon pa na/ khyim thab la btong bar 'gyur ro// tshe lo bcu pa'i mi
262b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi gos kyi nang na kra'i la ba mchog tu gyur te/ dper na da ltar gyi me rnams kyi gos ka shi'i ka'i ras phran nam/ zar ma'i ras phran na du gu la'i ras phran nam/
262b7(mdo sde): ko ta ma pa'i ras phran mchog yin pa de bzhin du/ tshe lo bcu pa'i rnams kyis nang na gos kyi nang na skra'i la ba mchog tu 'gyur ro// tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams kyi kha zas
262b8(mdo sde): kyi nang na/ ko tra ba mchog tu 'gyur te/ dper na da ltar gyi mi rnams kyi kha ba zas kyi nang na/ 'bras sA lu'i chan nag po'i bab stsal pa/ tshod ma dang / khu ba dang bya sna chog
263a1(mdo sde): dang / ldan pa mchog yin pa de bzhin du/ tshe lo bcu ba'i mi rnams kyi zas kyi nang na/ ko tA ba mchog tu 'gyur ro// tshe lo bcu pa'i ma
263a2(mdo sde): rnams kyis ro rnam pa lnga nub par 'gyur ro// lnga gang zhe na/ 'o ma yang yod/ zho yang yod mod kyi/ mar mi 'byung ba dang / ting yang yod/ til gyi phye ma yang yod mod
263a3(mdo sde): kyi/ til mar mi 'byung ba dang / sbrang bu yang yod// sbrang tsir yang yod mod kyi/ sbrang mi 'byung ba dang / bu ram shing yang yod/ khu ba yang yod kyi/ bu ram du
263a4(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ba dang / lan tsa ni tan med par 'gyur ro// tshe lo bcu pa'i rnams mtshon chas rgyan par 'gyur zhing / mtshon char bzhag par 'gyur te/ dper na da lta gyi mi rnams
263a5(mdo sde): kyis rgyan 'gul gdub 'am/ gdubu rgyan can nam/ rna cha gdub 'khor rnams sam/ dbun brgyan rnams sam/ lag pa'i brgyan rnams sam/ rkang pa'i brgyan
263a6(mdo sde): rnams sam/ song rngub kyi brgyan nam/ gser dngul gyi phreng ba thogs pa de bzhin du/ tshe lo bcu'i nga'i mi rnams mtshon chas brgyan cing mtshon ces bzhag go/ tshe lo bcu
263a7(mdo sde): ba'i mi rnams kyi nang na gang mar mi 'dzin pa dang / phar 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer mi mdzin pa de dag kun bkur pa dang / gces su bya ba dang /
263a8(mdo sde): rab tu bsngags par 'gyur te/ dper na da ltar gyi mi rnams kyi nang na gang mar 'dzin pa dang / par 'dzin pa dang / dge slong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa de dag
263b1(mdo sde): bkur zhing gces bya ba dang / rab tu sngags pa de bzhin du/ tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams kyi nang na gang mar 'dzin pa dang / phar 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzin
263b2(mdo sde): pa dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa de dag dkur zhing bces su bya ba dang / rab tu bsngags par 'gyur ro// tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams sems can gcig gis cig mthong
263b3(mdo sde): na/ shas cher gnod par bya ba'i sems dang / gsad par bya ba'i nye sems par gnas par 'gyur te/ dper na da ltar gyi mi ri dgas kyi sngon pas dgon pa'i ri dgas
263b4(mdo sde): mthong nas/ shas cher gnod pa'i sems dang / bsad pa'i sems nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams gcig gis gcig mthong na/
263b5(mdo sde): shas cher gnod par bya ba'i sems dang / gsad pa'i sems nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams kyi khyim rnams su zhag bdun du khyim phud
263b6(mdo sde): bar byed par rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gi shing ngam/ gseg ma 'am/ gyo mgo 'ang rung ste/ gang dang gang la nom pa de dag thams cad mtshon cha
263b7(mdo sde): shin tu rno zhing 'jebs par de dang / de dag gis gcig la cig srog dang / bral bar byed de/ nye bu bzad pa'i dang / longs spyod zad pa'i dang / nor yang
263b8(mdo sde): zad par 'gyur ro// mtshon gyi bar gyi bskal pa de yang zhag bdun khor nar zad de zhag bdun 'das nas mthar mthug par brjod par bya'o// de'i tshe gang yang rung ste/
264a1(mdo sde): / 'chi ba de dag thams cad lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de'i mi gang dag mtshon gyi bar gyi bskal
264a2(mdo sde): pa des 'dog cing mdzes par gyur la slong cing / rnam par spod cing / rnam pa de dag las kha cig chu'i ljongs dang / ri'i ljongs dang / rtsa stug po dang / nags
264a3(mdo sde): tshal sdug po dag du zhugs te/ der zhag bdun gyi bar du rtsa ba dang / chus 'tsho ba zhing 'dug pa nas grong dang grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i
264a4(mdo sde): pho brang 'khor dag du phyir ldog ste/ sems can de dag gcig gi gcig mthong nas shas cher byams pa'i dang / sdug pa dang / gus pa dang / snying brtse ba'i sem
264a5(mdo sde): nye bar gnas par gyur te/ 'di skad du/ kye ma kye sems can gson po mthong ngo // kye ma kye sems can gson po mthong ngo // zhes kyang 'dzer te dper na/ da ltar
264a6(mdo sde): gyi mi rnams kyi ma la bu gcig pa sdug cing yid du 'ong ba zhing yod la/ zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon ba te phrad na/ shas cher byams pa dang / sdug pa dang / gus pa dang /
264a7(mdo sde): snying brtse ba'i sems nye bar gnas te/ 'di skad du kye ma kye sems can gson po mthong ngo // zhes zer ba de bzhin du/ sems can de dag gcig gis gcig
264a8(mdo sde): mthong nas/ shas cher byams dang / sdug pa dang / gus pa dang snying rtse ba'i sems nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ 'di skad du/ kye ma kye sems can gson
264b1(mdo sde): por mthong ngo // kye ma kye sems can gson po mthong ngo // zhes kyang 'dzer to// // bar sdom ni ring du gang 'tsho ma dang bu mo dang / gos dang zas dang
264b2(mdo sde): nub par 'gyur ba dang / brgyan rnams dang ni dkur dang gnod pa dang / zhag bdun khyim du khyim phung byed pa 'byung / sems can de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag
264b3(mdo sde): mtshon chas srog gcod pa 'dis/ gcig la gcig rnam par gnod par byed pa la zhugs pas/ nye du zad par gyur par gyur cing longs spyod zad pa dang / nor zad par
264b4(mdo sde): gyur cig cag gis/ dge ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yang dag par blangs te 'khod par byas na bdag cag gis dge ba'i chos gang zhig yang dag par blangs te 'khod par
264b5(mdo sde): bya snyam sems so// de dag 'di snyam du/ kye ma bdag cag ni/ srog gcod pa yin gyis/ bdag cag gyis mtshon chas srog gcod slong bar bya'o snyam nas/
264b6(mdo sde): de dag mtshon chas srog gcod pa spod do// tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams mtshon chas srog gcod pa spong ba de dag gis bu mo btsas pa rnams tshe le nyi shu thub par 'gyur ro//
264b7(mdo sde): tshe lo nyi shu pa'i mi rnams 'di snyam du/ kye dge ba'i chos rnams yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus tshe'ang nur la kha dog dang / stobs dang bde ba dang / longs spyod dag
264b8(mdo sde): kyang 'phel bar snang gis bdag cag gis yang lhag par dge ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yang dag par blangs te/ 'khod par byas na bdag cag gis dge ba'i chos gang zhig yang
265a1(mdo sde): dag par blangs te 'khong par bya snyam du sems so// de dag 'di snyam du kye ma bdag cag ni ma byin par len pa yin gyis/ bdag
265a2(mdo sde): cag gis ma byin par len par spang bar bya'o// zhes nas de dag ma byin par len par spong ngo // tshe lo nyi shu pa'i mgrin par len pa de spong ba de dag gi bu dang / bu mo
265a3(mdo sde): btsas pa rnams tshe lo bzhi bcu thub 'gyur te/ de dag las kha cig ni tshe lo lnga bcu mthub par 'gyur to// tshe lo lnga brgya pa'i mi rnams 'di snyam du dge ba'i chos rnams
265a4(mdo sde): yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus tshe'ang nur bar 'gyur kha dog dang / stobs dang / bde ba dang / longs spyod dag kyang 'phel bar snang gis bdag cag gis yang lhag
265a5(mdo sde): par dge ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yang dag par blangs te/ 'khod par bya na bdag cag gis dge ba'i chos 'ga' yang dag par blangs te/ 'khod par bya snyam
265a6(mdo sde): du sems so// de dag 'di snyam du kye bdag cag ni 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa yin gyis/ bdag cag gis 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spong
265a7(mdo sde): khar bya'o// snyam nas de dag 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spong ngo // tshe lo lnga bcu pa'i mi rnams 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spong ba de dag gis bu da
265a8(mdo sde): bu mo btsas pa rnams tshe lo brgya thub par gyur to// tshe lo brgya pa'i mi rnams 'di snyam du/ kye dge ba'i chos rnams yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus tshe rang nur la/
265b1(mdo sde): kha dog dang stobs dang / bde ba dang longs spyod dag kyang 'phel bar snang gis bdag gis yang lhag par dge ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yang dag par blangs te/ 'khon
265b2(mdo sde): par bya na bdag cag gis dge ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yang dag par blangs te/ 'khod par bya snyam pa la sems so// de dag 'di snyam du kye bdag cag ni
265b3(mdo sde): brdzun du sla ba yin gyis bdag cag gis brdzun du smras pa spang bar bya'o snyam nas/ de dag brdzun du smras bathong ngo // tshe lo brgya pa'i mi brdzun du sla ba spong ba
265b4(mdo sde): de dag gis bu dang bu mo btsas pa rnams tshe lo nyi brgya thub par 'gyur te/ de dag las kha cig ni tshe lo nyis brgya lnga bcu thub par gyur to// tshe lo nyi brgya lnga bcu thub
265b5(mdo sde): pa'i mi rnams 'di snyam du kye dge ba'i chos rnams yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus tshe'ang nur la/ kha dog dang / stobs dang / bde ba dang / longs spyod dag
265b6(mdo sde): kyang 'phel bar snang gis/ bdag cag gis yang lhag par dge ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yang dag par blangs ste/ 'khod par bya na bdag gis dge ba'i chos gang
265b7(mdo sde): zhig yang dag par blangs te/ 'khod par bya'o snyam du sems so// de dag 'di snyam du kye bdag cag ni phra ma spang bya'o// snyam nas/ de dag phra ma spong ngo //
265b8(mdo sde): tshe le nyi brgya lnga bcu pa'i mi rnams phra ma spong ba de dag gi bu dang / bu mo btsacas pa rnams tshe lo lnga brgya thub par 'gyuro// / tshe lo lnga brgya pa'i mi rnams 'di snyam du/
266a1(mdo sde): @/ ce dge ba'i chos rnams yang dag par blangs pa'i chos rgyas tsho lang nur la/ kha dog dang stobs dang / bde ba dang / longs spyo/
266a2(mdo sde): dag kyang me tog 'phel bar snang gis/ bdag cag gis yang lhag par dge ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yang dag par blangs te/ 'khod par bya na/ bdag cag gis
266a3(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos gang zhig yang dag par blangs te/ khod par bya snyam du sems so// de dag gis 'di snyam du/ kye bdag cag ni ngag bcub po smras pa yin
